    "markdown": "[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n![](https://facebook.com/security/hsts-pixel.gif)\n\n[![](https://developers.facebook.com/images/developer/m4d_logo_july_2024.svg)](https://developers.facebook.com/?no_redirect=1)\n\n[Docs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/) [Tools](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/) [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/support/)\n\n[Log In](https://business.facebook.com/business/loginpage/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.facebook.com%2Fdocs%2Fwhatsapp%2Fcloud-api%2Fpayments-api%2Fpayments-br%3Fnav_ref%3Dbiz_unified_f3_login_page_to_dfc&app=436761779744620&login_options%5B0%5D=FB&login_options%5B1%5D=SSO&is_work_accounts=1&config_ref=biz_login_tool_flavor_dfc)\n\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\n- [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)\n- [Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n- [Get Started for Solution Partners](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-solution-partners)\n- [Get Started for Tech Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Solutions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/multi-partner-solutions)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br#payments-api---brazil)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Payments API - Brazil\n\nPayments API enable businesses to accept payments from their customers via WhatsApp. Businesses send `order_details` messages ( [Orders API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orders)) to their customers, then get notified about payment status updates via webhook notifications.\n\nBased on the selected usecase, businesses can collect payment from the customers using one of the following integrations:\n\n- [Dynamic Pix Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/offsite-pix)\n- [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/payment-links)\n- [Boleto](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto)\n- [Order Details Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate)\n\n## How It Works\n\nFirst, the business composes and sends an `order_details` message, which is a new type of interactive message. It contains the same 4 main components: header, body, footer, and action. Inside the action component, the business includes all the information needed for the customer to complete their payment.\n\nEach `order_details` message **must** contain a **unique `reference_id`** provided by the business. This reference id is used throughout the flow to track the order.\n\nOnce the message is sent, the business waits for a payment or transaction status update. The type of the update depends on the integration type (e.g.: [Pix](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/offsite-pix), [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/payment-links), etc.). WhatsApp does **NOT** support payment reconciliations. The business must reconcile the payment with their payment service provider (PSP) using the `reference_id` of the order.\n\n## Purchase Flow in App\n\nIn the WhatsApp customer app, the purchase flow has the following steps:\n\n1. Buyers communiticate with businesses and select a product.\n2. Businesses send an `order_details` message to the buyer.\n3. Buyers pay the order. For Pix, they will switch to their bank app and use the Pix Copy and Paste functionality. For Payment Links, the payment/checkout link opens in the web browser, and they complete the payment there.\n4. Once the payment has been confirmed, the business will be notified via a webhook notification.\n5. Businesses send an `order_status` message indicating that the order is now `processing`.\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br#payments-api---brazil)\n\n* * feedback](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#interested-not-interested-feedback)\n\n[Per-User Marketing Template Message Limits](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#per-user-marketing-template-message-limits)\n\n[What is important](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#why-it-s-important)\n\n[How this Applies to Your Business](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#how-this-applies-to-your-business)\n\n[Aligning Per-User Marketing Limits with Upcoming Per Message Pricing Changes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#aligning-per-user-marketing-limits-with-upcoming-per-message-pricing-changes)\n\n[How We Notify via Error Code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#how-we-notify-via-error-code)\n\n[Troubleshooting](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#troubleshooting)\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwHyOMJj&_nc_oc=Adl2WfmkYQzvN8Rvytjgs7XaONYEBPBvNqhYrilfF4BOfTN1R-h5L5_WPAKCwj6aHPI&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=HZFwNUkCUKuDqASm6B3avw&oh=00_AYGnpJ_NF6oE1IYcciwDYX9LeQpx7SoZgiveUnkeG_8mKA&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\nStarting April 1, 2025, we are temporarily pausing delivery of marketing template messages to WhatsApp users who have a United States phone number. See [Per-User Marketing Template Message Limits](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#per-user-marketing-template-message-limits) for additional information.\n\n# Template Messages\n\nWhatsApp message templates are specific message formats that businesses use to send out notifications or customer care messages to people that have opted in to notifications. Messages can include appointment reminders, shipping information, issue resolution or payment updates.\n\nBefore sending a template message, you need to create a template. See [Create Message Templates for Your WhatsApp Business Account](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/2055875911147364) for more information. If your account is not verified yet, you can use one of our [pre-approved templates](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/722393685250070).\n\n\nCurrently, you can send the following template types:\n\n- [Text-based message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#text-based)\n- [Media-based message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#media-based)\n- [Interactive message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#interactive)\n- [Location-based message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#location)\n- [Authentication templates with one-time password buttons](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/auth-otp-template-messages)\n- [Multi-Product Message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages)\n\nAll API calls mentioned in this guide must be authenticated with an access token. Developers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup** panel. Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission.\n\n## Pacing\n\nNewly created or unpaused marketing templates are subject to template pacing. See [Template Pacing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#template-pacing).\n\n## Text-Based Message Templates\n\nTo send a text-based message template, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` and attach a message object with `type=template`. Then, add a [`template` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object).\n\nSubstitute the placeholder properties below using the properties table.\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/CURRENT_API_VERSION/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n         <NAMED_PARAMETER_INPUT>\\\n         <POSITIONAL_PARAMETER_INPUT>\\\n        ]\n      }\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<NAMED_PARAMETER_INPUT>` | _`[JSON Object]`_ \\| _Optional_<br>**Required when you have used named parameters in your template's body text.**<br>An array of JSON objects that contain `type`, `parameter_name`, and `text` strings.<br>- `“type”` — Parameter type. Always the value `\"text\"`<br>- `“parameter_name”` — The custom parameter name used in your template. Must be lowercase letters and underscores only.<br>- `“text”` — The actual text that will replace the named parameter in your template. | ```<br>    \"type\": \"body\",<br>    \"parameters\": [<br>      {<br>        \"type\": \"text\",<br>        \"paramter_name\": \"customer_name\",<br>        \"text\": \"John\"<br>      },<br>      {<br>        \"type\": \"text\",<br>        \"parameter_name\": \"order_id\",<br>        \"text\": \"9128312831\"<br>      }        <br>    ]<br>          <br>``` |\n| `<POSITIONAL_PARAMTER_INPUT>` | _`[JSON Object]`_ \\| _Optional_<br>**Required when you have used positional parameters in your template's body text.**<br>An array of JSON objects that contain `type` and `text` strings.<br>- `“type”` — Parameter type. Always the value `\"text\"`<br>- `“text”` — The actual text that will replace the positional parameter in your template. <br>The number of strings must match the number of parameters included in the chosen template. | ```<br>    \"type\": \"body\",<br>      \"parameters\": [<br>        {<br>          \"type\": \"text\",<br>          \"text\": \"John\"<br>        },<br>        {<br>          \"type\": \"text\",<br>          \"text\": \"9128312831\"<br>        }        <br>      ]<br>    ]<br>          <br>``` |\n\n### Sample Reponse\n\nA successful response includes an object with an identifier prefixed with wamid. Use the ID listed after wamid to track your message status.\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [{\\\n      \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\",\\\n    }]\n  \"messages\": [{\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.ID\",\\\n    }]\n}\n```\n\n## Media-Based Message Templates\n\nTo send a media-based message template, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` and attach a message object with `type=template`. Then, add a [`template` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object). Supports [Media HTTP Caching](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#media-http-caching).\n\nUse the POST [WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint to send a media-based template message. Set the `type` property to `template` and use the [`template`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object) property to define your [template object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object) and its [media object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object).\n\nWhen defining your media object, you can either [upload your media asset](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) to our servers and use its media ID (using the `id` property), or host the asset on your server and use its URL (using the `link` property). If using `link`, your asset must be on a publicly accessible server or the message will fail to send.\n\nTo reduce the likelihood of errors and avoid unnecessary requests to your public server, we recommend that you upload your media assets and use their IDs when sending messages.\n\nMedia assets can also be cached. See [Media HTTP Caching](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#media-http-caching).\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"image\",\\\n            \"image\": {\\\n              \"link\": \"https://URL\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"TEXT-STRING\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"currency\",\\\n            \"currency\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"VALUE\",\\\n              \"code\": \"USD\",\\\n              \"amount_1000\": NUMBER\\\n            }\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"date_time\",\\\n            \"date_time\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"MONTH DAY, YEAR\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\nA successful response includes an object with an identifier prefixed with wamid. Use the ID listed after wamid to track your message status.\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [{\\\n      \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\",\\\n    }]\n  \"messages\": [{\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.ID\",\\\n    }]\n}\n```\n\n## Interactive Message Templates\n\nInteractive message templates expand the content you can send recipients beyond the standard message template and media messages template types to include interactive buttons using the components object. There are two types of predefined buttons:\n\n- **Call-to-Action** — Allows your customer to call a phone number and visit a website.\n- **Quick Reply** — Allows your customer to return a simple text message.\n\nThese buttons can be attached to text messages or media messages. Once your interactive message templates have been created and approved, you can use them in notification messages as well as customer service/care messages.\n\nTo send an interactive message template, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` and attach a message object with `type=template`. Then, add a [`template` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object) with your chosen [`button`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#button-parameter-object).\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"image\",\\\n            \"image\": {\\\n              \"link\": \"http(s)://URL\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"TEXT_STRING\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"currency\",\\\n            \"currency\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"VALUE\",\\\n              \"code\": \"USD\",\\\n              \"amount_1000\": NUMBER\\\n            }\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"date_time\",\\\n            \"date_time\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"MONTH DAY, YEAR\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"quick_reply\",\\\n        \"index\": \"0\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"payload\",\\\n            \"payload\": \"PAYLOAD\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"quick_reply\",\\\n        \"index\": \"1\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"payload\",\\\n            \"payload\": \"PAYLOAD\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\nA successful response includes an object with an identifier prefixed with wamid. Use the ID listed after wamid to track your message status.\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [{\\\n      \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\",\\\n    }]\n  \"messages\": [{\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.ID\",\\\n    }]\n}\n```\n\n## Location-based Message Templates\n\nTo send a template that uses a [location header](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/components#location-headers) your request must include a location header object.\n\n### Syntax\n\n```\n{\n  \"type\": \"header\",\n  \"parameters\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"location\",\\\n      \"location\": {\\\n        \"latitude\": \"<LATITUDE>\",\\\n        \"longitude\": \"<LONGITUDE>\",\\\n        \"name\": \"<NAME>\",\\\n        \"address\": \"<ADDRESS>\"\\\n      }\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n### Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<ADDRESS>` | Address that will appear after the `<NAME>` value, below the generic map at the top of the message. | `1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025` |\n| `<LATITUDE>` | Location latitude. | `37.483307` |\n| `<LONGITUDE>` | Location longitude. | `122.148981` |\n| `<NAME>` | Text that will appear immediately below the generic map at the top of the message. | `Pablo Morales` |\n\n### Example Request\n\nThis is an example request to send an existing template that uses the following components:\n\n- a location header\n- a text body with a variable\n- a footer\n- a quick reply button\n\n```\ncurl -L 'https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"12245554792\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"order_delivery_update\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"en_US\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"location\",\\\n            \"location\": {\\\n              \"latitude\": \"37.483307\",\\\n              \"longitude\": \"122.148981\",\\\n              \"name\": \"Pablo Morales\",\\\n              \"address\": \"1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"Pablo\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"566701\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Authentication Templates\n\nAttempting to send legacy authentication templates (templates without one-time password buttons) will return error code `100` if variable values exceed 15 characters or contain links or emojis, or the template body component contains a link. Instead, create and use an authentication template that has a one-time password button.\n\nSee [Authentication Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/authentication-templates) and [Sending Authentication Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/auth-otp-template-messages).\n\n## Delivery Sequence of Multiple Messages\n\nWhen sending a series of messages, the order in which messages are delivered is not guaranteed to match the order of your API requests. If you need to ensure the sequence of message delivery, confirm receipt of a `delivered` status in a [messages webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components#statuses-object) before sending the next message in your message sequence.\n\n## User preferences for marketing messages\n\nStarting November 22, 2024, we will begin gradually rolling out user preferences for marketing messages. This feature may not be available to WhatsApp users in some regions initially.\n\nWhatsApp provides a setting ( **Offers and announcements**) that allows users to stop or resume delivery of marketing template messages from your business, or to indicate their interest level in these types of messages.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/468946006_1597361267522697_997046815927229845_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=ZVM8DGtqslUQ7kNvwGExnIr&_nc_oc=AdnX-QZ83F7PJ2hRNOqpduaH1aYTpmnnDWgkHt9EeQ-ISKuA7DF50hzSVHiTB7Q31NE&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=HZFwNUkCUKuDqASm6B3avw&oh=00_AYGMbk78YgUTYnU08aer_1LrnerQtBw8pZeGDZyC8RyzWA&oe=680B06EF)\n\n### Stop/Resume controls\n\nWhatsApp users can use the **Offers and announcements** setting to stop or resume delivery of marketing template messages from your business.\n\nIf you attempt to send a marketing template to a WhatsApp user who has stopped marketing template messages from your business, the API will process the request but not send the message. Instead, the API will trigger a [messages webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#status-failed-due-to-stopped-marketing-messages) with:\n\n- `status` set to `failed`,\n- `code` set to `131050`,\n- `title` set to `Unable to deliver the message. This recipient has chosen to stop receiving marketing messages on WhatsApp from your business`\n\nTo be notified whenever a WhatsApp user stops or resumes delivery of marketing template messages from your business, subscribe to the [user\\_preferences webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/user_preferences).\n\n### Interested/Not Interested feedback\n\nWhatsApp users can use the **Offers and announcements** setting to indicate how interested they are in receiving marketing template messages from your business.\n\nIf a user chooses **Not interested**, it can affect [per-user marketing template messaging limits](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#per-user-marketing-template-message-limits) between you and the user.\n\n## Per-User Marketing Template Message Limits\n\n**Upcoming changes**\n\n_Starting March 3, 2025_, we will take into account the overall volume of personal and business messages in a user’s inbox in addition to their recent marketing message read rates when determining if a given WhatsApp user should receive fewer marketing template messages, and what their limit should be. This means that if a person has low inbox activity or they have not engaged with many of the marketing messages they received lately they may receive fewer marketing messages to ensure a healthy balance of messages in their inbox. From late Q2 we will also align the per user marketing limit with upcoming per-message pricing changes so that all marketing messages delivered will now count towards the per user marketing limit.\n\n_Starting April 1, 2025_, we will temporarily pause delivery of all marketing template messages to WhatsApp users who have a United States phone number (a number composed of a +1 dialing code and a US area code). This pause is intended to allow us to focus on building a better consumer experience in the US, which will ultimately lead to improved outcomes for businesses. Attempting to send a template message to a WhatsApp user with a US phone number after this date will [result in an error](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#how-we-notify-via-error-code).\n\n### What is it?\n\nWhatsApp may limit the number of marketing template messages a person receives from any business in a given period of time where users are less likely to be receptive and engage with them. This is determined based on a number of factors, including a dynamic view of an individual’s recent marketing message read rate and how many messages they currently have in their inbox from friends, family and businesses.\n\nStarting April 1, 2025, to focus on building the consumer experience, WhatsApp will not deliver any marketing template messages to individuals with United States phone numbers (numbers composed of a +1 dialing code and a US area code).\n\n### Why it's important\n\nWhatsApp has found that per-user marketing template limits maximize marketing message engagement and improve the user experience, measured through improvements in user read rates and sentiment. This limit helps WhatsApp users find business messaging more valuable and feel less like they receive too many business messages.\n\n### How this Applies to Your Business\n\nOur per user marketing limit adapts automatically over time based on a person’s recent engagement levels. While this may mean delivering fewer messages to some users during periods of lower marketing read rates or overall inbox activity, rest assured your ability to reach people when they are most engaged will not change.\n\n### Aligning Per-User Marketing Limits with Upcoming Per Message Pricing Changes\n\nGradually rolling out from late Q2 2025, the per user marketing limit will align with upcoming per-message [pricing changes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing). Previously, the limit only applied to marketing template messages that would normally open a new marketing conversation, and businesses could send one additional marketing template message if a marketing conversation is already open between you and a WhatsApp user.\n\nNow businesses will be able to send an unlimited number of marketing messages, however each message delivered will now count towards the per user marketing limit. One exception is, if a person responds to a marketing message it will start a 24h [customer service window](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#customer-service-windows). Marketing messages sent within this window will not count towards a person’s limit.\n\n### How We Notify via Error Code\n\nIf a marketing template message is not sent due to per-user marketing template limit enforcement, a messages webhook will be triggered with status set to failed and (error) code set to `131049` (for Cloud API) or `1026` (for On-Premises API).\n\nIf you do receive this error code and suspect it is due to the limit, avoid immediately resending the template message. Doing so will only result in another error response since the limit may be in effect for differing periods of time. Instead, retry sending the message in increasingly larger time increments until it is delivered.\n\nWe will continue to refine our approach, and we appreciate your partnership as we invest in making WhatsApp the best possible experience for your business and your customers.\n\n## Troubleshooting\n\nIf you are experiencing problems with message delivery, see [Message Not Delivered](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support#message-not-delivered).\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Template API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\n- [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)\n- [Get API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api#cloud-api)\n\n[Documentation Contents](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api#documentation-contents)\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwFlFDN8&_nc_oc=AdnbZJMqyOJ9dzBjd8S17TQJTgH1yU2ygkI0-vxK234Dkji-17sHSPCRt_6uyJeHNng&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=agiBSmRDmrqjwtQBqIPLTA&oh=00_AYEdCpiLmgo1xvDiNVzkMDDItAqYjSOSd6V2cEuqmTEFfg&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Cloud API\n\nMeta Blueprint\n\n- [Set up the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebookblueprint.com%2Fstudent%2Fcollection%2F409587%2Fpath%2F360218&h=AT1JQOleuSOnWaWhFeuF7uUb9kuyNR4tj_BsUpMixul0kg-GgNuiZE0Fm-BiVUjuWHx-j46teXFDQbguj9rU7mkKW_0hwwmAsFW15H9i6cVSLFdni6LM0AaeYZs9B_HEV8DEIKHtq0KpsA)\n\nSend and receive messages using a cloud-hosted version of the WhatsApp Business Platform. The Cloud API, hosted by Meta, allows you to implement WhatsApp Business APIs without the cost of hosting of your own servers and also allows you to more easily scale your business messaging.\n\nIf you are a developer who wants direct access to the Cloud API to build on the behalf of a client’s business, [fill out this form](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbusiness.whatsapp.com%2Flearn-more&h=AT397pK3GE9duWUNjExfSRw5PCWHaLXrLnQV4TiTgf6dK_hgquZ0N1Cz1oU1KGYbQqJQuTGwYFAR4WACVWeGZs-hzDa461pzVRKtqZHYVd3Ong5yExeMh44_yH0yplN3CdD1QN3kL0-OOA) and we will reach out with more information.\n\n## Documentation Contents\n\n|     |     |\n| --- | --- |\n| #### [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)<br>Learn how the Cloud API works. See information about rate limiting, metrics, scaling, data privacy, security, and encryption. | #### [Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/getting-started/signing-up)<br>Send your first message using the Cloud API. [Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides)<br>Learn how to use our available endpoints. | #### Inventory](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/upload-inventory)\n- [Set Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings)\n- [Share Products](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/share-products)\n- [Receiving Responses](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses)\n\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services#sell-products---services)\n\n[Policies](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services#policies)\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwGNj8PQ&_nc_oc=AdlT06v5mERtYlO5Ou0qLBKb1XtVkL_71dFGuMR46ArLTbs_dFqAbEr5Q_S-oIw335U&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=smz53czJzFIj4CxU6pM4TQ&oh=00_AYHHyQf5Yb3HVqKzNPr_0DlcsjpmIekjJhG5fGn-kM__tQ&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Sell Products & Services\n\nBusinesses using the WhatsApp Business API can showcase and share their products and services with customers for them to browse items and add to a cart without leaving the chat. To use the API for commerce use cases, follow these guides:\n\n1. [**Upload inventory to Meta**](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/upload-inventory): Upload the business's inventory to Meta using the API or the [Meta Commerce Manager](https://business.facebook.com/commerce/).\n2. [**Connect an Ecommerce Catalog to the WABA**](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/158662536425974): Connect a catalog that has been categorized as **Ecommerce** to the WhatsApp Business Account.\n3. [**Set Commerce Settings**](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings): Set the business phone number's commerce settings.\n4. [**Share Products With Customers**](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/share-products): Use Multi and Single Product Messages to send products to customers.\n5. [**Receive Responses From Customers**](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses): Track webhooks to get questions and orders from customers.\n\n## Policies\n\nNever send messages that violate our Commerce and Business Policies. Additionally, Multi and Single Product Messages are subject to the existing enforcement and data sharing rules for product catalogs:\n\n- Rejection at product catalog level: WhatsApp automatically reviews items added to a catalog connected to a WABA. If a policy violating item is added, the product is flagged and the business is directed to the WhatsApp Commerce Policies.\n- Reporting options for the user at the product catalog level: Users can report a specific product they receive via message. If a user reports a product, it gets reviewed for violations.\n\nBusinesses can appeal for disapproved items directly in the [Meta Commerce Manager](https://business.facebook.com/commerce/).\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services#sell-products---services)\n\n[Policies](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services#policies)\n\n* Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#request-parameters)\n\n[Response Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-object)\n\n[Response Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-parameters)\n\n[Unblock Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#unblock-users)\n\n[Endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#endpoint-2)\n\n[Request Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#request-body-2)\n\n[Request Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#request-parameters-2)\n\n[Response Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-object-2)\n\n[Response Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-parameters-2)\n\n[Get List of Blocked Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#get-list-of-blocked-numbers)\n\n[Endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#endpoint-3)\n\n[Query Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#query-parameters)\n\n[Response Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-parameters-3)\n\n[Response Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#response-object-3)\n\n[Error Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#error-codes)\n\n# Block Users\n\nThe Block Users API enables your business to block bad actors from contacting you.\n\n## How it Works\n\nWhen you block a WhatsApp user, the following happens:\n\n- The user cannot contact your business or see that you are online.\n- Your business cannot message the user. If you do, you will encounter an error.\n- You cannot use this API to block another WhatsApp Business\n\nErrors on the API occur per-number since blocks might be successful on some numbers and not others.\n\nThe Block Users API is synchronous.\n\n## Limitations\n\n- You can only block users that have messaged your business in the last 24 hours.\n- 64k blocklist limit\n\n## Features\n\nThe API contains 3 endpoints:\n\n```\n// Block WhatsApp user numbers\nPOST /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n```\n// Unblock WhatsApp user numbers\nDELETE /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n```\n// Get list of blocked WhatsApp user numbers\nGET /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n## Block Users\n\nUse this endpoint to block a list of WhatsApp user numbers.\n\n### Endpoint\n\n```\nPOST /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n### Request Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  // List of WhatsApp user numbers to be blocked\n  \"block_users\": [\\\n     {\\\n       \"user\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\"\\\n     }\\\n   ]\n}\n```\n\n### Request Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `messaging_product`<br>_String_ | _Required_<br>Messaging service used for the request. Must be `\"whatsapp\"`.<br>[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api) only. |\n| `block_users`<br>_Object_ | _Required_<br>List of user(s) to block.<br>Each element contains a `user` field. |\n| `user`<br>_string_ | The phone number or WhatsApp ID to be blocked. |\n\n### Response Object\n\n```\nSUCCESS (200)\n\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"block_users\": {\n    \"added_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Response Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `block_users`<br>_Object_ | Contains two lists:<br>1. `added-users` — List of successfully blocked users.<br>2. `failed_users` — List of users failed to be blocked. |\n| `added_users`<br>_Object_ | List of successfully blocked users.<br>Contains values of both:<br>- `input` \\| _String_ — Phone number of a WhatsApp user<br>- `wa_id` \\| _String_ — Unique ID of a WhatsApp user |\n| `failed_users`<br>_Object_ | List of users failed to be blocked<br>Contains values of both:<br>- `input` \\| _String_ — Phone number of a WhatsApp user<br>- `wa_id` \\| _String_ — Unique ID of a WhatsApp user |\n\n```\nMIXED SUCCESS/FAILURE (400)\n\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"block_users\": {\n    \"added_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      ...\\\n    ],\n    \"failed_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      ...\\\n        \"errors\": [{\\\n          \"message\": \"<MESSAGE>\",\\\n          \"code\": \"<CODE>\",\\\n          \"error_data\": {\\\n            \"details\": \"<DETAILS>\"\"\\\n          }]\\\n        }\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  },\n  \"error\": {\n    \"message\": \"(#139100) Failed to block/unblock users\",\n    \"type\": \"OAuthException\",\n    \"code\": 139100,\n    \"error_data\": {\n      \"details\": \"Failed to block some users, see the block_users response list for details\"\n    },\n    \"fbtrace_id\": \"<FBTRACE_ID>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Unblock Users\n\nUse this endpoint to unblock a list of WhatsApp user numbers.\n\n### Endpoint\n\n```\nDELETE /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n### Request Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"block_users\": [\\\n     {\\\n       // List of WhatsApp user numbers to be unblocked\\\n       \"user\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\"\\\n     }\\\n   ]\n}\n```\n\n### Request Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `messaging_product`<br>_String_ | _Required_<br>Messaging service used for the request. Must be `\"whatsapp\"`.<br>[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api) only. |\n| `block_users`<br>_Object_ | _Required_<br>List of user(s) to block.<br>Each element contains a `user` field. |\n| `user`<br>_string_ | The phone number or WhatsApp ID to be blocked. |\n\n### Response Object\n\n```\nSUCCESS (200)\n\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"block_users\": {\n    \"added_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Response Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `block_users`<br>_Object_ | Contains two lists:<br>1. `added-users` — List of successfully blocked users.<br>2. `failed_users` — List of users failed to be blocked. |\n| `added_users`<br>_Object_ | List of successfully blocked users.<br>Contains values of both:<br>- `input` \\| _String_ — Phone number of a WhatsApp user<br>- `wa_id` \\| _String_ — Unique ID of a WhatsApp user |\n| `failed_users`<br>_Object_ | List of users failed to be blocked<br>Contains values of both:<br>- `input` \\| _String_ — Phone number of a WhatsApp user<br>- `wa_id` \\| _String_ — Unique ID of a WhatsApp user |\n\n```\nMIXED SUCCESS/FAILURE (400)\n\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"block_users\": {\n    \"added_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      ...\\\n    ],\n    \"failed_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      }\\\n      ...\\\n        \"errors\": [{\\\n          \"message\": \"<MESSAGE>\",\\\n          \"code\": \"<CODE>\",\\\n          \"error_data\": {\\\n            \"details\": \"<DETAILS>\"\"\\\n          }]\\\n        }\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  },\n  \"error\": {\n    \"message\": \"(#139100) Failed to block/unblock users\",\n    \"type\": \"OAuthException\",\n    \"code\": 139100,\n    \"error_data\": {\n      \"details\": \"Failed to block some users, see the block_users response list for details\"\n    },\n    \"fbtrace_id\": \"<FBTRACE_ID>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Get List of Blocked Numbers\n\nUse this endpoint to get a list of blocked numbers on your WhatsApp Business number.\n\n### Endpoint\n\n```\nGET /<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/block_users\n```\n\n### Query Parameters\n\n```\n?limit=10, // Optional\n&after=<AFTER_CURSOR>,   // Optional\n&before=<BEFORE_CURSOR>  // Optional\n```\n\n### Response Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `limit`<br>_Optional_ | Maximum number of blocked users to fetch in the request. |\n| `after`<br>_Optional_ | Learn more about [Paginated Results in Graph API here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/results/) |\n| `before`<br>_Optional_ | Learn more about [Paginated Results in Graph API here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/results/) |\n\n### Response Object\n\n```\nSUCCESS\n\n{\n  \"data\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"block_users\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"input\": \"<PHONE_NUMBER> or <WA_ID>\",\\\n        \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n      }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"paging\": {\n    \"cursors\": {\n      \"after\": \"MTAxNTExOTQ1MjAwNzI5NDE=\",\n      \"before\": \"NDMyNzQyODI3OTQw\"\n    },\n    \"previous\": \"https://graph.facebook.com/{version}/{phone-number-id}/block_users?limit=10&before=NDMyNzQyODI3OTQw\",\n    \"next\": \"https://graph.facebook.com/{version}/{phone-number-id}/block_users?limit=25&after=MTAxNTExOTQ1MjAwNzI5NDE=\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Response Parameters\n\n| Parameter | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `block_users`<br>_Object_ | _Required_<br>List of user(s) to block.<br>Each element contains a `user` field. |\n| `wa_id`<br>_String_ | Phone number of the blocked user |\n| `paging`<br>_Object_ | Learn more about [Paginated Results in Graph API here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/results/) |\n\n```\nERROR\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"error\": {\n    \"message\": \"(#135002) Blocklist concurrent update\",\n    \"type\": \"OAuthException\",\n    \"code\": 139102,\n    \"error_data\": {\n        \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n        \"details\": \"Blocklist was updated during retrieval - retry with offset 0\"\n    },\n    \"fbtrace_id\": \"<FBTRACE_ID>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Error Codes\n\n| Code | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `139100`<br>Failed to block/unblock some users | Bulk blocking failed to block some or all of the users. |\n| `139101`<br>Blocklist limit reached | The blocklist limit is reached when the 64k limit is met. |\n| `139102`<br>Blocklist concurrent update | Occurs when the block list is updated while performing a pagination request and `version_id` does not match. |\n| `139103`<br>Internal error | Internal error, please try again. |\n| `130429`<br>Rate Limit Hit | Occurs when either:<br>1. Too many numbers are in the request itself.<br>2. Or, too many requests are made over a short period of time. |\n| `131021`<br>Self Block | Failed to block self phone number. |\n| `131047`<br>Re-engagement required | Occurs if the business has not received a message from that number in the last 24 hours.<br>This error will also be returned if the number is an invalid WhatsApp user. |\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users#block-users)\n\n[How it API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\n- [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)\n- [Get Partners](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-solution-partners)\n- [Get Started for Tech Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n\n\n- [Upload Inventory](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/upload-inventory)\n- [Set Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings)\n- [Share [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Receive Responses From Customers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#receive-responses-from-customers)\n\n[Message Status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#message-status)\n\n[Asking For Information](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#asking-for-information)\n\n[Text Messages Inquiry](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#text-messages-inquiry)\n\n[Placing an Order](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#placing-an-order)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides)\n\n# Receive Responses From Customers\n\nAfter receiving single- or multi-product messages, WhatsApp users can ask for more information about a product or place an order. These actions are communicated via **messages** webhook.\n\n## Message Status\n\nMessage status (sent, delivered, read) webhooks have the following format:\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"statuses\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>\",\\\n                \"recipient_id\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>\",\\\n                \"status\": \"<MESSAGE_STATUS>\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>\",\\\n                \"conversation\": {\\\n                  \"id\": \"<CONVERSATION_ID>\",\\\n                  \"expiration_timestamp\": \"<CONVERSATION_EXPIRATION_TIMESTAMP>\",\\\n                  \"origin\": {\\\n                    \"type\": \"<CONVERSATION_ORIGIN>\"\\\n                  }\\\n                },\\\n                \"pricing\": {\\\n                  \"pricing_model\": \"CBP\",\\\n                  \"billable\": <IS_BILLABLE>,\\\n                  \"category\": \"<CONVERSATION_CATEGORY>\"\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>` | WhatsApp business display phone number. | `15550783881` |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | WhatsApp business phone number ID. | `106540352242922` |\n| `<CONVERSATION_CATEGORY>` | Indicates [conversation category](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing). Values can be:<br>`authentication` — Indicates conversation is an authentication conversation.<br>`marketing` — Indicates conversation is a marketing conversation.<br>`service` — Indicates conversation is service conversation.<br>`utility` — Indicates conversation is a utility conversation.<br>`referral_conversion` — Indicates conversation is a free entry point conversation. | `service` |\n| `<CONVERSATION_EXPIRATION_TIMESTAMP>` | Unix timestamp indicating when the conversation will expire. | `1723570080` |\n| `<CONVERSATION_ID>` | Conversation ID. Use this to track messages that are part of an existing conversation. | `bc1c8848e7bb6118ea72231e07bf1d2c` |\n| `<CONVERSATION_ORIGIN>` | Indicates [conversation category](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing). Values can be:<br>`authentication` — Indicates conversation is an authentication conversation.<br>`marketing` — Indicates conversation is a marketing conversation.<br>`service` — Indicates conversation is service conversation.<br>`utility` — Indicates conversation is a utility conversation.<br>`referral_conversion` — Indicates conversation is a free entry point conversation. | `service` |\n| `<IS_BILLABLE>` | Indicates if message is part of a billable conversation. | `true` |\n| `<MESSAGE_STATUS>` | Message send status. Values can be:<br>`delivered` — Indicates message was delivered to WhatsApp client.<br>`read` — Indicates message was displayed in WhatsApp client.<br>`sent` — Indicates message was sent to WhatsApp user. | `sent` |\n| `<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>` | Unix timestamp indicating when the webhook was sent to your callback URL. | `1723483654` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>` | WhatsApp Business Account ID. | `102290129340398` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>` | WhatsApp message ID. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBIwNDM4QjExREVBMDgwMTRGNkMA` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>` | WhatsApp user ID. | `16505551234` |\n\n## Asking For Information\n\nWhenever a WhatsApp user receives a single- or multi-product message, they can ask for more information by sending you a text message ( `type` is `text`) as a standard message in an existing WhatsApp thread, or by first tapping a **Message Business** or **Message** button when viewing a specific product.\n\nThe only difference between these **messages** webhook payloads is that if the message originated via a button on a product details page, a `context` property will be included, whose value is an object describing the product the user was viewing.\n\n### Text Messages Inquiry\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"contacts\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"profile\": {\\\n                  \"name\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_NAME>\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"wa_id\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>\"\\\n              }\\\n            ],\\\n            \"messages\": [\\\n              {\\\n\\\n                /* The `context` property is only included if the user tapped a button\\\n                   on the product details page to send you the message */\\\n                \"context\": {\\\n                  \"from\": \"<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n                  \"id\": \"<CONTEXT_ID>\",\\\n                  \"referred_product\": {\\\n                    \"catalog_id\": \"<CATALOG_ID>\",\\\n                    \"product_retailer_id\": \"<PRODUCT_ID>\"\\\n                  }\\\n                },\\\n\\\n                \"from\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n                \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>\",\\\n                \"text\": {\\\n                  \"body\": \"<MESSAGE_TEXT>\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"type\": \"text\"\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>` | WhatsApp business display phone number. | `15550783881` |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | WhatsApp business phone number ID. | `106540352242922` |\n| `<CATALOG_ID>` | Product catalog ID. | `194836987003835` |\n| `<CONTEXT_ID>` | Message context ID. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGA9wcm9kdWN0X2lucXVpcnkA` |\n| `<MESSAGE_TEXT>` | Message contents. | `Does this come in additional sizes?` |\n| `<PRODUCT_ID>` | Product ID. | `nqryix03ez` |\n| `<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>` | Unix timestamp indicating when the webhook was sent to your callback URL. | `1723483654` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>` | WhatsApp Business Account ID. | `102290129340398` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>` | WhatsApp message ID. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBIwNDM4QjExREVBMDgwMTRGNkMA` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>` | WhatsApp user ID. | `16505551234` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_NAME>` | WhatsApp user name. | `Pablo Morales` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>` | WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Placing an Order\n\nWhen a WhatsApp user adds one or more products to their WhatsApp shopping cart and places an order, a **messages** webhook with `type` set to `order` will be triggered, describing the contents of the order. Use the order contents to fulfill the order.\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"contacts\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"profile\": {\\\n                  \"name\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_NAME>\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"wa_id\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>\"\\\n              }\\\n            ],\\\n            \"messages\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"from\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n                \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>\",\\\n                \"type\": \"order\",\\\n                \"order\": {\\\n                  \"catalog_id\": \"<CATALOG_ID>\",\\\n                  \"text\": \"<MESSAGE_TEXT>\",\\\n                  \"product_items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"product_retailer_id\": \"<PRODUCT_ID>\",\\\n                      \"quantity\": <PRODUCT_QUANTITY>,\\\n                      \"item_price\": <PRODUCT_PRICE>,\\\n                      \"currency\": \"<PRODUCT_CURRENCY>\"\\\n                    }\\\n\\\n                   /* Additional items would follow, if order contains multiple items */\\\n\\\n                  ]\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_DISPLAY_PHONE_NUMBER>` | WhatsApp business display phone number. | `15550783881` |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | WhatsApp business phone number ID. | `106540352242922` |\n| `<CATALOG_ID>` | Product catalog ID. | `194836987003835` |\n| `<MESSAGE_TEXT>` | Message contents, if user included a message. If a message was not included, value will be an empty string. | `Does this come in additional sizes?` |\n| `<PRODUCT_ID>` | Product ID. | `nqryix03ez` |\n| `<PRODUCT_CURRENCY>` | Product currency code. | `USD` |\n| `<PRODUCT_PRICE>` | Product price. | `25` |\n| `<PRODUCT_QUANTITY>` | Product quantity. | `1` |\n| `<WEBHOOK_TIMESTAMP>` | Unix timestamp indicating when the webhook was sent to your callback URL. | `1723483654` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>` | WhatsApp Business Account ID. | `102290129340398` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>` | WhatsApp message ID. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBIwNDM4QjExREVBMDgwMTRGNkMA` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>` | WhatsApp user ID. | `16505551234` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_NAME>` | WhatsApp user name. | `Pablo Morales` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>` | WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Receive Responses From Customers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#receive-responses-from-customers)\n\n[Message Status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#message-status)\n\n[Asking For Information](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#asking-for-information)\n\n[Text Messages Inquiry](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#text-messages-inquiry)\n\n[Placing an Order](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/receive-responses#placing-an-order)\n\n* * [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Video Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#video-messages)\n\n[Sending Video Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#sending-video-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Supported Video Formats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#supported-video-formats)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#example-response)\n\n# Video Messages\n\nVideo messages display a thumbnail preview of a video image with an optional caption. When the WhatsApp user taps the preview, it loads the video and displays it to the user.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440793312_1179905419842171_7706273386179077435_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=N_XKAYqgwWIQ7kNvwF7mxWf&_nc_oc=AdlBccoILt5PEeUZcszstqEKhjwPwTvVj4o9Hjt7NGSgGBDlODbHYMfJronULnc5gJ8&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=PLYEiqh6zyZVF-uTulXFAA&oh=00_AYGQyXDWe2QLgUw1_mimlkr-HuQeZmySaO2mDZxeeqx5WA&oe=680B1213)\n\n## Sending Video Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send a video message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"{{wa-user-phone-number}}\",\n  \"type\": \"video\",\n  \"video\": {\n    \"id\" : \"<MEDIA_ID>\", /* Only if using uploaded media */\n    \"link\": \"<MEDIA_URL>\", /* Only if linking to your media */\n    \"caption\": \"<VIDEO_CAPTION_TEXT>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<VIDEO_CAPTION_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Video caption text.<br>Maximum 1024 characters. | `A succulent eclipse!` |\n| `<MEDIA_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required if using an uploaded media asset (recommended)**.<br>[Uploaded media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) asset ID. | `1166846181421424` |\n| `<MEDIA_URL>`<br>_String_ | **Required if linking to your media asset (not recommended)**<br>URL of video asset on your public server. For better performance, we recommend that you [upload your media asset](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) instead. | `https://www.luckyshrub.com/assets/lucky-shrub-eclipse-viewing.mp4` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Supported Video Formats\n\n\nOnly H.264 video codec and AAC audio codec supported. Single audio stream or no audio stream only.\n\n\n\n| Video Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| 3GPP | .3gp | video/3gpp | 16 MB |\n| MP4 Video | .mp4 | video/mp4 | 16 MB |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send a video message with a caption to a WhatsApp user.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"video\",\n  \"video\": {\n    \"id\" : \"1166846181421424\",\n    \"caption\": \"A succulent eclipse!\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Video Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#video-messages)\n\n[Sending Video Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#sending-video-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Supported Video Formats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#supported-video-formats)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages#example-response)\n\n* * [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components)\n\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Endpoint References](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference#endpoint-references)\n\n[Main Root Nodes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference#main-root-nodes)\n\n[Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference#phone-number-id)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Endpoint References\n\n## Main Root Nodes\n\n| Node | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification) | Represents a specific phone number. This endpoint is used to [set up two-factor authentication](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification). |\n| [`/MEDIA_ID`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#retrieve-media-url) | Represents a specific media object. Use this endpoint to get and delete media objects. |\n| [`/MEDIA_URL`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#download-media) | Represents a specific media URL. Use this endpoint to download media from a URL. |\n\n## Phone Number ID\n\nThe `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID` endpoint has the following edges:\n\n| Edge | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/business_compliance_info`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/business_compliance_info/) | Get or update a WhatsApp business phone number's India-based business compliance information. |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/deregister`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#deregister-phone) | Used to [deregister a phone number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#deregister-phone). |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/media`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) | Used to upload media. |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) | Used to send messages. |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/register`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#register-phone) | Used to [register a phone number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#register-phone) or to [migrate WhatsApp Business Accounts from a current On-Premises deployment to the new Cloud-Based API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration). |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/request_code`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#verify) | Used to request a code to verify a phone number's ownership. |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/verify_code`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#verify) | Used to verify a phone number's ownership. |\n| [`/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_profile`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/business-profiles) | Used to get and update a business' profile. |\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Endpoint
