[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive Reply Buttons Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n\n[Sending Interactive Reply Buttons Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#sending-interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-response)\n\n[Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#webhooks)\n\n[Example Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-webhook)\n\n# Interactive Reply Buttons Messages\n\nInteractive reply buttons messages allow you to send up to three predefined replies for users to choose from.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440749535_402938502645501_9105062754221017983_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=tNke5C_rTYIQ7kNvwFOiXbi&_nc_oc=AdkmjJP8KjX_IS5teNTSh0sazvW5tAoEmqYl1pE6exV7toowJU4IziIr4fRGRI1Ppp0&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=y3LDR0nKRd8d5HixLtxfkQ&oh=00_AYFwtcHcsS9GXMygJ8aUXFWGKnQi6eTmvfY7YlkBzHzipg&oe=680AE6F1)\n\nUsers can respond to a message by selecting one of the predefined buttons, which triggers a messages webhook describing their selection.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440803070_1108181003739406_7014741695346688945_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=xLTGjSrl8jMQ7kNvwFZrsRa&_nc_oc=Adksvj4c1C_735gZwar_aQnqFue60lixjJFoZQSL6d8fKCveAchCER3NJBu18kmuQmU&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=y3LDR0nKRd8d5HixLtxfkQ&oh=00_AYFLHADaSk4Zv8zIKUrJ-jMXdtKVaLUDQGfevvpy_YcHjQ&oe=680AF086)\n\n## Sending Interactive Reply Buttons Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send an interactive reply buttons message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"button\",\n    \"header\": {<MESSAGE_HEADER>},\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"<BODY_TEXT>\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"<FOOTER_TEXT>\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"reply\",\\\n          \"reply\": {\\\n            \"id\": \"<BUTTON_ID>\",\\\n            \"title\": \"<BUTTON_LABEL_TEXT>\"\\\n          }\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BODY_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Message body text. Emojis, markdown, and links are supported.<br>Maximum 1024 characters. | `Hi Pablo! Your gardening workshop is scheduled for 9am tomorrow. Use the buttons if you need to reschedule. Thank you!` |\n| `<BUTTON_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>A unique identifier for each button. Supports up to 3 buttons.<br>Maximum 256 characters. | `change-button` |\n| `<BUTTON_LABEL_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Button label text.<br>Maximum 20 characters. | `Change` |\n| `<FOOTER_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Message footer text. Emojis, markdown, and links are supported.<br>Maximum 60 characters. | `Lucky Shrub: Your gateway to succulents!™` |\n| `<MESSAGE_HEADER>`<br>_JSON Object_ | **Optional.**<br>Header content. Supports the following types:<br>- `document`<br>- `image`<br>- `text`<br>- `video`<br>Media assets can be sent using their [uploaded media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) `id` (recommended) or URL `link` (not recommended). | Image header example:<br>```<br>{<br>  \"type\": \"image\",<br>  \"image\": {<br>    \"id\": \"2762702990552401\"<br>}<br>```<br>Text header example:<br>```<br>{<br>  \"type\":\"text\",<br>  \"text\": \"Workshop Details\"<br>}<br>``` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send an interactive reply buttons message with an image header, body text, footer text, and two quick-reply buttons.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"button\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"image\",\n      \"image\": {\n        \"id\": \"2762702990552401\"\n      }\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"Hi Pablo! Your gardening workshop is scheduled for 9am tomorrow. Use the buttons if you need to reschedule. Thank you!\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"Lucky Shrub: Your gateway to succulents!™\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"reply\",\\\n          \"reply\": {\\\n            \"id\": \"change-button\",\\\n            \"title\": \"Change\"\\\n          }\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"reply\",\\\n          \"reply\": {\\\n            \"id\": \"cancel-button\",\\\n            \"title\": \"Cancel\"\\\n          }\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n## Webhooks\n\nWhen a WhatsApp user taps on a reply button, a **messages** webhook is triggered that describes their selection in a `button_reply` object:\n\n```\n\"button_reply\": {\n  \"id\": \"<BUTTON_ID>\",\n  \"title\": \"<BUTTON_LABEL_TEXT>\"\n}\n```\n\n- `<BUTTON_ID>` — The button ID of the button tapped by the user.\n- `<BUTTON_LABEL_TEXT>` — The button label text of the button tapped by the user.\n\n### Example Webhook\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"102290129340398\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"15550783881\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"106540352242922\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"contacts\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"profile\": {\\\n                  \"name\": \"Pablo Morales\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n              }\\\n            ],\\\n            \"messages\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"context\": {\\\n                  \"from\": \"15550783881\",\\\n                  \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBJBM0Y4RUU0RUNFQkFDMjYzQUMA\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"from\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgASGBQzQThBREYwNzc2RDc2QjA1QTIwMgA=\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"1714510003\",\\\n                \"type\": \"interactive\",\\\n                \"interactive\": {\\\n                  \"type\": \"button_reply\",\\\n                  \"button_reply\": {\\\n                    \"id\": \"change-button\",\\\n                    \"title\": \"Change\"\\\n                  }\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive Reply Buttons Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n\n[Sending Interactive Reply Buttons Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#sending-interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-response)\n\n[Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#webhooks)\n\n[Example Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages#example-webhook)\n\n* * [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components)\n\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Two-Step Verification](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#two-step-verification)\n\n[Updating PIN](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#updating-pin)\n\n[See Also](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#see-also)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Two-Step Verification\n\nYou are required to set up two-step verification for your phone number, as this provides an extra layer of security to the business accounts. To set it up, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID` and attach the parameters below. There is no endpoint to disable two-step verification.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_management` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `pin` | **Required.**<br>A 6-digit PIN you wish to use for two-step verification. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\"pin\" : \"6_DIGIT_PIN\"}'\n```\n\nSample response:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\nAll API calls require authentication with access tokens.\n\nDevelopers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.\n\nSolution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` and `whatsapp_business_management` permissions. See [System User Access Tokens](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#system-user-access-tokens) for information.\n\n## Updating PIN\n\nIf you forget or misplace your PIN, you can update it by following these steps in WhatsApp Manager:\n\n1. Go to [settings](https://business.facebook.com/settings/), log into your Facebook Business, and click the business you are using to manage your WABA (WhatsApp Business Account).\n2. In the settings screen, click **WhatApp Accounts** and find the WABA you want to update the PIN for. Click on the WABA and a panel with its respective info will come up on the right-side of the page.\n3. In the WABA info panel, click **Settings**.\n4. In the new tab, click **WhatsApp Manager**.\n5. In WhatsApp Manager, find your phone number and click **Settings**.\n6. Click **Two-step verification**.\n7. In the Two-step verification tab, click **Change PIN**.\n8. You will be prompted to enter a new PIN and confirm it. You have now successfully updated your PIN.\n\n## See Also\n\n- [Resetting Your Verification Code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/phone-number#resetting-verification-code-in-whatsapp-manager)\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Two-Step Verification](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#two-step-verification)\n\n[Updating PIN](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#updating-pin)\n\n[See Also](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification#see-also)\n\n* * Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Solutions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/multi-partner-solutions)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n\n\n- [Video](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages)\n- [Read Receipts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)\n\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive List Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#interactive-list-messages)\n\n[Sending Interactive List Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#sending-interactive-list-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#example-response)\n\n[Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#webhooks)\n\n# Interactive List Messages\n\nInteractive list messages allow you to present WhatsApp users with a list of options to choose from (options are defined as rows in the request payload):\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/439906651_815131396632137_2393939757123941379_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=dWspNPBxqh8Q7kNvwE2hJK_&_nc_oc=Adl4KTUYI6Q1E6aHvDdb4YgGHciSNRvdEv3rcBRRFPZFe1syd0RzxSArBlBWgdL1NnM&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=t5kfd52BpAL9tvzRB0bsrg&oh=00_AYH0K4XvA9d0PuQxTb9vVXxA4fVmPlLv7mv_0BU1bdfzAw&oe=680AF0D1)\n\nWhen a user taps the button in the message, it displays a modal that lists the options available:\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440772174_1215031642793437_4263879536705453309_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=MY63-AZ1Ah0Q7kNvwFt-dFS&_nc_oc=AdlNDaIb03pRwzd6jyqZpHSxBcjORs6g3bgDgOYwSZSHDFp30m4SjKK2jX6zrSDxF_4&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=t5kfd52BpAL9tvzRB0bsrg&oh=00_AYGxOXhO8qAkok0Dj0u8FtkTHdG67lgKCgZjf0lN2358tA&oe=680B1243)\n\nUsers can then choose one option and their selection will be sent as a reply:\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440751989_956441365805448_2344471884869029846_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=wjmrKqzMh2wQ7kNvwHjz_o5&_nc_oc=AdkV_r3u5RL23bPX-mPPpKoGyLyhRL9lItZrWk37TGjwNnu5uDE95URUnlQl9WIxNLw&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=t5kfd52BpAL9tvzRB0bsrg&oh=00_AYGUj1dYpaA-baggLPWdySA0wgokoiDb65KwDhriRlZP2Q&oe=680AF2D3)\n\nThis triggers a webhook, which identifies the option selected by the user.\n\nInteractive list messages support up to 10 sections, with up to 10 rows for all section combined, and can include an optional header and footer.\n\n## Sending Interactive List Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send an interactive list message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"list\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": \"<MESSAGE_HEADER_TEXT\"\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"<MESSAGE_BODY_TEXT>\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"<MESSAGE_FOOTER_TEXT>\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"sections\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"title\": \"<SECTION_TITLE_TEXT>\",\\\n          \"rows\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"<ROW_ID>\",\\\n              \"title\": \"<ROW_TITLE_TEXT>\",\\\n              \"description\": \"<ROW_DESCRIPTION_TEXT>\"\\\n            }\\\n            /* Additional rows would go here*/\\\n          ]\\\n        }\\\n        /* Additional sections would go here */\\\n      ],\n      \"button\": \"<BUTTON_TEXT>\",\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUTTON_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Button label text. When tapped, reveals rows (options the WhatsApp user can tap). Supports a single button.<br>Maximum 20 characters. | `Shipping Options` |\n| `<MESSAGE_BODY_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Message body text. Supports URLs.<br>Maximum 4096 characters. | `Which shipping option do you prefer?` |\n| `<MESSAGE_FOOTER_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Message footer text.<br>Maximum 60 characters. | `Lucky Shrub: Your gateway to succulents™` |\n| `<MESSAGE_HEADER_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>The `header` object is optional. Supports `text` header type only.<br>Maximum 60 characters. | `Choose Shipping Option` |\n| `<ROW_DESCRIPTION_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Row description.<br>Maximum 72 characters. | `Next Day to 2 Days` |\n| `<ROW_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Arbitrary string identifying the row. This ID will be included in the webhook payload if the user submits the selection.<br>At least one row is required. Supports up to 10 rows.<br>Maximum 200 characters. | `priority_express` |\n| `<ROW_TITLE_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Row title. At least 1 row is required. Supports up to 10 rows.<br>Maximum 24 characters. | `Priority Mail Express` |\n| `<SECTION_TITLE_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Section title text. At least 1 section is required. Supports up to 10 sections.<br>Maximum 24 characters. | `I want it ASAP!` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send an interactive list message with a header, body, footer, and two sections containing two rows each.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"list\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": \"Choose Shipping Option\"\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"Which shipping option do you prefer?\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"Lucky Shrub: Your gateway to succulents™\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"button\": \"Shipping Options\",\n      \"sections\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"title\": \"I want it ASAP!\",\\\n          \"rows\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"priority_express\",\\\n              \"title\": \"Priority Mail Express\",\\\n              \"description\": \"Next Day to 2 Days\"\\\n            },\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"priority_mail\",\\\n              \"title\": \"Priority Mail\",\\\n              \"description\": \"1–3 Days\"\\\n            }\\\n          ]\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"title\": \"I can wait a bit\",\\\n          \"rows\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"usps_ground_advantage\",\\\n              \"title\": \"USPS Ground Advantage\",\\\n              \"description\": \"2–5 Days\"\\\n            },\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"media_mail\",\\\n              \"title\": \"Media Mail\",\\\n              \"description\": \"2–8 Days\"\\\n            }\\\n          ]\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n## Webhooks\n\nWhen a WhatsApp user selects an option and sends their message, a **messages** webhook is triggered identifying the ID ( `id`) of the option they chose.\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"102290129340398\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"15550783881\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"106540352242922\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"contacts\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"profile\": {\\\n                  \"name\": \"Pablo Morales\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n              }\\\n            ],\\\n            \"messages\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"context\": {\\\n                  \"from\": \"15550783881\",\\\n                  \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBIwMjg0RkMxOEMyMkNEQUFFRDgA\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"from\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgASGBQzQTZDMzFGRUFBQjlDMzIzMzlEQwA=\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"1712595443\",\\\n                \"type\": \"interactive\",\\\n                \"interactive\": {\\\n                  \"type\": \"list_reply\",\\\n                  \"list_reply\": {\\\n                    \"id\": \"priority_express\",\\\n                    \"title\": \"Priority Mail Express\",\\\n                    \"description\": \"Next Day to 2 Days\"\\\n                  }\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive List Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#interactive-list-messages)\n\n[Sending Interactive List Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#sending-interactive-list-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#example-response)\n\n[Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages#webhooks)\n\n* [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Set Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#set-commerce-settings)\n\n[Requirements](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#requirements)\n\n[Get Cart](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#enable-disable-cart)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response)\n\n[Enable/Disable Catalog](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#enable-disable-catalog)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax-2)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters-2)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request-2)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response-2)\n\n[Get Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#get-commerce-settings)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax-3)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters-3)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request-3)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response-3)\n\n# Set Commerce Settings\n\nYou can enable or disable the shopping cart and the product catalog on a per-business phone number basis. By default, the shopping cart is enabled and the storefront icon is hidden for all business phone numbers associated with a WhatsApp Business Account.\n\n## Requirements\n\n- A [System User access token](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#system-user-access-tokens) or [User access token](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#user-access-tokens).\n- The [whatsapp\\_business\\_management](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/permissions/reference/whatsapp_business_management) permission.\n- If using a System User access token, the system user must be [granted full control](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#whatsapp-business-account-control) over the WhatsApp Business Account.\n- Businesses based in India must [comply with all online selling laws](https://www.facebook.com/help/1104628230079278).\n\n## Get Business Phone Numbers\n\nUse the [WhatsApp Business Account > Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers) endpoint to get a list of all business phone numbers associated with a WhatsApp Business Account.\n\n## Enable/Disable Cart\n\nUse the [Business Phone Number > WhatsApp Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/whatsapp_commerce_settings) endpoint to enable or disable the shopping cart for a specific business phone number.\n\nWhen enabled, cart-related buttons appear in the conversation, catalog, and product details views:\n\n![Three WhatsApp messenger screenshots with callout of various cart UI components displayed](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/328949237_5803630196351065_8296552831639991419_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=vTqAFYKejMwQ7kNvwFE1eL1&_nc_oc=Adl3JB_prY4ycqKxqaUPX_YghPskIpzKAjzxyiPaO0e_rjKviGrUawhjWkP87WQv0ho&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=NWkx8V_sOQupps3aQaHYhw&oh=00_AYE9IihNX0xLQuU-qi3gaM6-bp3dGqk69LjF-mVUtjAw4A&oe=680ADEEA)\n\nWhen the cart is disabled, customers can see products and their details, but all cart related buttons will not appear in any view.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/whatsapp_commerce_settings\n  ?is_cart_enabled=<IS_CART_ENABLED>\n```\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Sample Value | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | `106850078877666` | Business phone number ID. |\n| `<IS_CART_ENABLED>` | `true` | Boolean. Set to `true` to enable cart or `false` to disable it. Default value is `true`. |\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X POST 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106850078877666/whatsapp_commerce_settings?is_cart_enabled=true' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n## Enable/Disable Catalog\n\nUse the [Business Phone Number > WhatsApp Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/whatsapp_commerce_settings) endpoint to enable or disable the product catalog for a specific business phone number.\n\nWhen enabled, the catalog storefront icon and catalog-related buttons appear in conversation and business profile views:\n\n![Two WhatsApp messenger screenshots with callout of various catalog UI components displayed](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/326277989_545597647520632_2472972569888952494_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=qL6Qyn1dFcUQ7kNvwErGvv0&_nc_oc=Adkv9_rTB1WC1B_0NOcphtWVw5yM9aQg4VreNospZryEOz8O19kUgyV7Zr0Sp5TzSS8&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=NWkx8V_sOQupps3aQaHYhw&oh=00_AYEO8ZUg8xXdsATes0CB3wII4n9WjuVX7An_nWSu0lAHVA&oe=680AFE2B)\n\nWhen the catalog is disabled, the storefront icon and catalog-related buttons will not appear in any views and the catalog preview with thumbnails will not appear in the business profile view.\n\nIf you disable the catalog, wa.me links to your catalog, as well as the **View catalog** button that appears when you send your catalog link in a message will display an **Invalid catalog link** warning when tapped.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/whatsapp_commerce_settings\n  ?is_catalog_visible=<IS_CATALOG_VISIBLE>\n```\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Sample Value | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | `106850078877666` | Business phone number ID. |\n| `<IS_CATALOG_VISIBLE>` | `true` | Boolean. Set to `true` to show catalog storefront icon or `false` to hide it. Default value is `false`. |\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X POST 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106850078877666/whatsapp_commerce_settings?is_catalog_visible=true' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n## Get Commerce Settings\n\nUse the [Business Phone Number > WhatsApp Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/whatsapp_commerce_settings) endpoint to get an individual business phone number's commerce settings.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nGET /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/whatsapp_commerce_settings\n```\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Sample Value | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>` | `106850078877666` | Business phone number ID. |\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X GET 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106850078877666/whatsapp_commerce_settings' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"data\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"is_cart_enabled\": true,\\\n      \"is_catalog_visible\": true,\\\n      \"id\": \"727705352028726\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Set Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#set-commerce-settings)\n\n[Requirements](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#requirements)\n\n[Get Business Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#get-business-phone-numbers)\n\n[Enable/Disable Cart](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#enable-disable-cart)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response)\n\n[Enable/Disable Catalog](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#enable-disable-catalog)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax-2)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters-2)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request-2)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response-2)\n\n[Get Commerce Settings](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#get-commerce-settings)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#request-syntax-3)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#parameters-3)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-request-3)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/set-commerce-settings#sample-response-3)\n\n* * [![Follow us on Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#phone-numbers)\n\n[Verify Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#verify)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#parameters)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#example)\n\n[WhatsApp Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#post-body)\n\n[Example Enable Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#example-incoming-message-webhook)\n\n[Example Delivery Status Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#example-failed-delivery-status-webhook)\n\n[Getting Throughput Level](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#getting-throughput-level)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Phone Numbers\n\nThis guide specifies how you can verify your phone number and its required formatting for the Cloud API.\n\nThere is a criteria for what kind of phone numbers you can add to your WhatsApp Business Account (WABA). Please see [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/overview/phone-number) for further information.\n\nSome API calls listed require you to know your phone number’s ID. Refer to [Get All Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/phone-numbers#all-phone-numbers) on how to get the phone numbers associated with your WABA. The API call response includes IDs for each of the phone numbers connected to your WhatsApp Business Account. Save the ID for the phone you want to use with any `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID` calls.\n\n## Verify Phone Numbers\n\nYou need to verify the phone number you want to use to send messages to your customers. Phone numbers must be verified using a code sent via an SMS/voice call. The verification process can be done via Graph API calls specified below.\n\nTo verify a phone number using Graph API, make a `POST` request to `PHONE_NUMBER_ID/request_code`. In your call, include your chosen verification method and language.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/request_code`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Authenticate yourself with a system user access token.<br>If you are requesting the code on behalf of another business, the access token needs to have Advanced Access to the `whatsapp_business_management` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description _(Click the arrow in the left column for supported options.)_ |\n| --- | --- |\n| `code_method`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>Chosen method for verification. |\n| Supported Options | - `SMS`<br>- `VOICE` |\n| `language`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>The language's two-character [language code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages/message-templates#supported-languages-) code. For example: `\"en\"`. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n  'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/request_code' \\\n  -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n  -F 'code_method=SMS' \\\n  -F 'language=en'\n```\n\nAfter the API call, you will receive your verification code via the method you selected. To finish the verification process, include your code in a `POST` request to `PHONE_NUMBER_ID/verify_code`.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/verify_code`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Authenticate yourself with a system user access token.<br>If you are requesting the code on behalf of another business, the access token needs to have Advanced Access to the `whatsapp_business_management` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `code`<br> _numeric string_ | **Required.**<br>The code you received after calling `FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/request_code`. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n  'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/verify_code' \\\n  -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n  -F 'code=000000'\n```\n\nA successful response looks like this:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n## WhatsApp User Phone Number Formats\n\nPlus signs ( `+`), hyphens ( `-`), parenthesis ( `(`, `)`), and spaces are supported in send message requests.\n\nWe highly recommend that you include both the plus sign and country calling code when sending a message to a customer. If the plus sign is omitted, your business phone number's country calling code is prepended to the customer's phone number. This can result in undelivered or misdelivered messages.\n\nFor example, if your business is in India (country calling code `91`) and you send a message to the following customer phone number in various formats:\n\n| Number In Send Message Request | Number Message Delivered To | Outcome |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `+16315551234` | `+16315551234` | Correct number |\n| `+1 (631) 555-1234` | `+16315551234` | Correct number |\n| `(631) 555-1234` | `+916315551234` | Potentially wrong number |\n| `1 (631) 555-1234` | `+9116315551234` | Potentially wrong number |\n\n## Identity Change Check\n\nYou may want us to verify a customer's identity before we deliver your message to them. You can have us do this by enabling the identity change check setting on your business phone number.\n\nIf a customer performs an action in WhatsApp that we consider to be an identity change, we generate a new identity hash for the user. You can get this hash anytime you message the customer by enabling the identity change check setting on your business phone number. Once enabled, anytime the customer messages you, or you message the customer without an identity hash, we will include their hash in any incoming message webhooks or delivery status webhooks. You can then capture and store this hash for future use.\n\nTo use the hash, include it in a send message request. We will compare the hash in the request to the customer's current hash. If the hashes match, the message will be delivered. If there is a mismatch, it means the customer has changed their identity since you last messaged them and we will not deliver the message. Instead, we will send you a message status webhook containing error code `137000`, notifying you of the failure and mismatch.\n\nWhen you receive a mismatched hash webhook, assume the customer's phone number can no longer be trusted. To reestablish trust, verify the customer's identity again using other, non-WhatsApp channels. Once you have reestablished trust, resend the failed message to the new identity (if any), without a hash. Then store the customer's new hash included in the message status delivery webhook.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\nSend a POST request to the **WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Settings** endpoint to enable or disable the identity change check setting.\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER>/settings\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"user_identity_change\" : {\n    \"enable_identity_key_check\": <ENABLE_IDENTITY_KEY_CHECK>\n}\n```\n\nSet `<ENABLE_IDENTITY_KEY_CHECK>` to `true` to enable identity check, or `false` to disable it.\n\n### Example Enable Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106850078877666/settings' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"user_identity_change\": {\n    \"enable_identity_key_check\": true\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Example Enable Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n### Example Send Message With Check\n\nThis example message would only be delivered if the `recipient_identity_key_hash` hash value matches the customer's current hash.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106850078877666/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n    \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n    \"recipient_identity_key_hash\": \"DF2lS5v2W6x=\",\n    \"type\": \"text\",\n    \"text\": {\n        \"preview_url\": false,\n        \"body\": \"Your latest statement is attached. See... \"\n    }\n}'\n```\n\n### Example Incoming Message Webhook\n\nIn incoming message webhooks, the customer's hash is assigned to the `identity_key_hash` property.\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"102290129340398\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"15550051310\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"106540352242922\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"contacts\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"profile\": {\\\n                  \"name\": \"Pablo Morales\"\\\n                },\\\n                \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"identity_key_hash\": \"DF2lS5v2W6x=\"\\\n              }\\\n            ],\\\n            \"messages\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"from\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgASGBQzQUMyNTA4M0VGN0Q4RjdDNDVCMAA=\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"1686591695\",\\\n                \"text\": {\\\n                  \"body\": \"Your latest statement is attached. See... \"\\\n                },\\\n                \"type\": \"text\"\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n### Example Delivery Status Webhook\n\nIn delivery status webhooks, the customer's hash is assigned to the `recipient_identity_key_hash` property.\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"102290129340398\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"15550051310\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"106540352242922\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"statuses\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBJGODlDQjZBNjUxMUQ5NEU0MEUA\",\\\n                \"status\": \"delivered\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"1686591922\",\\\n                \"recipient_id\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"recipient_identity_key_hash\": \"DF2lS5v2W6x=\",\\\n                \"conversation\": {\\\n                  \"id\": \"6c84493f3de086c7c68d5a39248f72c0\",\\\n                  \"origin\": {\\\n                    \"type\": \"service\"\\\n                  }\\\n                },\\\n                \"pricing\": {\\\n                  \"billable\": true,\\\n                  \"pricing_model\": \"CBP\",\\\n                  \"category\": \"service\"\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n### Example Failed Delivery Status Webhook\n\nIn delivery status webhooks, the customer's hash is assigned to the `recipient_identity_key_hash` property.\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"102290129340398\",\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n            \"metadata\": {\\\n              \"display_phone_number\": \"15550051310\",\\\n              \"phone_number_id\": \"106540352242922\"\\\n            },\\\n            \"statuses\": [\\\n              {\\\n                \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBJDQzA0OEU4OTdEQUE5REVCQTgA\",\\\n                \"status\": \"failed\",\\\n                \"timestamp\": \"1686594665\",\\\n                \"recipient_id\": \"16505551234\",\\\n                \"errors\": [\\\n                  {\\\n                    \"code\": 137000,\\\n                    \"title\": \"Confirm the correct Recipient Identity Key Hash or send without any identity key hash\"\\\n                  }\\\n                ]\\\n              }\\\n            ]\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n## Getting Throughput Level\n\nUse the [WhatsApp Business Phone Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/#Reading) endpoint to get a phone number's current [throughput level](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview#throughput):\n\n```\nGET /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>?fields=throughput\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Phone [Tools](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/) [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/support/)\n\n[Log Encryption](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components)\n\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Flows Encryption](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#flows-encryption)\n\n[Prerequisites](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#prerequisites)\n\n[Generating a 2048-bit RSA Key Pair](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#gen)\n\n[Set Business Public Key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#set-business-public-key)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#parameters)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#example)\n\n[Get Business Public Key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#get-business-public-key)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#parameters-2)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#example-2)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118&transcode_extension=webp)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Flows Encryption\n\nThis guide specifies how to set and get the business public key for the WhatsApp Flows user experience. Businesses will need to generate a 2048-bit RSA key pair and share a business public key to establish an encrypted GraphQL-powered data exchange channel between them and the WhatsApp consumer client.\n\n## Prerequisites\n\nThe phone number must be [successfully registered](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#register), and the business must have [generated a 2048-bit RSA Key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#gen) as described below.\n\n### Generating a 2048-bit RSA Key Pair\n\nGenerate a public and private RSA key pair by typing in the following command:\n\n```\nopenssl genrsa -des3 -out private.pem 2048\n```\n\nThis generates 2048-bit RSA key pair encrypted with a password you provided and is written to a file.\n\nNext, you need to export the RSA Public Key to a file:\n\n```\nopenssl rsa -in private.pem -outform PEM -pubout -out public.pem\n```\n\nYou can then use it, for example, on your web server to encrypt content such that it can only be read with the private key.\n\n#### Reusing 2048-bit RSA Key Pairs Option\n\nYou could also re-use an existing private/public key pair by extracting a public key from existing certificate:\n\n```\nopenssl x509 -pubkey -noout -in private.pem  > public.pem\n```\n\n## Set Business Public Key\n\nTo set a business public key using Graph API, make a `POST` request to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption`.\nIn your call, include the 2048-bit RSA key you generated. If you have multiple phone numbers linked to a WABA, this API must be called to sign the business public key for each phone number.\n\nIn [Postman](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.postman.com%2F&h=AT3v6WyhA0Dig5ZJYMcnZbVuvMndxWIgEKmJlzbwm7uSPUxicKMpWM6aJTwN65g6FGQfWQvkkjooMNQmBPeZuaiHAKtKPzQrGEb_1URIcWL_Mtx994Ma9Fnt52UxO6U9ggS5SJD0gxI4XA), when inputting the business public key as a parameter in the **Body**, select **x-www-form-urlencoded.**\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption` | Authenticate yourself with a system user access token and you must have the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission.<br>If you are requesting the code on behalf of another business, the access token needs to have Advanced Access to the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `business_public_key`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>2048-bit RSA business public key generated. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n  'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption' \\\n  -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n  -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \\\n  --data-urlencode 'business_public_key=BUSINESS_PUBLIC_KEY'\n```\n\nFor example:\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n  'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption' \\\n  -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n  -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \\\n  --data-urlencode 'business_public_key=-----BEGIN PUBLIC KEY-----\nAAA\nBBB\nCCC\nDDD\nEEE\nFFF\nGGG\n-----END PUBLIC KEY-----'\n```\n\nA successful request returns HTTP status code `200` and the payload:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\nPlease see [Error and Status Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes) if you encounter any errors.\n\n## Get Business Public Key\n\nThe phone number must be [successfully registered](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration#register), and the business must have [generated a 2048-bit RSA key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#gen).\n\nTo get a business public key using Graph API, make a `GET` request to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption`.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption` | Authenticate yourself with a system user access token and you must have the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission.<br>If you are requesting the code on behalf of another business, the access token needs to have Advanced Access to the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `business_public_key`<br> _string_ | Stored 2048-bit RSA business public key. |\n| `business_public_key_signature_status`<br> _string_ | Status of stored 2048-bit RSA business public key. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X GET \\\n  'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/whatsapp_business_encryption' \\\n  -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN'\n```\n\nA successful response looks like this:\n\n```\n{\n  \"business_public_key\": \"<2048_bit_RSA_key>\"\n  \"business_public_key_signature_status\": VALID | MISMATCH\n}\n```\n\nPlease see [Error and Status Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes) if you encounter any errors.\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Flows Encryption](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#flows-encryption)\n\n[Prerequisites](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#prerequisites)\n\n[Generating a 2048-bit RSA Key Pair](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#gen)\n\n[Set Business Public Key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#set-business-public-key)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#parameters)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#example)\n\n[Get Business Public Key](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#get-business-public-key)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#parameters-2)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption#example-2)\n\n* Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#example-request)\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwE8Bdf0&_nc_oc=AdmRD27FHM22AM4COedBwWonp4bpV7D0MaJ2BDxsAw8bLIdcKkzbKfCxNIKTEOXwtag&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=fDZEi4iD4GVgPn7WdQU5mA&oh=00_AYHrxvvQhF-TpDiXOsvsS4HPsEh48ftG3QAFERBAbOPbbQ&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Sending Single-Product Template Messages\n\nThis document explains how to send an approved [single-product message (SPM) template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/spm-templates) to a WhatsApp user.\n\n## Request Syntax\n\nUse the [**POST /<BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages**](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint to send an SPM template message.\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n## Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"<TEMPLATE_NAME>\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"policy\": \"deterministic\",\n      \"code\": \"<TEMPLATE_LANGUAGE>\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"product\",\\\n            \"product\": {\\\n              \"product_retailer_id\": \"<PRODUCT_ID>\",\\\n              \"catalog_id\": \"<CATALOG_ID>\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          <CARD_BODY_VARIABLE>,\\\n          <CARD_BODY_VARIABLE>\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<CARD_BODY_VARIABLE>`<br>_Object_ | **Required if the template card body text uses variables, otherwise omit.**<br>Object describing a card body variable. If the template uses multiple variables, you must define an object for each variable.<br>Supports `text`, `currency`, and `date_time` types. See [Messages Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#parameter-object).<br>There is no maximum character limit on this value, but does count against the card body text limit of 160 characters. | ```<br>{<br>  \"type\":\"text\",<br>  \"text\": \"25OFF\"<br>}<br>``` |\n| `<CATALOG_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>ID of [connected ecommerce catalog](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/158662536425974) containing the product. | `194836987003835` |\n| `<PRODUCT_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Product ID. | `nqryix03ez` |\n| `<TEMPLATE_LANGUAGE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Template [language and locale code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/supported-languages). | `en_US` |\n| `<TEMPLATE_NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Template name.<br>Maximum 512 characters. | `abandoned_cart_offer` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Example Request\n\nThis example sends an approved template named \"abandoned\\_cart\\_offer\" which injects two text variables (an offer code and the percentage discounted) into the template body, and which includes a footer. The product image is pulled from the catalog and displayed in the message header.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/179776755229976/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"abandoned_cart_offer\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"policy\": \"deterministic\",\n      \"code\": \"en_US\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"product\",\\\n            \"product\": {\\\n              \"product_retailer_id\": \"nqryix03ez\",\\\n              \"catalog_id\": \"194836987003835\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"25OFF\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"25%\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending Single-Product Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#sending-single-product-template-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages#example-request)\n\n* * us on Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Cloud API Guides\n\nThese guides walk through various tasks you can accomplish with the WhatsApp Business Cloud API.\n\n|     |     |\n| --- | --- |\n| ### [Send Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)<br>Learn how to use the `/messages` endpoint to send text, media, location, contact, and interactive messages. | ### [Send Message Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates)<br>Send specific message formats to your customers, including reminders, shipping information, and payment updates. |\n| ### [Mark Messages as Read](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)<br>Use the `/messages` node to change the status of incoming messages to `read`. | ### [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)<br>Learn how to offer your products and services in WhatsApp messages. |\n| ### [Migrate From On-Premises API to Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud)<br>Learn how to migrate from On-Premises API to Cloud API. | ### [Create a Sample App Endpoint for Webhooks Testing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/sample-app-endpoints\\#cloud-api-sample-app-endpoint)<br>Use Glitch to create a sample app with an endpoint to test your webhooks. |\n| ### [Cloud API Monitoring for Outbound Load Testing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/load-testing)<br>Shows you how to use Cloud API monitoring tools for outbound load testing. | ### [Set up the WhatsApp Echo Bot](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-whatsapp-echo-bot)<br>Create a sample webhook server application that echoes back whatever you send to it. |\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud
