Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#interactive-object)\n\n[Location Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#location-object)\n\n[Media Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object)\n\n[Template Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object)\n\n[Text Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#text-object)\n\n[Reaction Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#reaction-object)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#overview)\n\n[Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#guides)\n\n[Examples](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#examples)\n\n[Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#text-messages)\n\n[Reaction Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#reaction-messages)\n\n[Media Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-messages)\n\n[Location Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#location-messages)\n\n[Contact Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#contact-messages)\n\n[Interactive Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#interactive-messages)\n\n[Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-messages)\n\n[Reply To Message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#reply-to-message)\n\n[Successful Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#successful-response)\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwEE3H1S&_nc_oc=AdleniSB_Aro8_X1wNykqnrQD0sGV8wUPX1AYAXnCJwxxGnoLm2_udvbBR_-XsL36E4&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=dkqkQJvDtCyo9vGbNvNQzQ&oh=00_AYF884QbNQaiz-MfGgJQnt8jPYZvKIjcIpGz-q-7KrNFWQ&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Messages\n\nUse the `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` endpoint to send text, media, contacts, location, and interactive messages, as well as message templates to your customers. [Learn more about the messages you can send](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/overview/messages).\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Developers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.<br>Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\nMessages are identified by a unique ID (WAMID). You can track message status in the Webhooks through its WAMID. You could also mark an incoming message as read through messages endpoint. This WAMID can have a maximum length of up to 128 characters.\n\nWith the Cloud API, there is no longer a way to explicitly check if a phone number has a WhatsApp ID. To send someone a message using the Cloud API, just send it directly to the customer's phone number —after they have [opted-in](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/overview/getting-opt-in). See [Reference, Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#examples) for examples.\n\n## Message Object\n\nTo send a message, you must first assemble a message object with the content you want to send. These are the parameters used in a `message` object:\n\n| Name | Description _(Click the arrow in the left column for supported options.)_ |\n| --- | --- |\n| `audio`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=audio`.**<br>A [`media` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object) containing audio. |\n| `biz_opaque_callback_data`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>An arbitrary string, useful for tracking.<br>For example, you could pass the message template ID in this field to track your customer's journey starting from the first message you send. You could then track the ROI of different message template types to determine the most effective one.<br>Any app subscribed to the `messages` webhook field on the WhatsApp Business Account can get this string, as it is included in [`statuses` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components#statuses-object) within webhook payloads.<br>Cloud API does not process this field, it just returns it as part of sent/delivered/read message webhooks.<br>Maximum 512 characters.<br>_[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api) only_. |\n| `contacts`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=contacts`.**<br>A [`contacts` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#contacts-object). |\n| `context`<br> _object_ | **Required if [replying to](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#replies) any message in the conversation.**<br>An object containing the ID of a previous message you are replying to. For example:<br>`{\"message_id\":\"MESSAGE_ID\"}`<br>_[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api) only_. |\n| `document`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=document`.**<br>A [`media` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object) containing a document. |\n| `hsm`<br> _object_ | Contains an [`hsm` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages#hsm-object). This option was deprecated with `v2.39` of the On-Premises API. Use the `template` object instead.<br>_[On-Premises API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises) only_. |\n| `image`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=image`.**<br>A [`media` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object) containing an image. |\n| `interactive`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=interactive`.**<br>An [`interactive` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#interactive-object). The components of each `interactive` object generally follow a consistent pattern: `header`, `body`, `footer`, and `action`. |\n| `location`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=location`.**<br>A [`location` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#location-object). |\n| `message_activity_sharing`<br> _boolean_ | **Optional**<br>Controls whether event activity is shared for each message. This parameter will override the WhatsApp Business Account level setting. **Values:** `false` , `true`.<br>_[MM Lite API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/marketing-messages-lite-api) only_. |\n| `messaging_product`<br> _string_ | **Required**<br>Messaging service used for the request. Use `\"whatsapp\"`.<br>_[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api) only_. |\n| `preview_url`<br> _boolean_ | **Required if `type=text`.**<br>Allows for URL previews in text messages — See the [Sending URLs in Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages/text#urls). This field is optional if not including a URL in your message. **Values:** `false` (default), `true`.<br>_[On-Premises API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises) only. Cloud API users can use the same functionality with the `preview_url` field inside a [text object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#text-object)_. |\n| `recipient_type`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>Currently, you can only send messages to individuals. Set this as `individual`.<br>Default: `individual` |\n| `status`<br> _string_ | A message's status. You can use this field to mark a message as `read`. See the following guides for information:<br>- Cloud API: [Mark Messages as Read](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)<br>- On-Premises API: [Mark Messages as Read](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/guides/mark-as-read) |\n| `sticker`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=sticker`.**<br>A [`media` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object) containing a sticker.<br>**Cloud API**: Static and animated third-party outbound stickers are supported in addition to all types of inbound stickers. A static sticker needs to be 512x512 pixels and cannot exceed 100 KB. An animated sticker must be 512x512 pixels and cannot exceed 500 KB.<br>**On-Premises API**: Only static third-party outbound stickers are supported in addition to all types of inbound stickers. A static sticker needs to be 512x512 pixels and cannot exceed 100 KB. Animated stickers are not supported. |\n| `template`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=template`.**<br>A [`template` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object). |\n| `text`<br> _object_ | **Required for text messages.**<br>A [`text` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#text-object). |\n| `to`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp ID or phone number of the customer you want to send a message to. See [Phone Number Formats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers#phone-number-formats).<br>If needed, On-Premises API users can get this number by calling the [`contacts` endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/contacts). |\n| `type`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>The type of message you want to send. If omitted, defaults to `text`. |\n\nThe following objects are nested inside the message object:\n\n- [Text object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#text-object)\n- [Media object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#media-object)\n- [Reaction object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#reaction-object)\n- [Template object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#template-object)\n- [Location object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#location-object)\n- [Contacts object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#contacts-object)\n- [Interactive object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#interactive-object)\n\n### Contacts Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `addresses`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>Full contact address(es) formatted as an `addresses` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`street` _string_ – **Optional.** Street number and name.<br>`city` _string_ – **Optional.** City name.<br>`state` _string_ – **Optional.** State abbreviation.<br>`zip` _string_ – **Optional.** ZIP code.<br>`country` _string_ – **Optional.** Full country name.<br>`country_code` _string_ – **Optional.** Two-letter country abbreviation.<br>`type` _string_ – **Optional.** Standard values are `HOME` and `WORK`. |\n| `birthday` | **Optional.**<br>`YYYY-MM-DD` formatted string. |\n| `emails`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>Contact email address(es) formatted as an `emails` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`email` _string_ – **Optional.** Email address.<br>`type` _string_ – **Optional.** Standard values are `HOME` and `WORK`. |\n| `name`<br> _object_ | **Required.**<br>Full contact name formatted as a `name` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`formatted_name` _string_ – **Required.** Full name, as it normally appears.<br>`first_name` _string_ – **Optional\\*.** First name.<br>`last_name` _string_ – **Optional\\*.** Last name.<br>`middle_name` _string_ – **Optional\\*.** Middle name.<br>`suffix` _string_ – **Optional\\*.** Name suffix.<br>`prefix` _string_ – **Optional\\*.** Name prefix.<br>\\*At least one of the optional parameters needs to be included along with the `formatted_name` parameter. |\n| `org`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>Contact organization information formatted as an `org` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`company` _string_ – **Optional.** Name of the contact's company.<br>`department` _string_ – **Optional.** Name of the contact's department.<br>`title` _string_ – **Optional.** Contact's business title. |\n| `phones`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>Contact phone number(s) formatted as a `phone` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`phone` _string_ – **Optional.** Automatically populated with the \\`wa\\_id\\` value as a formatted phone number.<br>`type` _string_ – **Optional.** Standard Values are `CELL`, `MAIN`, `IPHONE`, `HOME`, and `WORK`.<br>`wa_id` _string_ – **Optional.** WhatsApp ID. |\n| `urls`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>Contact URL(s) formatted as a `urls` object. The object can contain the following fields:<br>`url` _string_ – **Optional.** URL.<br>`type` _string_ – **Optional.** Standard values are `HOME` and `WORK`. |\n\n### Interactive Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `action`<br> _object_ | **Required.**<br>Action you want the user to perform after reading the message. |\n| `body`<br> _object_ | **Optional for type `product`. Required for other message types.**<br>An object with the body of the message.<br>The `body` object contains the following field:<br>`text` _string_ – **Required if body is present.** The content of the message. Emojis and markdown are supported. Maximum length: 1024 characters. |\n| `footer`<br> _object_ | **Optional.**<br>An object with the footer of the message.<br>The `footer` object contains the following field:<br>`text` _string_ – **Required if footer is present.** The footer content. Emojis, markdown, and links are supported. Maximum length: 60 characters. |\n| `header`<br> _object_ | **Required for type `product_list`. Optional for other types.**<br>Header content displayed on top of a message. You cannot set a header if your interactive object is of `product` type. See [`header` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#header-object) for more information. |\n| `type`<br> _object_ | **Required.**<br>The type of interactive message you want to send. Supported values:<br>- `button`: Use for Reply Buttons.<br>- `catalog_message`: Use for Catalog Messages.<br>- `list`: Use for List Messages.<br>- `product`: Use for Single-Product Messages.<br>- `product_list`: Use for Multi-Product Messages.<br>- `flow`: Use for Flows Messages. |\n\nThe following objects are nested inside the `interactive` object:\n\n- [Action object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#action-object)\n- [Body object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#body-object)\n- [Footer object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#footer-object)\n- [Header object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#header-object)\n- [Section object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#section-object)\n\n#### Action Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `button`<br> _string_ | **Required for List Messages.**<br>Button content. It cannot be an empty string and must be unique within the message. Emojis are supported, markdown is not.<br>Maximum length: 20 characters. |\n| `buttons`<br> _array of objects_ | **Required for Reply Buttons.**<br>A button object can contain the following parameters:<br>- `type`: only supported type is `reply` (for Reply Button)<br>- `title`: Button title. It cannot be an empty string and must be unique within the message. Emojis are supported, markdown is not. Maximum length: 20 characters.<br>- `id`: Unique identifier for your button. This ID is returned in the webhook when the button is clicked by the user. Maximum length: 256 characters.<br>You can have up to 3 buttons. You cannot have leading or trailing spaces when setting the ID. |\n| `catalog_id`<br> _string_ | **Required for Single Product Messages and Multi-Product Messages.**<br>Unique identifier of the Facebook catalog linked to your WhatsApp Business Account. This ID can be retrieved via the [Meta Commerce Manager](https://business.facebook.com/commerce/). |\n| `product_retailer_id`<br> _string_ | **Required for Single Product Messages and Multi-Product Messages.**<br>Unique identifier of the product in a catalog.<br>To get this ID go to [Meta Commerce Manager](https://business.facebook.com/commerce/) and select your Meta Business account. You will see a list of shops connected to your account. Click the shop you want to use. On the left-side panel, click **Catalog** \\> **Items**, and find the item you want to mention. The ID for that item is displayed under the item's name. |\n| `sections`<br> _array of objects_ | **Required for List Messages and Multi-Product Messages.**<br>Array of `section` objects. Minimum of 1, maximum of 10. See [`section` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#section-object). |\n| `flow_message_version`<br> _string_ | **Required for Flows Messages.**<br>Must be `3`. |\n| `flow_id`<br> _string_ | **Required for Flows Messages unless `flow_name` is set.**<br>Unique identifier of the Flow provided by WhatsApp.<br>Cannot be used with the `flow_name` parameter. Only one of these parameters is required. |\n| `flow_name`<br> _string_ | **Required for Flows Messages unless `flow_id` is set.**<br>The name of the Flow that you created. Changing the Flow name will require updating this parameter to match the new name.<br>Cannot be used with the `flow_id` parameter. Only one of these parameters is required. |\n| `flow_cta`<br> _string_ | **Required for Flows Messages.**<br>Text on the CTA button, eg. \"Signup\".<br>CTA text length is advised to be 30 characters or less (no emoji). |\n| `mode`<br> _string_ | **Optional for Flows Messages.**<br>The current mode of the Flow, either `draft` or `published`.<br>Default: `published` |\n| `flow_token`<br> _string_ | **Optional for Flows Messages.**<br>A token that is generated by the business to serve as an identifier.<br>Default: `unused` |\n| `flow_action`<br> _string_ | **Optional for Flows Messages.**<br>`navigate` or `data_exchange`. Use `navigate` to predefine the first screen as part of the message. Use `data_exchange` for advanced use-cases where the first screen is provided by [your endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/flows/guides/implementingyourflowendpoint).<br>Default: `navigate` |\n| `flow_action_payload`<br> _object_ | **Optional for Flows Messages.**<br>Optional only if `flow_action` is `navigate`. The object can contain the following parameters:<br>`screen` _string_ – **Optional.** The `id` of the first screen of the Flow. <br>Default: `FIRST_ENTRY_SCREEN`<br>`data` _object_ – **Optional.** The input data for the first screen of the Flow. Must be a non-empty object. |\n\n#### Header Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `document`<br> _object_ | **Required if `type` is set to `document`.**<br>Contains the media object for this document. |\n| `image`<br> _object_ | **Required if `type` is set to `image`.**<br>Contains the media object for this image. |\n| `text`<br> _string_ | **Required if `type` is set to `text`.**<br>Text for the header. Formatting allows emojis, but not markdown.<br>Maximum length: 60 characters. |\n| `sub_text`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>Text for the header. Formatting allows emojis, but not markdown.<br>Maximum length: 60 characters. |\n| `type`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>The header type you would like to use. Supported values:<br>- `text`: Used for List Messages, Reply Buttons, and Multi-Product Messages.<br>- `video`: Used for Reply Buttons.<br>- `image`: Used for Reply Buttons.<br>- `document`: Used for Reply Buttons. |\n| `video`<br> _object_ | **Required if `type` is set to `video`.**<br>Contains the media object for this video. |\n\n#### Section Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `product_items`<br> _array of objects_ | **Required for Multi-Product Messages.**<br>Array of `product` objects. There is a minimum of 1 product per section and a maximum of 30 products across all sections.<br>Each `product` object contains the following field:<br>- `product_retailer_id` _string_ – **Required for Multi-Product Messages.** Unique identifier of the product in a catalog. To get this ID, go to the [Meta Commerce Manager](https://business.facebook.com/commerce/), select your account and the shop you want to use. Then, click **Catalog** \\> **Items**, and find the item you want to mention. The ID for that item is displayed under the item's name. |\n| `rows`<br> _array of objects_ | **Required for List Messages.**<br>Contains a list of rows. You can have a total of 10 rows across your sections.<br>Each row must have a title (Maximum length: 24 characters) and an ID (Maximum length: 200 characters). You can add a description (Maximum length: 72 characters), but it is optional.<br>Example:<br>```<br>\"rows\": [<br>  {<br>   \"id\":\"unique-row-identifier-here\",<br>   \"title\": \"row-title-content-here\",<br>   \"description\": \"row-description-content-here\",           <br>   }<br>]<br>``` |\n| `title`<br> _string_ | **Required if the message has more than one section.**<br>Title of the section.<br>Maximum length: 24 characters. |\n\n### Location Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `latitude` | **Required.**<br>Location latitude in decimal degrees. |\n| `longitude` | **Required.**<br>Location longitude in decimal degrees. |\n| `name` | **Required.**<br>Name of the location. |\n| `address` | **Required.**<br>Address of the location. |\n\n### Media Object\n\nSee [Get Media ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#get-media-id) for information on how to get the ID of your media object. For information about supported media types for Cloud API, see [Supported Media Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types).\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `id`<br> _string_ | **Required when `type` is `audio`, `document`, `image`, `sticker`, or `video` and you are not using a link.**<br>The media object ID. Do not use this field when message `type` is set to `text`. |\n| `link`<br> _string_ | **Required when `type` is `audio`, `document`, `image`, `sticker`, or `video` and you are not using an uploaded media ID (i.e. you are hosting the media asset on your public server).**<br>The protocol and URL of the media to be sent. Use **only** with HTTP/HTTPS URLs.<br>Do not use this field when message `type` is set to `text`.<br>**Cloud API users only:**<br>- See [Media HTTP Caching](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#media-http-caching) if you would like us to cache the media asset for future messages.<br>- When we request the media asset from your server you must indicate the media's [MIME type](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fen-US%2Fdocs%2FGlossary%2FMIME_type&h=AT2Jgb2_teRpMXFF1XvCr0-WUKlL7mq2LST16usnO2PtAtKXE6BGa8FunrGVgFkd-snECJBoDPtlmthfw7qI2cz3wv_xSXRVPKHcXZZZi0M9sSVLHYNmrsyYDGxMyE-4qnT6LoskHg2mNw) by including the `Content-Type` HTTP header. For example: `Content-Type: video/mp4`. See [Supported Media Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types) for a list of supported media and their MIME types. |\n| `caption`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>Media asset caption. Do not use with `audio` or `sticker` media.<br>**On-Premises API users:**<br>- For v2.41.2 or newer, this field is is limited to 1024 characters.<br>- Captions are currently not supported for `document` media. |\n| `filename`<br> _string_ | **Optional.**<br>Describes the filename for the specific document. Use **only** with `document` media.<br>**The extension of the filename will specify what format the document is displayed as in WhatsApp.** |\n| `provider`<br> _string_ | **Optional. On-Premises API only.**<br>This path is optionally used with a `link` when the HTTP/HTTPS link is not directly accessible and requires additional configurations like a bearer token. For information on configuring providers, see the [Media Providers documentation](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/settings/media-providers). |\n\n### Template Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `name` | **Required.**<br>Name of the template. |\n| `language`<br> _object_ | **Required.**<br>Contains a `language` object. Specifies the language the template may be rendered in.<br>The `language` object can contain the following fields:<br>`policy` _string_ – **Required.** The language policy the message should follow. **The only supported option is `deterministic`.** See [Language Policy Options](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages/message-templates#language-policy-options).<br>`code` _string_ – **Required.** The code of the language or locale to use. Accepts both `language` and `language_locale` formats (e.g., `en` and `en_US`). For all codes, see [Supported Languages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages/message-templates#supported-languages). |\n| `components`<br> _array of objects_ | **Optional.**<br>Array of [`components` objects](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#components-object) containing the parameters of the message. |\n| `namespace` | **Optional.** Only used for [On-Premises API.](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises)<br>Namespace of the template. |\n\nThe following objects are nested inside the `template` object:\n\n- [Button object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#button-parameter-object)\n- [Components object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#components-object)\n- [Currency object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#currency-object)\n- [Date Time object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#date-time-object)\n- [Language object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#language-object)\n- [Parameter object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#parameter-object)\n\n#### Button Parameter Object\n\n| Name | Description _(Click the arrow in the left column for supported options.)_ |\n| --- | --- |\n| `type`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>Indicates the type of parameter for the button. |\n| Supported Options | - `\"payload\"`<br>- `\"text\"` |\n| `payload` | **Required for `quick_reply` buttons.**<br>Developer-defined payload that is returned when the button is clicked in addition to the display text on the button.<br>See [Callback from a Quick Reply Button Click](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks#received-callback-from-a-quick-reply-button-click) for an example. |\n| `text` | **Required for URL buttons.**<br>Developer-provided suffix that is appended to the predefined prefix URL in the template. |\n\n#### Components Object\n\n| Name | Description _(Click the arrow in the left column for supported options.)_ |\n| --- | --- |\n| `type`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>Describes the `component` type.<br>Example of a `components` object with an array of `parameters` object nested inside:<br>```<br> \"components\": [{<br>   \"type\": \"body\",<br>   \"parameters\": [{<br>                \"type\": \"text\",<br>                \"text\": \"name\"<br>            },<br>            {<br>            \"type\": \"text\",<br>            \"text\": \"Hi there\"<br>            }]<br>      }] <br>``` |\n| Supported Options | - `header`<br>- `body`<br>- `button`<br>For text-based templates, we only support the `type=body`. |\n| `sub_type`<br> _string_ | **Required when `type=button`. Not used for the other types.**<br>Type of button to create. |\n| Supported Options | - `quick_reply`: Refers to a previously created quick reply button that allows for the customer to return a predefined message.<br>- `url`: Refers to a previously created button that allows the customer to visit the URL generated by appending the `text` parameter to the predefined prefix URL in the template.<br>- `catalog`: Refers to a previously created catalog button that allows for the customer to return a full product catalog. |\n| `parameters`<br> _array of objects_ | **Required when `type=button`.**<br>Array of [`parameter` objects](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#parameter-object) with the content of the message.<br>For components of type=button, see the [`button` parameter object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#button-parameter-object). |\n| `index` | **Required when `type=button`. Not used for the other types.**<br>Position index of the button. You can have up to 10 buttons using index values of 0 to 9. |\n\n#### Currency Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `fallback_value` | **Required.**<br>Default text if localization fails. |\n| `code` | **Required.**<br>Currency code as defined in `ISO 4217`. |\n| `amount_1000` | **Required.**<br>Amount multiplied by 1000. |\n\n#### Date\\_Time Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `fallback_value` | **Required.**<br>Default text. For Cloud API, we always use the fallback value, and we do not attempt to localize using other optional fields. |\n\n#### Parameter Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `type`<br> _string_ | **Required.**<br>Describes the parameter type. Supported values:<br>- `currency`<br>- `date_time`<br>- `document`<br>- `image`<br>- `text`<br>- `video`<br>For text-based templates, the only supported parameter types are `currency`, `date_time`, and `text`. |\n| `text`<br> _string_ | **Required when `type=text`.**<br>The message’s text. Character limit varies based on the following included component type.<br>For the `header` component type:<br>- 60 characters<br>For the `body` component type:<br>- 1024 characters if other component types are included<br>- 32768 characters if `body` is the only component type included |\n| `currency`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=currency`.**<br>A [`currency` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#currency-object). |\n| `date_time`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=date_time`.**<br>A [`date_time` object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#date-time-object). |\n| `image`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=image`.**<br>A `media` object of type `image`. Captions not supported when used in a media template. |\n| `document`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=document`.**<br>A `media` object of type `document`. Only PDF documents are supported for media-based message templates. Captions not supported when used in a media template. |\n| `video`<br> _object_ | **Required when `type=video`.**<br>A `media` object of type `video`. Captions not supported when used in a media template. |\n\n### Text Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `body`<br> _string_ | **Required for text messages.**<br>The text of the text message which can contain URLs which begin with http:// or https:// and formatting. See available formatting options [here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages#formatting).<br>If you include URLs in your text and want to include a preview box in text messages ( `preview_url: true`), make sure the URL starts with `http://` or `https://` — `https://` URLs are preferred. You must include a hostname, since IP addresses will not be matched.<br>Maximum length: 4096 characters |\n| `preview_url`<br> _boolean_ | **Optional. Cloud API only.**<br>Set to `true` to have the WhatsApp Messenger and WhatsApp Business apps attempt to render a link preview of any URL in the `body` text string. URLs must begin with `http://` or `https://`. If multiple URLs are in the `body` text string, only the first URL will be rendered.<br>If `preview_url` is omitted, or if unable to retrieve a preview, a clickable link will be rendered instead.<br>On-Premises API users, use `preview_url` in the top-level message payload instead. See [Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/reference/messages#parameters). |\n\n### Reaction Object\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `message_id`<br> _string_ | **Required**.<br>The WhatsApp Message ID (wamid) of the message on which the reaction should appear. The reaction will not be sent if:<br>- The message is older than 30 days<br>- The message is a reaction message<br>- The message has been deleted<br>If the ID is of a message that has been deleted, the message will not be delivered. |\n| `emoji`<br> _string_ | **Required**.<br>Emoji to appear on the message.<br>- All emojis supported by Android and iOS devices are supported.<br>- Rendered-emojis are supported.<br>- If using emoji unicode values, values must be Java- or JavaScript-escape encoded.<br>- Only one emoji can be sent in a reaction message<br>- Use an empty string to remove a previously sent emoji. |\n\n### Overview\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=3107104822913932&version=1738785574)\n\n## Guides\n\nSee the following guides for full information on how to use the `/messages` endpoint to send messages:\n\n- [Send Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n- [Send Message Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n\n## Examples\n\n### Text Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '\n    {\n      \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n      \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n      \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": { // the text object\n        \"preview_url\": false,\n        \"body\": \"MESSAGE_CONTENT\"\n        }\n    }'\n```\n\n### Reaction Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"reaction\",\n  \"reaction\": {\n    \"message_id\": \"wamid.HBgLM...\",\n    \"emoji\": \"\\uD83D\\uDE00\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Media Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM-PHONE-NUMBER-ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE-NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"image\",\n  \"image\": {\n    \"id\" : \"MEDIA-OBJECT-ID\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Location Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"location\",\n  \"location\": {\n    \"longitude\": LONG_NUMBER,\n    \"latitude\": LAT_NUMBER,\n    \"name\": LOCATION_NAME,\n    \"address\": LOCATION_ADDRESS\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Contact Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"contacts\",\n  \"contacts\": [{\\\n      \"addresses\": [{\\\n          \"street\": \"STREET\",\\\n          \"city\": \"CITY\",\\\n          \"state\": \"STATE\",\\\n          \"zip\": \"ZIP\",\\\n          \"country\": \"COUNTRY\",\\\n          \"country_code\": \"COUNTRY_CODE\",\\\n          \"type\": \"HOME\"\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"street\": \"STREET\",\\\n          \"city\": \"CITY\",\\\n          \"state\": \"STATE\",\\\n          \"zip\": \"ZIP\",\\\n          \"country\": \"COUNTRY\",\\\n          \"country_code\": \"COUNTRY_CODE\",\\\n          \"type\": \"WORK\"\\\n        }],\\\n      \"birthday\": \"YEAR_MONTH_DAY\",\\\n      \"emails\": [{\\\n          \"email\": \"EMAIL\",\\\n          \"type\": \"WORK\"\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"email\": \"EMAIL\",\\\n          \"type\": \"HOME\"\\\n        }],\\\n      \"name\": {\\\n        \"formatted_name\": \"NAME\",\\\n        \"first_name\": \"FIRST_NAME\",\\\n        \"last_name\": \"LAST_NAME\",\\\n        \"middle_name\": \"MIDDLE_NAME\",\\\n        \"suffix\": \"SUFFIX\",\\\n        \"prefix\": \"PREFIX\"\\\n      },\\\n      \"org\": {\\\n        \"company\": \"COMPANY\",\\\n        \"department\": \"DEPARTMENT\",\\\n        \"title\": \"TITLE\"\\\n      },\\\n      \"phones\": [{\\\n          \"phone\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n          \"type\": \"HOME\"\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"phone\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n          \"type\": \"WORK\",\\\n          \"wa_id\": \"PHONE_OR_WA_ID\"\\\n        }],\\\n      \"urls\": [{\\\n          \"url\": \"URL\",\\\n          \"type\": \"WORK\"\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"url\": \"URL\",\\\n          \"type\": \"HOME\"\\\n        }]\\\n    }]\n}'\n```\n\n### Interactive Messages\n\n#### Single-Product Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n   \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n   \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n   \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n   \"type\": \"interactive\",\n   \"interactive\": {\n     \"type\": \"product\",\n     \"body\": {\n       \"text\": \"optional body text\"\n     },\n     \"footer\": {\n       \"text\": \"optional footer text\"\n     },\n     \"action\": {\n       \"catalog_id\": \"CATALOG_ID\",\n       \"product_retailer_id\": \"ID_TEST_ITEM_1\"\n     }\n   }\n }'\n```\n\n#### Multi-Product Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n   \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n   \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n   \"type\": \"interactive\",\n   \"interactive\": {\n     \"type\": \"product_list\",\n     \"header\":{\n       \"type\": \"text\",\n       \"text\": \"header-content\"\n     },\n     \"body\": {\n       \"text\": \"body-content\"\n     },\n     \"footer\": {\n       \"text\": \"footer-content\"\n     },\n     \"action\": {\n       \"catalog_id\": \"CATALOG_ID\",\n       \"sections\": [\\\n         {\\\n           \"title\": \"section-title\",\\\n           \"product_items\": [\\\n             { \"product_retailer_id\": \"product-SKU-in-catalog\" },\\\n             { \"product_retailer_id\": \"product-SKU-in-catalog\" },\\\n             ...\\\n           ]\\\n         },\\\n         {\\\n           \"title\": \"section-title\",\\\n           \"product_items\": [\\\n             { \"product_retailer_id\": \"product-SKU-in-catalog\" },\\\n             { \"product_retailer_id\": \"product-SKU-in-catalog\" },\\\n             ...\\\n           ]\\\n         }\\\n       ]\n     }\n   }\n }\n```\n\n#### Catalog Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\" : {\n    \"type\" : \"catalog_message\",\n    \"body\" : {\n      \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered to.\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"catalog_message\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n        \"thumbnail_product_retailer_id\": \"<Product-retailer-id>\"\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n#### Flows Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\" : {\n    \"type\": \"flow\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": \"Flow message header\"\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"Flow message body\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"Flow message footer\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"flow\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n        \"flow_message_version\": \"3\",\n        \"flow_id\": \"<FLOW_ID>\", // Or flow_name\n        \"flow_cta\": \"Book!\",\n       }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}'\n\n```\n\n#### List Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"list\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": \"HEADER_TEXT\"\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"BODY_TEXT\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"FOOTER_TEXT\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"button\": \"BUTTON_TEXT\",\n      \"sections\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"title\": \"SECTION_1_TITLE\",\\\n          \"rows\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_1_ID\",\\\n              \"title\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_1_TITLE\",\\\n              \"description\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_1_DESCRIPTION\"\\\n            },\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_2_ID\",\\\n              \"title\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_2_TITLE\",\\\n              \"description\": \"SECTION_1_ROW_2_DESCRIPTION\"\\\n            }\\\n          ]\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"title\": \"SECTION_2_TITLE\",\\\n          \"rows\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_1_ID\",\\\n              \"title\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_1_TITLE\",\\\n              \"description\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_1_DESCRIPTION\"\\\n            },\\\n            {\\\n              \"id\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_2_ID\",\\\n              \"title\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_2_TITLE\",\\\n              \"description\": \"SECTION_2_ROW_2_DESCRIPTION\"\\\n            }\\\n          ]\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n#### Reply Button\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"button\",\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"BUTTON_TEXT\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"reply\",\\\n          \"reply\": {\\\n            \"id\": \"UNIQUE_BUTTON_ID_1\",\\\n            \"title\": \"BUTTON_TITLE_1\"\\\n          }\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"reply\",\\\n          \"reply\": {\\\n            \"id\": \"UNIQUE_BUTTON_ID_2\",\\\n            \"title\": \"BUTTON_TITLE_2\"\\\n          }\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Template Messages\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"image\",\\\n            \"image\": {\\\n              \"link\": \"http(s)://URL\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"TEXT_STRING\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"currency\",\\\n            \"currency\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"VALUE\",\\\n              \"code\": \"USD\",\\\n              \"amount_1000\": NUMBER\\\n            }\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"date_time\",\\\n            \"date_time\": {\\\n              \"fallback_value\": \"MONTH DAY, YEAR\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"quick_reply\",\\\n        \"index\": \"0\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"payload\",\\\n            \"payload\": \"PAYLOAD\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"quick_reply\",\\\n        \"index\": \"1\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"payload\",\\\n            \"payload\": \"PAYLOAD\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Reply To Message\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"context\": {\n     \"message_id\": \"MESSAGE_ID\"\n  },\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"text\",\n  \"text\": {\n    \"preview_url\": false,\n    \"body\": \"your-text-message-content\"\n  }\n}’\n```\n\n### Successful Response\n\n```\n    {\n      \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n      \"contacts\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"input\": \"16505555555\",\\\n          \"wa_id\": \"16505555555\"\\\n        }\\\n      ],\n      \"messages\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDUwNzY1MjAVAgARGBI5QTNDQTVCM0Q0Q0Q2RTY3RTcA\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n\n```\n\nApplies to businesses in Brazil, Colombia, and Singapore, starting September 12, 2023. Applies to all businesses starting October 12, 2023.\n\nMessages will have one of the following statuses which will be returned in each of the `messages` objects\n\n- `\"message_status\":\"accepted\"` : means the message was sent to the intended recipient\n- `\"message_status\":\"held_for_quality_assessment\"`: means the message send was delayed until quality can be validated and it will either be sent or dropped at this point\n\n```\n\n      {\n      \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n      \"contacts\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"input\": \"16505555555\",\\\n          \"wa_id\": \"16505555555\"\\\n        }\\\n      ],\n      \"messages\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDUwNzY1MjAVAgARGBI5QTNDQTVCM0Q0Q0Q2RTY3RTcA\",\\\n          \"message_status\": \"accepted\",\\\n        }\\\n      ]\n    }\n\n```\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#example-response)\n\n# Location Messages\n\nLocation messages allow you to send a location's latitude and longitude coordinates to a WhatsApp user.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440753150_1614554799358194_4095127988263974385_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=cv34msSN2RoQ7kNvwGhYS0Y&_nc_oc=AdmIhwISdErcIUqEab5uTeNXhiBaUwexS9kppgMeTFTzB10LouJNR07WFLN8-iCgdGQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=LsmAMMUgpvB7g-YDzSOrGw&oh=00_AYHa3L41F-hQL457GTUQgdJNHbWO3-FWsBmDsQH-oySRWg&oe=680B0AE1)\n\n## Sending Text Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send a location message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"location\",\n  \"location\": {\n    \"latitude\": \"<LOCATION_LATITUDE>\",\n    \"longitude\": \"<LOCATION_LONGITUDE>\",\n    \"name\": \"<LOCATION_NAME>\",\n    \"address\": \"<LOCATION_ADDRESS>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<LOCATION_ADDRESS>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Location address. | `101 Forest Ave, Palo Alto, CA 94301` |\n| `<LOCATION_LATITUDE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Location latitude in decimal degrees. | `37.44216251868683` |\n| `<LOCATION_LONGITUDE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Location longitude in decimal degrees. | `-122.16153582049394` |\n| `<LOCATION_NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Location name. | `Philz Coffee` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send a location message with a name and address.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n    \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n    \"type\": \"location\",\n    \"location\": {\n        \"latitude\": \"37.44216251868683\",\n        \"longitude\": \"-122.16153582049394\",\n        \"name\": \"Philz Coffee\",\n        \"address\": \"101 Forest Ave, Palo Alto, CA 94301\"\n    }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Location Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#location-messages)\n\n[Sending Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#sending-text-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages#example-response)\n\n* * us on YouTube](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/89127358_532616317687233_292625476315250688_n.svg?_nc_cat=1&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=H1saC3sSIVEQ7kNvwEt-_E_&_nc_oc=AdkeWCAy-ATBYxbvHJhgjojNxR4B900skCKSmORFxmY0r9HK_mZ_F_r9appJcFHlJoE&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=LsmAMMUgpvB7g-YDzSOrGw&oh=00_AYG9NdtwCJX6QJgT4moGH15YOOdYWpvjfkTxZOLrcj2Zjw&oe=680B11D4)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2FMetaDevelopers%2F&h=AT3vgFfaK8gdElptBzzyxukNSSI3DOuTQR_rzQVv1F5HRgPWjtGylsf4qGeLmbwVMyrULTR1BAIePDQkBGTdXLG7PTMTyG79t_TlnpYDJahrZZcd5WSyfMlCNkCN-_arQLMmnDLiW4f2t8Vug2vrN4bMMB0)\n\n© WhatsApp](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#receive-upi-payments-through-whatsapp)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#overview)\n\n[How It Works](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#how-it-works)\n\n[Purchase Flow in App](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#purchase-flow-in-app)\n\n[Before You Start](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#before-you-start)\n\n[Manage Your Payment Methods (Beta
