Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#sending-multi-product-template-messages)\n\n[Components](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#components)\n\n[Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#request)\n\n[Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#post-body)\n\n[Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#properties)\n\n[Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#response)\n\n[Response Contents](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#response-contents)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#example)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#example-response)\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwG1D2fs&_nc_oc=AdlLzRxN9bcOl-3NzhZLjjXJ8Himce5oI983-U8t94TaiX0Lb_ePwZZLdwFDbLyx_ic&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=oIKjWsBntDw_8US26UtsPw&oh=00_AYGw-ewu8fFlFxcEHGVEa0RDmevWEakrdiDn2woQtpkrXw&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Sending Multi-Product Template Messages\n\nThis document explains how to send [multi-product message (MPM) templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/mpm-templates) in template messages.\n\n## Components\n\nMPM template messages must have:\n\n- a **header** component (only required if template uses a header variable)\n- a **body** component (only required if template uses a body variable)\n- a single **MPM button** component\n\nUse the MPM button component to define sections and their titles that will appear when the customer taps the **View items** button, and to designate which products appear in each of those sections.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/345454978_257502929976881_8980265032321705247_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=vXmPf-3A3cEQ7kNvwGljNkH&_nc_oc=AdkXy7h9onBm0b_anjvyGxWFLpSdMcjiwiBtixbF8ENj0BLp8qukvoN3l2gdHTpTFRk&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=oIKjWsBntDw_8US26UtsPw&oh=00_AYEcDQ8bQOYJGo2MB106cVjRXtD5UbsNx0J8yl-7P9iHaA&oe=680AF18B)\n\n## Request\n\nTo send an approved MPM template in a template message, send a POST request to the [WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint. Use the POST body to define the contents of the message and to describe any variables to inject into the template itself.\n\n### Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<TO>\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"<NAME>\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"<CODE>\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n\\\n      /* Header component required if template uses a header variable, otherwise omit */\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"<HEADER_TEXT>\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n\\\n      /* Body component required if template uses a body variable, otherwise omit */\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"<BODY_TEXT>\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n\\\n      /* MPM button component always required */\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"mpm\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"thumbnail_product_retailer_id\": \"<THUMBNAIL_PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>\",\\\n              \"sections\": [\\\n                {\\\n                  \"title\": \"<TITLE>\",\\\n                  \"product_items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"product_retailer_id\": \"<PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>\"\\\n                    },\\\n                    ... // Additional item objects (up to 30)\\\n                  ]\\\n                },\\\n                ... // Add section objects (up to 10)\\\n              ]\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BODY_TEXT>` | **Required if template uses variables.**<br>String or array of strings. Text to replace body variable(s) defined in the template. | `10OFF` |\n| `<CODE>` | Template [language and locale code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/supported-languages). | `en_US` |\n| `<HEADER_TEXT>` | **Required if template uses a variable.**<br>Text to replace header variable defined in the template. | `Pablo` |\n| `<NAME>` | Template name. | `abandoned_cart` |\n| `<PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>` | SKU number of the item you want to appear in the section.<br>SKU numbers are labeled as **Content ID** in the Commerce Manager.<br>Supports up to 30 products total, across all sections. | `2lc20305pt` |\n| `<THUMBNAIL_PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>` | Item SKU number. Labeled as **Content ID** in the Commerce Manager.<br>The thumbnail of this item will be used as the template message's header image. | `2lc20305pt` |\n| `<TITLE>` | Section title text.<br>You can define up to 10 sections.<br>Maximum 24 characters. Markdown is not supported. | `Popular Bundles` |\n| `<TO>` | Customer phone number. | `16505551234` |\n\n## Response\n\nUpon success, the API will respond with:\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"<INPUT>\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"<WA_ID>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<ID>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n### Response Contents\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<ID>` | WhatsApp message ID. | `wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBJDOEI3ODgxNzQzMjJBQTdEQTcA` |\n| `<INPUT>` | Customer WhatsApp phone number. | `16505551234` |\n| `<WA_ID>` | Customer WhatsApp ID. | `16505551234` |\n\n## Example\n\n### Example Request\n\nThis example sends an approved template named \"abandoned\\_cart\" and injects a variable (the customer's first name) into the template header and a discount code into the template body. It also defines two sections (\"Popular Bundles\" and \"Premium Packages\") and identifies the products (a total of 3) that should be injected into those sections.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"abandoned_cart\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"en_US\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"Pablo\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"10OFF\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"mpm\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"thumbnail_product_retailer_id\": \"2lc20305pt\",\\\n              \"sections\": [\\\n                {\\\n                  \"title\": \"Popular Bundles\",\\\n                  \"product_items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"product_retailer_id\": \"2lc20305pt\"\\\n                    },\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"product_retailer_id\": \"nseiw1x3ch\"\\\n                    }\\\n                  ]\\\n                },\\\n                {\\\n                  \"title\": \"Premium Packages\",\\\n                  \"product_items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"product_retailer_id\": \"n6k6x0y7oe\"\\\n                    }\\\n                  ]\\\n                }\\\n              ]\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBJDOEI3ODgxNzQzMjJBQTdEQTcA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending Multi-Product Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#sending-multi-product-template-messages)\n\n[Components](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#components)\n\n[Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#request)\n\n[Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#post-body)\n\n[Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#properties)\n\n[Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#response)\n\n[Response Contents](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#response-contents)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#example)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/mpm-template-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example URL](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages)\n- [Flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-flow-messages)\n- [Interactive List](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages)\n- [Interactive Reply Buttons](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n- [Location](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages)\n- [Location Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages/location-request-messages)\n- [Reaction](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages)\n- [Sticker](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/sticker-messages)\n- [Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates)\n- [Text](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages)\n- [Video](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages)\n- [Read Receipts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)\n\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Mark Messages as Read](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read#mark-messages-as-read)\n\n[Learn More](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read#learn-more)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides)\n\n# Mark Messages as Read\n\nWhen you receive an incoming message from Webhooks, you can use the `/messages` endpoint to mark the message as read by changing its status to `read`. Messages marked as read display two blue check marks alongside their timestamp:\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/278457624_525235565835795_4440787411323616650_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=gm_DFcDG4ugQ7kNvwHCII1e&_nc_oc=AdmFdDycfgGVQEE0p3sLHAJ8sJx-8jDtdC8ypBGItnN3r4dmKbl2cBtctm6Y-rekXHY&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=UtGb2m4nZ1eh1K0rfNfK-Q&oh=00_AYEfIU_QK6bK5hvsrhAB788r57D2Dm6Qd1PE5tXp6dgv3g&oe=67F67370)\n\nWe recommend marking incoming messages as read within 30 days of receipt. You cannot mark outgoing messages you sent as read. Marking a message as read will also mark earlier messages in the conversation as read.\n\n## Before You Start\n\nYou will need:\n\n- The [business phone number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)\n\n- The [ID for the message from a customer](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components#messages-object) that you received from a webhook notification\n\n- A System User access token\n\n- The `whatsapp_business_messages` permission\n\n\n## Update the Status\n\nTo mark the message as read, send a `POST` request to the `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` endpoint with `messaging_product` set to `whatsapp`, `message_id` set to the message ID and `status` to `read`.\n\n### Example Request\n\n_Formatted for readability_\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages'\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"status\": \"read\",\n  \"message_id\": \"MESSAGE_ID\"\n  }'\n```\n\nOn success, a JSON array is returned:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n## Learn More\n\n- [WhatsApp Business Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/phone-numbers#get-all-phone-number)\n- [WhatsApp Business Cloud API Webhooks Message Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components#messages-object)\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Mark Messages as Read](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read#mark-messages-as-read)\n\n[Learn More](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read#learn-more)\n\n* * APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis)\n- [UPI Intent](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent)\n- [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links)\n- [Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg)\n- [Order Details Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate)\n- [Order Status Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderstatustemplate)\n- [Checkout Button Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/checkout-button-templates)\n\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Payments API — India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#payments-api---india)\n\n[Know the differences in the models of integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#know-the-differences-in-the-models-of-integration)\n\n[Pre-requisites for integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#pre-requisites-for-integration)\n\n[Example Usecases and Features Needed](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#example-usecases-and-features-needed)\n\n[Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#support)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Payments API — India\n\nPayments API enable businesses to accept payments from their customers through all UPI Apps installed on their device and other payment methods like cards, NetBanking, and wallets via WhatsApp.\n\nBusinesses can sends invoice( `order_details`) messages to their customers, then get notified about payment status updates via webhook notifications from Payment Gateway.\n\n## Know the differences in the models of integration\n\nThe choice between the two, relies on what Payment Gateway, the merchant/business use.\nThere are 2 models of integration and they differ in the following ways:\n\n1. **[UPI Intent Mode](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent)**: This mode can be used with any Payment Gateway provided they support UPI Intent generation.\n2. **[Payment Gateway Deep Integration Mode](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg)**: Currently supported for Razorpay and PayU only.\n\n| User Experience | UPI Intent Mode | Payment Gateway Deep Integration Mode |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| **Native support for \"Other payment methods\"**<br>Eg: Netbanking, cards, wallets | ❌<br>Alternative: Send payment links | ✅ |\n| **Native support for UPI Intent** | ✅ | ✅ |\n| **Native Payment Status Notification** | ❌ | ✅ |\n\n| Integration Features | UPI Intent Mode | Payment Gateway Deep Integration Mode |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| **Refunds from Whatsapp APIs** | ❌ | ✅ |\n| **Payment Status from Whatsapp webhooks** | ❌ | ✅ |\n\n## Pre-requisites for integration\n\n1. **Essential Payments APIs are available at SP/TP**\n2. **Access to merchant order trigger APIs / CSVs** needed to trigger an order. (eg: amount, goods/service details)\n3. **Access to payment posting APIs** needed to close an order (eg: ticket generation APIs to create tickets once payment is received)\n\n#### Full Payment Gateway Deep Integration Mode\n\n1. **Find out PG account owner**: This is to authorize the linking of their account to Whatsapp Business Manager.\n\n#### UPI Intent Mode\n\n1. **Find out VPA IDs, MCC and PC** for business from merchant’s PG.\n2. **Access to PG API docs**:\n\n\n   - UPI Intent S2S calls\n   - Webhook configuration for payment status\n\n## Example Usecases and Features Needed\n\n| Usecase | Essential Feature Set |\n| --- | --- |\n| **Buying Tickets**<br>eg: Metro, bus, event tickets | - Order Details Message<br>- Payment Status Webhook/API<br>- Order Status Message<br>- Refund |\n| **Payment Reminders**<br>Example: Bill payments, subscription renewals, insurance renewals | - Order Details Template<br>- Payment Status Webhook/API<br>- Order Status Message<br>- Refund |\n\n## Support\n\n- Incase you run into issue, reach out to [direct support](https://business.facebook.com/direct-support/). _Make sure to choose the correct case type: **\"WaBiz: Business Payments API”** so you get a faster resolution._\n- [Signup for office hours](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Foutlook.office365.com%2Fowa%2Fcalendar%2FWhatsappBusinessPaymentsIndiaOfficeHourse%40meta.com%2Fbookings%2F&h=AT1ZCSeCfc-zZbuqR7tpFUvGqwyVpIaOWF0fpJ3QcHNABFpOQeOggmhcmfXIt2IKB_5l27VA5ArsGMmbZoRZomW4JaQUymDFuCPic9FweLF8fa62gcg3B4vPjZ5WD8CoC1CwhWCq90pMlQ). _Make sure to write down your issues in the form provided_\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Payments API — India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#payments-api---india)\n\n[Know the differences in the models of integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#know-the-differences-in-the-models-of-integration)\n\n[Pre-requisites for integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#pre-requisites-for-integration)\n\n[Example Usecases and Features Needed](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#example-usecases-and-features-needed)\n\n[Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in#support)\n\n* [Location](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages)\n- [Location Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages/location-request-messages)\n- [Reaction](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages)\n- [Sticker](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/sticker-messages)\n- Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages)\n- [Coupon Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates)\n- [LTO Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/limited-time-offer-template-messages)\n- [Media card carousel templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/media-card-carousel-templates)\n- [MPM messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/spm-template-messages)\n- [Flows Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Template Library](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#template-library)\n\n[Creating Templates via WhatsApp Manager (WAM)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#creating-templates-via-whatsapp-manager--wam-)\n\n[Template Parameters and Restrictions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#template-parameters-and-restrictions)\n\n[List of parameters and sample values](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#list-of-parameters-and-sample-values)\n\n[Forms](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#forms)\n\n[Identifying forms in the request response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#identifying-forms-in-the-request-response)\n\n[Using the API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#using-the-api)\n\n[Sending Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#sending-template-messages)\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwG6oL7D&_nc_oc=AdkSh4jBXgzGKkaFyuoj7ekys6fsnODkJxfBmcxCsyCimwRKDzzKFbsVF3Tsc3zz8Xo&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYExtYiDUwfl0b1H_twQ0eUkn2IqQGkNYwP_MT4EOnXtXA&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\nStarting October 1, 2024, businesses on Cloud API can create new authentication templates from the template library.\n\n# Template Library\n\nTemplate Library makes it faster and easier for businesses to create utility templates for common use cases, like payment reminders, delivery updates — and authentication templates for common identity verification use cases.\n\nThese pre-written templates have already been categorized as utility or authentication. Library templates contain fixed content that cannot be edited and parameters you can adapt for business or user-specific information.\n\nYou can browse and create templates using Template Library in WhatsApp Manager, or programmatically via the API.\n\n## Creating Templates via WhatsApp Manager (WAM)\n\nFollow the instructions below to create templates using the Template Library in [WhatsApp Manager](https://business.facebook.com/wa/manage/template-library).\n\n1: In the sidebar of WAM, under **Message Templates**, select **Create Template**.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/430210752_371214109162448_4943063885416909666_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=rV1zN64aDIwQ7kNvwECnuvN&_nc_oc=Adk-de930p71pN0MEsiXfXwCILPE7MmeNVcMDNy7EBHHasl5LiSAeBpUUiANgWzWQ34&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYFxEEnB0Rw6_Fi5Mz7nmJcjH8pcPPOCaX_M0z4lEZQiDw&oe=67F67C1F)\n\n2: Under _Browse the WhatsApp Template Library_, select **Browse Templates**.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/429539465_368267369458328_1613642940583899591_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=SL74WPZ3eMgQ7kNvwHwXrxQ&_nc_oc=AdlVDaChOQUyAHTZ9XyIPWvNawTwmXXh7uwALdZaamAmwHBD2ekxEeI71tGpvUk_e70&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYE0VTMYx31-9ZOX0jKmLdCV7SGxBMWVWv5FgaINXgcCoQ&oe=67F69430)\n\n3: You will now see all currently available templates. Use the search bar to search by topic or use case, or use the dropdown options on the sidebar to filter the results.\n\nNote that hovering over a template will show you its parameter values.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/429553920_381518718172210_6420451475031751758_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=T7HDsxaTd5wQ7kNvwE7_Wt-&_nc_oc=AdmGWllQAHDv3QbjkZztQgJ5eqj5Ryx55ECJfFVtCtu8so6_GSiC10D-92yj9Uyt89Q&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYHb-2Psm7HanHRMZEkJx2vEEty-PsKXPoukt2993LjIhg&oe=67F691DF)\n\n4: To create a template, **select one** by clicking on it. Then, add your template name, select the language, and fill out the button details. Once you have completed these steps, click **Submit**.\n\nNote: If you choose **Customize template**, your template will have to go through review before you are able to send messages.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/430330228_1089920618914819_4888474189025910_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=_f6dAD45XMMQ7kNvwGjMOqi&_nc_oc=AdlQkGWj4JWArL_023kemMtZL5yQeYwYFwDtscE1-AjHYQtMO20qvxOschMV6WCMIwQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYEGSvUoUHhht9MusseakMBCWX4vouev6mb3xaIYx8YCwA&oe=67F69A73)\n\n## Template Parameters and Restrictions\n\nWhen a template contains the value `library_template_name` in the `GET <WABAID>/message_templates?name=<TEMPLATE_NAME>` response, it is a template created from the Template Library and is subject to type checks and restrictions.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/439244745_964434859015727_8638112227942476772_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=iUXP1zT8fuUQ7kNvwEnLu9Q&_nc_oc=AdmdX4Z_S8353q179mnTakwIW2LPDOGgrbuMcppNdyw1Rixtkv6JnTNMnbvs9yc7yjM&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYHkkwHOjl8X9hIirOHzSE9OE1VFbgkPUVSTp0WEXlGD1w&oe=67F699A4)![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/439287368_1206047533728336_899983653773723074_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=1LmRW-_5w7QQ7kNvwFjpzJT&_nc_oc=AdnvtbivZj7YGVnCZZ7sJuihbeXgUUp2Fm4HO8IVdpGYYUWlPsDKg9nf46I0AhiXALk&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYEKK-H-MrUt1pQg8O_CUCIRGOqj13J3ngFFLv0dCXgRww&oe=67F66DCD)\n\nTemplates in the library contain both fixed content and parameters. The parameters represent spaces in the template where variable information can be inserted, such as names, addresses, and phone numbers.\n\nIn the example above, parameters like the name `Jim` or the business name `CS Mutual` can be modified to accept variables like your customer's name and your business's name.\n\nMessages sent using templates from Template Library are subject to parameter checks during send time. Values used in parameters that are outside of the established ranges listed below will cause the message send to fail.\n\n### List of parameters and sample values\n\nAll parameters are length restricted. If you receive an error, try again with a shorter value.\n\n| Parameter Type | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `ADDRESS` | A location address.<br>- Must be a valid address | - `1 Hacker Way, Menlo Park, CA 94025` |\n| `TEXT` | Basic text. | - `regarding your order.`<br>- `12 pack of paper towels`<br>- `your request`<br>- `puchase`<br>- `Jasper's Market` |\n| `AMOUNT` | A number signifying a quantity.<br>- May contain a prefix or suffix for monetary values such as USD or RS<br>- May contain decimals (.) and commas (,)<br>- May contain valid currency symbols such as $ and € | - `145`<br>- `USD $375.32`<br>- `€1,376.22 EUR`<br>- `RS 1200` |\n| `DATE` | A standard calendar date. | - `2021-04-19`<br>- `13/03/2021`<br>- `5th January 1982`<br>- `08.22.1991`<br>- `January 1st, 2024`<br>- `05 12 2022` |\n| `PHONE NUMBER` | A telephone number.<br>- May contain numbers, spaces, dashes (-), parentheses, and plus symbols (+) | - `+1 4256789900`<br>- `+91-7884-789122`<br>- `+39 87 62232` |\n| `EMAIL` | A standard email address.<br>- Must be a valid email address | - `1hackerway@meta.com`<br>- `yourcustomername@gmail.com`<br>- `abusinessorcustomername@hotmail.com` |\n| `NUMBER` | A number.<br>- Must be a number.<br>- Cannot contain spaces. | - `23444`<br>- `90001234921388904`<br>- `453638` |\n\n## Forms\n\nForms are only available to accounts who have had their message limits increased.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/440780120_3465773143643318_5801827623920807989_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=I4TPhp9mFxkQ7kNvwHIx92x&_nc_oc=AdlqRsvZlJARD9scbSvtPCubuJYCurRt_fxZQuAsqvMsw-FqHy65b8pORol0nO8wT7o&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=Ja2PIo1X_3OACTREqhdl7g&oh=00_AYFZ0tK0k0K8DijFOva6Z-1cDalqlSBzB32FGcDqgpxz_g&oe=67F6740E)\n\nSome templates in Template Library are interactive forms that are powered by WhatsApp Flows.\n\nIn WhatsApp Manager, you can identify these specific templates by the \"Form\" label they contain. The current supported use cases are Customer Feedback and Delivery Failure.\n\n### Identifying forms in the request response\n\nWhen calling the `GET /message_template_library` endpoint, the `type` key in the `buttons` array will show as `\"FORMS\"`.\n\n```\n\n{\n      \"name\": \"delivery_failed_2_form\",\n      \"language\": \"en_US\",\n      \"category\": \"UTILITY\",\n      \"topic\": \"ORDER_MANAGEMENT\",\n      \"usecase\": \"DELIVERY_FAILED\",\n      \"industry\": [\\\n        \"E_COMMERCE\"\\\n      ],\n      \"body\": \"We were unable to deliver order {{1}} today.\n\nPlease {{2}} to schedule another delivery attempt.\",\n      \"body_params\": [\\\n        \"#12345\",\\\n        \"try a redelivery\"\\\n      ],\n      \"body_param_types\": [\\\n        \"TEXT\",\\\n        \"TEXT\"\\\n      ],\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"FLOW\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Reschedule\"\\\n        }\\\n      ],\n      \"id\": \"7138055039625658\"\n},\n\n```\n\n## Using the API\n\nThe Template Library API has two endpoints:\n\n```\n// Used to browse available library templates\nGET /message_template_library\n```\n\n```\n// Used when you are ready to create a template from the library.\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/message_templates\n```\n\n### **Searching and Filtering Available Templates**\n\nTemplates with `Header` param types of `Document` only support PDFs\n\nTo browse and filter available templates, use the `message_template_library` endpoint.\n\nOnce you find the template you are interested in, note the name as you will use it when creating the template via the `POST` method.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\n// Get all available templates\nGET /message_template_library\n\n// Search for substring\nGET /message_template_library?search=<SEARCH_KEY>\n\n// Filter by template topic\nGET/message_template_library?topic=<TOPIC>\n\n// Filter by template use case\nGET/message_template_library?usecase=<USECASE>\n\n// Filter by template industry\nGET/message_template_library?industry=<INDUSTRY>\n\n// Filter by template language\nGET/message_template_library?language=<LANGUAGE>\n```\n\n### Query String Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<SEARCH_KEY>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>A substring you are searching for in the content, name, header, body, or footer of the template. | `payments` |\n| `<TOPIC>`<br>_Enum_ | **Optional.**<br>The topic of the template.<br>See Template Filters below | `ORDER_MANAGEMENT` |\n| `<USECASE>`<br>_Enum_ | **Optional.**<br>The use case of the template.<br>See Template Filters below | `SHIPMENT_CONFIRMATION` |\n| `<INDUSTRY>`<br>_Enum_ | **Optional.**<br>The industry of the template.<br>See Template Filters below | `E_COMMERCE` |\n| `<LANGUAGE>`<br>_Enum_ | **Optional.**<br>The template language locale code.<br>See [Supported Languages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/supported-languages) | `en_US` |\n\n### Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/102290129340398/message_templates?search=\"payments\"'\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n```\n\n### Example Response\n\n```\n\n{\n      \"name\": \"low_balance_warning_1\",\n      \"language\": \"en_US\",\n      \"category\": \"UTILITY\",\n      \"topic\": \"PAYMENTS\",\n      \"usecase\": \"LOW_BALANCE_WARNING\",\n      \"industry\": [\\\n        \"FINANCIAL_SERVICES\"\\\n      ],\n      \"header\": \"Your account balance is low\",\n      \"body\": \"Hi {{1}},\nThis is to notify you that your {{2}} in your {{3}} account, ending in {{4}} is below your pre-set {{5}} of {{6}}.\nClick the button to deposit more {{7}}.\n{{8}}\",\n      \"body_params\": [\\\n        \"Jim\",\\\n        \"available funds\",\\\n        \"CS Mutual checking plus\",\\\n        \"1234\",\\\n        \"limit\",\\\n        \"$75.00\",\\\n        \"funds\",\\\n        \"CS Mutual\"\\\n      ],\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"URL\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Make a deposit\",\\\n          \"url\": \"https://www.example.com/\"\\\n        },\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Call us\",\\\n          \"phone_number\": \"+18005551234\"\\\n        }\\\n      ],\n      \"id\": \"7147013345418927\"\n}\n\n```\n\n### **Template Filters**\n\nThere are several templates to choose from in the Template Library. You can use the API to filter them based on a few factors.\n\n### List of Industry, Topic, and Use Case Enums\n\n| Industry |\n| :-: |\n| `E_COMMERCE` |\n| `FINANCIAL_SERVICES` |\n\n| Topic |\n| :-: |\n| `ACCOUNT_UPDATE` |\n| `CUSTOMER_FEEDBACK` |\n| `ORDER_MANAGEMENT` |\n| `PAYMENTS` |\n\n| Use Case |\n| :-: |\n| `ACCOUNT_CREATION_CONFIRMATION` | `PAYMENT_DUE_REMINDER` |\n| `FEEDBACK_SURVEY` | `PAYMENT_ACTION_REQUIRED` |\n| `SHIPMENT_CONFIRMATION` | `PAYMENT_OVERDUE` |\n| `DELIVERY_UPDATE` | `PAYMENT_CONFIRMATION` |\n| `ORDER_DELAY` | `FRAUD_ALERT` |\n| `DELIVERY_FAILED` | `AUTO_PAY_REMINDER` |\n| `DELIVERY_CONFIRMATION` | `PAYMENT_SCHEDULED` |\n| `ORDER_PICK_UP` | `PAYMENT_REJECT_FAIL` |\n| `ORDER_ACTION_NEEDED` | `STATEMENT_AVAILABLE` |\n| `ORDER_CONFIRMATION` | `LOW_BALANCE_WARNING` |\n| `ORDER_OR_TRANSACTION_CANCEL` | `RECEIPT_ATTACHMENT` |\n| `RETURN_CONFIRMATION` | `STATEMENT_ATTACHMENT` |\n| `TRANSACTION_ALERT` |  |\n\n### **Creating Templates**\n\n**Note: The modification of rules surrounding body properties for this endpoint is for the explicit purpose of showcasing how to use the endpoint with Template Library.**\n\nTo create a new template using the Template Library, call the existing `<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/message_templates` endpoint using the body properties below.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/message_templates\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n\n{\n  \"name\": \"<NAME>\",\n  \"category\": \"UTILITY\",\n  \"language\": \"en_US\",\n  “library_template_name”: “<LIBRARY_TEMPLATE_NAME>”,\n  \"library_template_button_inputs\": \"[\\\n    {'type': 'URL', 'url': {'base_url' : 'https://www.example.com/{{1}}',\\\n    'url_suffix_example' : 'https://www.example.com/demo'}},\\\n    {type: 'PHONE_NUMBER', 'phone_number': '+16315551010'}\\\n]\"\n}\n\n```\n\n### Body Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The name you are providing for your template.<br>Maximum 512 characters. | `my_payment_template` |\n| `<CATEGORY>`<br>_Enum_ | **Required.**<br>The template category.<br>**Must be `UTILITY` for use with Template Library.** | `UTILITY` |\n| `<LANGUAGE>`<br>_Enum_ | **Required.**<br>The template language locale code.<br>See [Supported Languages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/supported-languages) | `en_US` |\n| `<LIBRARY_TEMPLATE_NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The exact name of the Template Library template. | `delivery_update_1` |\n| `<LIBRARY_TEMPLATE_BUTTON_INPUTS>`<br>_Array of objects_ | **Optional.**<br>The website and/or phone number of the business being used in the template.<br>**Note: For utility templates that have button inputs, this property is _not_ optional.** | `“[<br>{'type': 'URL', 'url': {'base_url' : 'https://www.example.com/{{1}}',<br>'url_suffix_example' : 'https://www.example.com/demo'}},<br>{type: 'PHONE_NUMBER', 'phone_number': '+16315551010'}<br>]\"` |\n\n### Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v19.0/102290129340398/message_templates'\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json'\n-d '\n{\n  \"name\": \"my_delivery_update\",\n  \"language\": \"en_US\",\n  \"category\": \"UTILITY\",\n  “library_template_name”: “delivery_update_1”,\n  \"library_template_button_inputs\": \"[\\\n    {'type': 'URL', 'url': {'base_url' : 'https://www.example.com/{{1}}',\\\n    'url_suffix_example' : 'https://www.example.com/order_update}}\\\n  ]\"\n}\n\n```\n\n### Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"id\": \"{hsm-id}\",\n  \"status\": \"APPROVED\",\n  \"category\": \"UTILITY\"\n}\n```\n\n## Sending Template Messages\n\nTo learn how to send templated messages, view the [Send Templates guide](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Template Library](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#template-library)\n\n[Creating Templates via WhatsApp Manager (WAM)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#creating-templates-via-whatsapp-manager--wam-)\n\n[Template Parameters and Restrictions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#template-parameters-and-restrictions)\n\n[List of parameters and sample values](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#list-of-parameters-and-sample-values)\n\n[Forms](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#forms)\n\n[Identifying forms in the request response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#identifying-forms-in-the-request-response)\n\n[Using the API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/template-library#using-the-api)\n\n[Sending Template Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides)\n\n# Migrating from On-Premises API to Cloud API\n\nThis document explains how to migrate business phone numbers from On-Premises API to Cloud API.\n\nNote that migrating a business phone number from one API to another is not the same as [migrating a number from one WhatsApp Business Account (WABA) to another](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/guides/migrate-phone-to-different-waba/).\n\nTo migrate from Cloud API to On-Premises API, see [Migrating from Cloud API to On-Premises API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-cloud-to-onprem).\n\n## How It Works\n\nThe migration process involves generating metadata about the business phone number, then using that data to register the number for use with Cloud API. This in turn deregisters the number from On-Premises API, since a number can only be registered for use with one API at a time.\n\nMigration does NOT affect:\n\n- the business phone number's display name, verification status, or quality rating\n- templates used by the business phone number, or their statuses\n- the owning WABA, its Official Business Account status, or its messaging limit\n\nIn order to support migration, however, you must be aware of any [API differences](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#api-differences) and take appropriate action to address them before performing the migration steps described in this document.\n\n## Requirements\n\n### Meta App\n\nYou must have a Meta business app that is able to use Cloud API and Business Management API with onboarded customer data, and that is able to digest Cloud API and Business Management API [webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#webhooks). The app must also be associated with, or claimed by, your verified Meta Business Account.\n\nIf you do not have a Meta business app, or if you have one but have not configured the WhatsApp product on it, complete the steps in our Cloud API [Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started) guide. Completing these steps will generate all of the assets needed to test Cloud API and Business Management API.\n\n### App Review\n\nYour Meta app must undergo [App Review](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/embedded-signup/app-review) and be approved (i.e. have advanced access) for the **whatsapp\\_business\\_messaging** and **whatsapp\\_business\\_management** permissions.\n\n## Best Practices\n\nAfter making sure that your app can handle all API differences, we recommend that you first migrate a low-volume business phone number and verify that all functionality that you intend to offer with Cloud API works correctly. After verifying that everything is working properly, migrate additional numbers.\n\nWe also recommend that you perform migration when traffic to your On-Premises API deployment is low.\n\n## API Differences\n\nThe following On-Premises API features are either unsupported or are treated differently by Cloud API. Make sure your app is able to handle these differences before starting the migration process.\n\n### Webhooks\n\nCloud API and Business Management API webhooks payload structures are different from On-Premises API payload structures. We recommend that you create a new webhook endpoint that can handle Cloud API and Business Management API exclusively.\n\nRefer to the following documents to help you understand payload differences and how to configure webhooks on your app using the App Dashboard:\n\n- Configuration: [Webhooks for WhatsApp](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/getting-started/webhooks-for-whatsapp)\n- Cloud API webhook payloads: [Webhooks Notification Payload Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components)\n- Business Management API webhook payloads: [Webhooks Setup](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n\nNote that after you migrate a business phone number to Cloud API, you must use the [WhatsApp Business Account > Subscribed Apps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account/subscribed_apps) endpoint to **subscribe your Meta app to webhooks on the WABA** associated with the business number:\n\n#### Request Syntax\n\n```\ncurl -X POST 'https://graph.facebook.com/v17.0/<WABA_ID>/subscribed_apps' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n```\n\nOnce migration to Cloud API is complete, the business phone number's On-Premises API webhooks will no longer be delivered and Cloud API webhooks delivery will begin.\n\n### Media\n\nMedia IDs for any media uploaded to On-Premises API cannot be used when sending messages with Cloud API, so you must either [reupload media using Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) to generate new media IDs, or use media URLs if the media is hosted on a public server. See [Media Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#media-messages) and [Media-Based Message Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#media-based).\n\nNote that to ensure message integrity, some media hosting domains that are allowed by On-Premises API are not allowed by Cloud API. If you use a hosting service for your media, we recommend that you test media URLs in free-form messages and template messages prior to migration. If you believe your host is blocked in error, please [contact support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/support).\n\n### Error Codes\n\nCloud API and Business Management API error codes are different from On-Premises API error codes. See the following documents:\n\n- [Cloud API Error Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes)\n- [Business Management API Error Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/error-codes)\n\n### Property Validation\n\n- On-Premises API can accept unknown properties in message post body payloads, but Cloud API will reject these requests, so make your message send requests use only supported properties.\n- On-Premises API allows the omission of button indexes when sending messages with only one button, but Cloud API will reject these requests, so make sure your message send requests that include buttons also include indexes and their values.\n- On-Premises API accepts text strings that contain leading or trailing spaces (or only spaces) on action and button object properties when sending interactive messages, but Cloud API will reject these requests.\n\n### Push-To-Talk Messages\n\nOn-Premises identifies push-to-talk (PTT) messages in webhooks by setting `messages.type` to `voice`, but Cloud API identifies PTT messages by setting `messages.audio.voice` to `true`.\n\n### Stickerpacks\n\nCloud API does not support stickerpacks.\n\n## Downtime\n\nDowntime begins as soon as you perform the final migration step (registering the number for use with Cloud API) and should only last a few seconds. During this time, messages sent to the number from WhatsApp users will be silently dropped.\n\nWe highly encourage you to schedule migration during a time when the number experiences low activity, to minimize any downtime impact.\n\n## Throughput\n\nIf the On-Premises business phone number has multi-connect running 2 or more shards, it will automatically be upgraded to [high throughput](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview#throughput) on Cloud API.\n\n## Official Business Accounts\n\nIf you are migrating a business phone number that has an [Official Business Account (OBA)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/overview/business-accounts#official-business-account) status, its status will be preserved if you include its metadata (generated in step 2) when registering the number (step 3). If you omit this data, the number will lose its OBA status.\n\n## Migration Support\n\nIf you have questions or need help with migration, submit a Direct Support ticket with:\n\n- Topic: **WABiz: Cloud API**\n- Request Type: **On-Premises API -> Cloud API Migration Issues**\n\n## Step 1: Disable Two-Step Verification\n\nIf you know the business phone number's PIN, you can skip this step.\n\nYou will need the business phone number's PIN when performing step 3, so if you do not know the PIN, you must first [disable two-step verification](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/reference/settings/two-step-verification#disable) on the business phone number. If you do not own the business phone number, ask the owner to disable it for you.\n\n## Step 2: Generate Phone Number Metadata\n\nUse the [Backup and Restore API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/reference/settings/backup-and-restore) to generate metadata about your business phone number.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /v1/settings/backup\n{\n  \"password\": \"<PASSWORD>\"\n}\n```\n\nThe `<PASSWORD>` can be any string. This value will be used to encode the metadata, so keep track of it as you will need it in the next step.\n\n### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"settings\": {\n    \"data\": \"<METADATA>\"\n  },\n  \"meta\": {\n    \"api_status\": \"<API_STATUS>\",\n    \"version\": \"<API_VERSION>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\nThe API will return an encoded string assigned to the `data` property that describes your business phone number and its settings. Capture this value as you will need it in the next step.\n\n- `<METADATA>` — This is the encoded string that describes your business phone number and its settings. Capture this value as you will need it in the next step.\n- `<API_STATUS>` — The status of your On-Premises API deployment.\n- `<API_VERSION>` —The On-Premises API version number that you are running.\n\n### Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://localhost:9090/v1/settings/backup' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"password\": \"tacocat\"\n}'\n```\n\n### Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"settings\": {\n    \"data\": \"V0FCS...\"\n  },\n  \"meta\": {\n    \"api_status\": \"stable\",\n    \"version\": \"2.49.3\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n## Step 3: Register the Number\n\nA one-time password (OTP) is not required if the backup metadata from **Step 2** above is passed correctly and with no modifications to Cloud API during **Step 3** (this step).\n\nUse the Cloud API [WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Register](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/register/) endpoint to register the number for use with Cloud API.\n\nInclude the encoded business phone number metadata value and the password from the previous step. Although you can register the number without this data, the business phone number's profile data will be lost if not included, which can affect the WhatsApp Business Account's status as an Official Business Account.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/register\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"pin\": \"<NEW_OR_EXISTING_PIN>\",\n  \"backup\": {\n    \"password\": \"<PASSWORD>\",\n    \"data\": \"<METADATA>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n- `<NEW_OR_EXISTING_PIN` \\> — The existing PIN or the PIN you want to set on the business phone number.\n- `<PASSWORD` \\> — The password you used to generate your business phone number's metadata in the previous step.\n- `<METADATA` \\> — The encoded string that describes your business phone number and its settings, generated in the previous step.\n\n### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": <SUCCESS>\n}\n```\n\nThe API will respond with `success` set to `true` if registration is successful, or `false` if there was an error.\n\n### Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/110200345501442/register' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"pin\": \"134568\",\n  \"backup\": {\n    \"password\": \"tacocat\",\n    \"data\": \"V0FCS...\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n### Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n## Step 4: Check Messaging Health Status (Optional)\n\nRequest the `health_status` field on the business phone number and verify that it can be used for messaging with Cloud API. See [Messaging Health Status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/health-status).\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Migrating Works](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#how-it-works)\n\n[Requirements](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#requirements)\n\n[Meta Metadata](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#step-2--generate-phone-number-metadata)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#request-syntax)\n\n[Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#response)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#example-response)\n\n[Step 3: Register the Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#step-3--register-the-number)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#request-syntax-2)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#post-body)\n\n[Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#response-2)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#example-request-2)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#example-response-2)\n\n[Step 4: Check Messaging Health Status (Optional)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud#step-4--check-messaging-health-status--optional-)\n\n* * policies](https://developers.facebook.com/devpolicy/)\n\nFollow Us\n\n- [![Follow us on [Migrate an Existing WhatsApp Number to a Business Account](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started/migrate-existing-whatsapp-number-to-a-business-account)\n\n- [Get [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Get Message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#send-test-message)\n\n[Step 4: Clone Our Sample App and Configure Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#clone-sample-app)\n\n[Step 5: (Optional) Add a Real Business Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#add-real-number)\n\n[Next Steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#next-steps)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Get Started\n\nThis guide will help you send and receive your first message using Cloud API. You will also learn how to configure Webhooks for use with a sample app.\n\nThis guide is intended for people developing applications for themselves or their organization. If you are developing an application that will be used by other businesses, see [Solution Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/solution-providers/).\n\n## Before You Start\n\nYou will need:\n\n- A Meta developer account — [learn more about registering as a Meta developer](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development/register).\n- A business app — [learn more about creating apps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development/create-an-app/). If you don't see an option to create a **business** app, select **Other** \\> **Next** \\> **Business** during app creation).\n\n## Step 1: Add The WhatsApp Product To Your App\n\nAt this point, if you created a new app, you’ll be prompted to **Add products to your app**. Scroll down, and under **WhatsApp**, select **Set up**. Otherwise, select your app from the **My Apps** screen, and you can follow the same instructions again to add the WhatsApp product to your app.\n\nIf you have a Meta Business Account (MBA), you will be prompted to attach it when adding the WhatsApp product to your app. If you don’t have an MBA, you’ll be taken through some prompts that will help you create one. Once your MBA is attached to your application, you’ll be ready to start testing.\n\nAdding the WhatsApp product to your app does a few things for you:\n\n- Prompts you to create a Meta Business Account if you don’t have one.\n- Creates a test WhatsApp Business Account for you, automatically. This account has limitations and is meant for testing and development purposes since you don't pay for messages.\n- Creates a test business phone number associated with your WhatsApp Business Account. With this number, you can send free messages to up to 5 recipient phone numbers.\n- Creates a set of pre-approved message templates.\n\n## Step 2: Add a Recipient Number\n\nAdd a valid WhatsApp number where you can send test messages.\n\nIn the left-hand menu of the App Dashboard, navigate to **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**. Under **Send and receive messages**, select the **To** field and choose **Manage phone number list**.\n\nYou can add any valid WhatsApp number as a recipient. The recipient number will receive a confirmation code in WhatsApp that can be used to verify the number.\n\nOnce you verify the recipient number, it should now be selected in the **To** field. Repeat this process if you’d like to add another recipient, up to 5 in total.\n\n## Step 3: Send a Test Message\n\nSend the pre-approved `hello_world` template message to your chosen recipient number.\n\nIn the **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup** panel:\n\n1. Ensure your test business phone number is selected in the **From** field.\n2. Ensure you have the recipient phone number you would like to message selected in the **To** field. If you have multiple numbers added, you can send multiple messages at once.\n3. In the **Send messages with the API** panel, click the **Send message** button.\n\nAlternatively, you can copy the cURL command, then paste it into a new terminal window and run it.\n\nNotice that the code indicates you are sending a template message ( `”type”:”template”`) and identifying a specific template to use ( `”name”:”hello_world”`).\n\n## Step 4: Clone Our Sample App and Configure Webhooks\n\nWith webhooks, you can receive real-time HTTP notifications of changes to specific objects. In WhatsApp, webhooks can notify you of many events in your app, like message delivery and read notifications, and even account changes.\n\nAdd a callback URL in order to see the contents of webhooks. Follow our [Sample Callback URL for Webhooks Testing guide](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/sample-app-endpoints) to clone our sample app, which accepts webhooks notifications and displays their JSON payloads on-screen.\n\nOnce your webhook is set up, resend the template message and then reply back to it. You should see 4 separate webhook notifications: The message send, delivered, and read notifications, and the incoming message contents.\n\n## Step 5: (Optional) Add a Real Business Number\n\nWith your test business number and test WhatsApp business account, you can begin to develop your application. When you use these test assets, you don’t pay to send messages as you work to develop your app.\n\nOnce you are ready to start sending messages to your customers, you can add a real business phone number in the **API Setup** panel and create a real WhatsApp Business Account.\n\n## Next Steps\n\n- [Learn About Access Tokens and System Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#system-users)\n- [Learn About Message Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines)\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#get-started)\n\n[Before You Start](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#before-you-start)\n\n[Step 1: Add The WhatsApp Product To Your App](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#add-whatsapp-product)\n\n[Step 2: Add a Recipient Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#add-recipient-number)\n\n[Step 3: Send a Test Message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#send-test-message)\n\n[Step 4: Clone Our Sample App and Configure Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#clone-sample-app)\n\n[Step 5: (Optional) Add a Real Business Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#add-real-number)\n\n[Next Steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started#next-steps)\n\n* * [Success stories](https://developers.facebook.com/success-stories/)\n\n#### Support\n\n- [Developer support](https://developers.facebook.com/support/)\n- [Bug tool](https://developers.facebook.com/support/bugs/)\n- [Platform [Video](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages)\n- [Read Receipts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)\n\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive Call-to-Action URL Button Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#interactive-call-to-action-url-button-messages)\n\n[Sending CTA URL Button Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#sending-cta-url-button-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#example-response)\n\n# Interactive Call-to-Action URL Button Messages\n\nYour customers may be hesitant to tap raw URLs containing lengthy or obscure strings in text messages. In these situations, you may wish to send an interactive call-to-action (CTA) URL button message.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/387794034_834598291999256_6696668626971940741_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=xo8y8k4HsDAQ7kNvwEhyvQj&_nc_oc=AdkBZ2YAgm4XYp9uP4g2VVZkAt1ZrAX_USZD-V-w-jQdkXVB3aUZiL2O4aXohuLVV0g&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=d-QWXXjgGyCsSnbihZ86Ew&oh=00_AYHmdWC4bpqDbOF7Sw8fvPr__ICxS68b6lONgNiVBUvz8g&oe=680AEE62)\n\nCTA URL button messages allow you to map any URL to a button so you don't have to include the raw URL in the message body.\n\n## Sending CTA URL Button Messages\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<CUSTOMER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"cta_url\",\n\n    /* Header optional */\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"text\",\n      \"text\": \"<HEADER_TEXT>\"\n    },\n\n    /* Body optional */\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"<BODY_TEXT>\"\n    },\n\n    /* Footer optional */\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"<FOOTER_TEXT>\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"cta_url\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n        \"display_text\": \"<BUTTON_TEXT>\",\n        \"url\": \"<BUTTON_URL>\"\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<CUSTOMER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The WhatsApp ID or phone number of the customer the message is being sent to. See [Phone Number Formats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#phone-number-formats). | `+15558543153` |\n| `<HEADER_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Header text. | `Available Dates` |\n| `<BODY_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Message body text. | `Tap the button below to see available dates.` |\n| `<FOOTER_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Message footer text. | `Dates subject to change.` |\n| `<BUTTON_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Button text. | `See Dates` |\n| `<BUTTON_URL>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>URL to load in the device's default web browser when tapped by the WhatsApp user. | `https://www.luckyshrub.com?clickID=kqDGWd24Q5TRwoEQTICY7W1JKoXvaZOXWAS7h1P76s0R7Paec4` |\n\n## Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n    \"to\": \"+16505555555\",\n    \"type\": \"interactive\",\n    \"interactive\": {\n        \"type\": \"cta_url\",\n        \"header\": {\n            \"text\": \"Available Dates\"\n        },\n        \"body\": {\n            \"text\": \"Tap the button below to see available dates.\"\n        },\n        \"footer\": {\n            \"text\": \"Dates subject to change.\"\n        },\n        \"action\": {\n            \"name\": \"cta_url\",\n            \"parameters\": {\n                \"display_text\": \"See Dates\",\n                \"url\": \"https://www.luckyshrub.com?clickID=kqDGWd24Q5TRwoEQTICY7W1JKoXvaZOXWAS7h1P76s0R7Paec4\"\n            }\n        }\n    }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Interactive Call-to-Action URL Button Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#interactive-call-to-action-url-button-messages)\n\n[Sending CTA URL Button Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#sending-cta-url-button-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages#example-response)\n\n* * *\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/459257729_1010347667767763_3581566724399163588_n.svg?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=SQN4xkEmOWYQ7kNvwFH3Ui6&_nc_oc=AdnXcET-dGb3J18_Ln9cQ7VxEJg67oU_s8w905c0vl6ncV7z3d2W4TT9Hbi49EnvWx8&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=d-QWXXjgGyCsSnbihZ86Ew&oh=00_AYHySAWwQvsGgBKLK_ET0ph5_VfKifOyESe8Lm1t2klhxQ&oe=680B032C)\n\n- us on X](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/459160202_540178488525397_747089945616031028_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=WfNyrrsmoGwQ7kNvwHkiVgu&_nc_oc=Adnl6Deb3JKqV28pcK-HeOVLs15AcIY67xr2A5MDfWPlBw5n4LmLVsjzzsg4Odpn6UQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=d-QWXXjgGyCsSnbihZ86Ew&oh=00_AYE_rB6M8eSvQ70X3Yc9CnfMJDfJvB7Uc1MnIFd7mn4_xw&oe=680B0A98)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com%2Fmetafordevs&h=AT0tdTLgbS3QVDyhqJI1D_s0M70zCBG9WMgSk4D0A4u4zDRK3EX9B6RCe6b7lGOVWkc62GFQHZ263VNH4zKpFaN5p5zkcZv7Sca6Yhqy9aAuwqiknfjGhtPqzrqTxj8FLh1wGq9At01e_w)[![Follow
