Steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks#next-steps)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Webhooks Setup\n\nWhatsApp Business Blog\n\n- [Using Node.js to implement webhooks](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbusiness.whatsapp.com%2Fblog%2Fhow-to-use-webhooks-from-whatsapp-business-api&h=AT04bdS1DnCwmXAWE-HTJj1ayQFYFbkrbeBJNcwAM_FXHEdaZyNWfxVpvIzapqIjQRSn2dX4vzALOZU5ht4lLhOcu00TV8HfL6xw5H0mn84v8nI1vF_Q4MJYAnDMvYlYez7xF51oowp2bA)\n\nSubscribe to Webhooks to get notifications about messages your business receives and customer profile updates.\n\n## Create an Endpoint\n\nBefore you can start receiving notifications you will need to create an endpoint on your server to receive notifications.\n\nYour endpoint must be able to process two types of HTTPS requests: Verification Requests and Event Notifications. Since both requests use HTTPs, your server must have a valid TLS or SSL certificate correctly configured and installed. Self-signed certificates are not supported.\n\n[Learn more about Verifying Requests and Event Notifications\\\\\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/getting-started#create-endpoint)\n\nWebhooks set up will not affect the phone number on your WhatsApp Business App. Only after you [migrate your number over to the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/overview/phone-number#migrate) can you no longer use that number on your WhatsApp Business App.\n\n\n## Subscribe to Webhooks\n\nTo subscribe to Webhooks, you will need to get a Meta App ID and permissions. To do this go to the Meta App Dashboard. There you will:\n\n1. [Create a Business Type App in the Meta App Dashboard\\\\\n    ![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development/create-an-app)\n2. [Add the Webhooks Product to your Meta app in the App Dashboard\\\\\n    ![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/getting-started#configure-webhooks-product)\n\n\n\n\n\n\nAt any time, each Meta App can have only one endpoint configured. If you need to send your webhook updates to multiple endpoints, you need multiple Meta Apps.\n\n\nIf you are a Solution Partner, you may need to:\n\n1. [Add the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission\\\\\n    ![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/development/create-an-app/app-dashboard#app-review) in your App Dashboard\n\n2. [Successfully complete Meta App Review\\\\\n    ![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/app-review) – This step will take time but you can continue to test during the entire review process.\n\n\n## Understanding Webhooks\n\nWhenever a trigger event occurs, the WhatsApp Business Platform sees the event and sends a notification to a Webhook URL you have previously specified. You can get two types of notifications:\n\n- **Received messages**: This alert lets you know when you have received a message. These can also be called \"inbound notifications\" throughout the documentation.\n- **Message status and pricing notifications**: This alert lets you know when the status of a message has changed —for example, the message has been read or delivered. These can also be called \"outbound notifications\" throughout the documentation.\n\nAll Webhooks have the following generic format:\n\n```\n{\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\",\n  \"entry\": [{\\\n      \"id\": \"WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID\",\\\n      \"changes\": [{\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n              \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\\\n              \"metadata\": {\\\n                  \"display_phone_number\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n                  \"phone_number_id\": \"PHONE_NUMBER_ID\"\\\n              },\\\n              # specific Webhooks payload\\\n          },\\\n          \"field\": \"messages\"\\\n        }]\\\n    }]\n}\n```\n\nSee [Components](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components) for information on each field.\n\nIf you receive a message that is not supported for Cloud API, you will get an [unknown message webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#unknown-messages).\n\n### Payload Size\n\nWebhooks payloads can be up to 3MB.\n\n## Sample App Endpoints\n\nCreate a sample app endpoint to test your webhooks.\n\n- [Sample App Endpoints using Glitch\\\\\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sample-app-endpoints)\n\n- [Sample App Endpoints using Heroku\\\\\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/276034258_1045248339390233_3876773921429146148_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=j6rtBxig6BsQ7kNvwGdnRwy&_nc_oc=Adk92IkmWvPNZTO5oDQAg1Z4fDT7FLRyys7Cb1nfSkJOY3lOIVU9HPtUe5dTF78NSAg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=FcalA9ZRZets5O5MevEToQ&oh=00_AYEZ1NFZ5SaVFjvzKP6R1P_y066FdDeEo11X4GSvhNxymw&oe=680AE2F5)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/sample-apps)\n\n\n## Webhook Delivery Failure\n\nIf we send a webhook request to your endpoint and your server responds with an HTTP status code other than 200, or if we are unable to deliver the webhook for another reason, we will keep trying with decreasing frequency until the request succeeds, for up to 7 days.\n\nNote that retries will be sent to all apps that have subscribed to webhooks (and their appropriate fields) for the WhatsApp Business Account. This can result in duplicate webhook notifications.\n\n## IP Addresses\n\nYou can get the IP addresses of our webhook servers by running the following command in your terminal:\n\n```\nwhois -h whois.radb.net — '-i origin AS32934' | grep ^route | awk '{print $2}' | sort\n```\n\nWe periodically change these IP addresses so if you are allow-listing our servers you may want to occasionally regenerate this list and update your allow-list accordingly.\n\n## Next Steps\n\n[Learn more about the information](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components) you can receive in a Webhooks notification.\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Webhooks "[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n![](https://facebook.com/security/hsts-pixel.gif)\n\n[![](https://developers.facebook.com/images/developer/m4d_logo_july_2024.svg)](https://developers.facebook.com/?no_redirect=1)\n\n[Docs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/) [Tools](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/) [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/support/)\n\n[Log In](https://business.facebook.com/business/loginpage/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.facebook.com%2Fdocs%2Fwhatsapp%2Fcloud-api%2Fpayments-api%2Fpayments-br%2Forderdetailstemplate%3Fnav_ref%3Dbiz_unified_f3_login_page_to_dfc&app=436761779744620&login_options%5B0%5D=FB&login_options%5B1%5D=SSO&is_work_accounts=1&config_ref=biz_login_tool_flavor_dfc)\n\n[Order Details Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Send order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#send-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#overview)\n\n[Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-on-whatsapp-manager)\n\n[Creating an order details template using template creation APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-using-template-creation-apis)\n\n[Sending order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#sending-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Post order details template message flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#post-order-details-template-message-flow)\n\nMeta Business Account, sometimes referred to as Business Manager account or simply Business account, is being renamed to **business portfolio**. This change will appear gradually across Meta technologies. The change is cosmetic only and does not affect Meta Business Account IDs (business portfolio IDs).\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Send order details template message\n\n## Overview\n\nOrder details message template is one of the [interactive message template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#interactive) that extends the call-to-action button to support sending order details as template and provides richer experience compare to the [standard message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#text-based).\n\nOnce your Order details message templates have been created and approved, you can use the approved template to send the template message with order or bill information to prompt customers to make a payment.\n\nBefore sending an order details template message, businesses need to create a template with an “order details” call-to-action button. See [Create Message Templates for Your WhatsApp Business Account](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/2055875911147364?id=2129163877102343) for more information on prerequisites and how to create a template.\n\n## Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager\n\nTo create an order details template, business needs a business portfolio with a WhatsApp Business Account.\n\nIn **WhatsApp Manager** \\> **Account tools**:\n\n1. Click on `create template`\n2. Select `Utility` or `Marketing` category to see the `Order details` template format option.\n3. Select `Order details` template format, and click **Next**\n4. Enter the desired `template name` and supported `locale`\n   - Depending on the number of `locales` selected there will be an equal number of template variants and businesses need to fill in the template details in respective locale.\n5. Fill in template components such as `Header`, `Body` and optional `footer` text.\n\n\n   - For the `Header`, you can choose one of three media types: `Text`, `Image` or `Document`. Choose `Document` if you want to send **PDF files** in the header of this template.\n6. Click submit.\n7. Once submitted, templates will be [categorized as per the guidelines](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/updates-to-pricing/new-template-guidelines#template-category-guidelines) and undergo the [approval process](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#approval-process).\n8. The template will be approved or rejected after the template components are verified by the system.\n\n   - If business believe the category determined is not consistent with our template category guidelines, please confirm there are no [common issues](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#common-rejection-reasons) that leads to rejections and if you are looking for further clarification you may [request a review](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/updates-to-pricing/new-template-guidelines#requesting-review) of the template via [Business Support](https://business.facebook.com/business-support-home/)\n9. Once approved template [status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#statuses) will be changed to `ACTIVE`\n   - Please be informed that template's status can change automatically from `ACTIVE` to `PAUSED` or `DISABLED` based on customer feedback and engagement. We recommend that you [monitor status changes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#monitoring-status-changes) and take appropriate actions whenever such change occurs.\n\n## Creating an order details template using template creation APIs\n\nTo create a template through API and understand the general syntax, required categories and\ncomponents please refer to [templates API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/#creating-templates). All the guidelines outlined above in creating templates apply through API as well.\n\nOrder details template can be categorized as “Utility” or \"Marketing\" template and apart from ‘name’ and ‘language’ of\nchoice, it has general template components such as HEADER, BODY, FOOTER and a fixed BUTTON with “ORDER\\_DETAILS” type and “Copy Pix code” text.\n\n```\nPOST https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/WABA_ID/message_templates\n{\n  \"name\": \"{templateName}\",\n  \"language\": \"pt_BR\",\n  \"category\": \"UTILITY or MARKETING\",\n  \"display_format\": \"ORDER_DETAILS\",\n  \"components\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"HEADER\",\\\n      \"format\": \"TEXT\" OR \"IMAGE\" OR \"DOCUMENT\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Header text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"BODY\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Body text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"FOOTER\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Footer text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"BUTTONS\",\\\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"ORDER_DETAILS\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Copy Pix code\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n\n\n```\n\n## Sending order details template message\n\nOrder details template message allows the businesses to send invoice (order\\_details) message as predefined `order details` call-to-action button component parameters. It supports businesses to send all payment integration (such as [Dynamic Pix code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/offsite-pix), [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/payment-links), etc) integration as button parameters.\n\nTo send an order details template message, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` endpoint and attach a message object with `type=template`. Then, add a template object with a predefined `order details` call-to-action button.\n\nYou can optionally include a **PDF file** as attachment in the `header` component of the template message. To do so, you use `type=document` in the `parameter` object of the `header` component object, as described in [Sending Media Message Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages/message-templates/media-message-templates).\n\nFor example following sample describes how to send [Copy Pix code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/offsite-pix) in order details template message parameters to prompt the consumer to make a payment.\n\n```\nPOST https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"policy\": \"deterministic\",\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"order_details\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"order_details\": {\\\n                \"reference_id\": \"unique-reference-id\",\\\n                \"type\": \"digital-goods\",\\\n                \"payment_type\": \"br\",\\\n                \"payment_settings\": [\\\n                  {\\\n                    \"type\": \"pix_dynamic_code\",\\\n                    \"pix_dynamic_code\": {\\\n                      \"code\": \"00020101021226700014br.gov.bcb.pix2548pix.example.com...\",\\\n                      \"merchant_name\": \"Account holder name\",\\\n                      \"key\": \"39580525000189\",\\\n                      \"key_type\": \"CNPJ\"\\\n                    }\\\n                  }\\\n                ],\\\n                \"currency\": \"BRL\",\\\n                \"total_amount\": {\\\n                  \"value\": 50000,\\\n                  \"offset\": 100\\\n                },\\\n                \"order\": {\\\n                  \"status\": \"pending\",\\\n                  \"tax\": {\\\n                    \"value\": 0,\\\n                    \"offset\": 100,\\\n                    \"description\": \"optional text\"\\\n                  },\\\n                  \"items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"retailer_id\": \"1234567\",\\\n                      \"name\": \"Cake\",\\\n                      \"amount\": {\\\n                        \"value\": 50000,\\\n                        \"offset\": 100\\\n                      },\\\n                      \"quantity\": 1\\\n                    }\\\n                  ],\\\n                  \"subtotal\": {\\\n                    \"value\": 50000,\\\n                    \"offset\": 100\\\n                  }\\\n                }\\\n              }\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n\n```\n\nOnce the order details template message is delivered, a successful response will include an object with an identifier prefixed with wamid. Use the ID listed after wamid to track your message status.\n\n```\n{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"contacts\": [\\\n        {\\\n            \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n            \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\"\\\n        }\\\n    ],\n    \"messages\": [\\\n        {\\\n            \"id\": \"wamid.ID\"\\\n        }\\\n    ]\n}\n```\n\n## Post order details template message flow\n\nAfter the order details template message delivery the rest of the payment flow is the same as “Sending invoice in customer session window” and depends on the chosen [payment integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br) order details parameters.\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Send order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#send-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#overview)\n\n[Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-on-whatsapp-manager)\n\n[Creating an order details template using template creation APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-using-template-creation-apis)\n\n[Sending order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#sending-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Post order details template message flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orderdetailstemplate#post-order-details-template-message-flow)\n\n* * In](https://business.facebook.com/business/loginpage/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.facebook.com%2Fdocs%2Fgraph-api%2Freference%2Fwhats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status%2Fbusiness_compliance_info%2F%3Fnav_ref%3Dbiz_unified_f3_login_page_to_dfc&app=436761779744620&login_options%5B0%5D=FB&login_options%5B1%5D=SSO&is_work_accounts=1&config_ref=biz_login_tool_flavor_dfc)\n\nGraph API Version\n\n[v22.0](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/business_compliance_info/#)\n\n# Whats App Business Phone Number Business Compliance Info\n\nGet or update a [WhatsApp Business Phone Number's](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account-to-number-current-status/) India-based business compliance information.\n\nBusiness compliance data is only exposed in the WhatsApp app and the WhatsApp Business app, and only if the app user's phone number is India-based (it begins with `+91`).\n\n## Reading\n\nYou can't perform this operation on this endpoint.\n\n## Creating\n\nYou can't perform this operation on this endpoint.\n\n## Updating\n\nYou can't perform this operation on this endpoint.\n\n## Deleting\n\nYou can't perform this operation on this endpoint.\n\n* * Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#post-body)\n\n[Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#properties)\n\n[Response Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#response-syntax)\n\n[Response Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#response-properties)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#example-response)\n\n# Sending Coupon Code Templates\n\nThis document explains how to send approved [coupon code templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/coupon-templates) in a template message.\n\n## Request Syntax\n\nUse the [WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint to send an approved coupon template in a template message.\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"to\": \"<TO>\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"<NAME>\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"<CODE>\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      ... // Additional components, if using\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"COPY_CODE\",\\\n        \"index\": <INDEX>,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"coupon_code\",\\\n            \"coupon_code\": \"<COUPON_CODE>\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<TO>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The WhatsApp ID or phone number of the customer to send the message to. See [Phone Number Formats](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#phone-number-formats). | `+16505551234` |\n| `<NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Name of the template to be sent. | `coupon_code_fall2023_25off` |\n| `<CODE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The template's language and locale code. | `en_US` |\n| `<INDEX>`<br>_Integer_ | **Required.**<br>Indicates order in which button should appear, if the template uses multiple buttons.<br>Buttons are zero-indexed, so setting value to `0` will cause the button to appear first, and another button with an index of `1` will appear next, etc. | `0` |\n| `<COUPON_CODE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>The coupon code to be copied when the customer taps the button. Only accepting alphanumeric characters. | `25OFF` |\n\n## Response Syntax\n\nUpon success the API will respond with:\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>\",\\\n      \"message_status\": \"<PACING_STATUS>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n### Response Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | WhatsApp user's WhatsApp phone number. May not match `wa_id` value. | `+16505551234` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_ID>`<br>_String_ | WhatsApp user's WhatsApp ID. May not match `input` value. | `16505551234` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>`<br>_String_ | WhatsApp Message ID. This ID appears in associated **messages** webhooks, such as sent, read, and delivered webhooks. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI4MjZGRDA0OUE2OTQ3RkEyMzcA` |\n| `<PACING_STATUS>`<br>_String_ | Indicates [template pacing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#template-pacing) status. The `message_status` property is only included in responses when sending a [template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates) that uses a template that is being paced. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI4MjZGRDA0OUE2OTQ3RkEyMzcA` |\n\n## Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"to\": \"16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"coupon_code_fall2023_25off\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"en_US\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"25OFF\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"25%\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"COPY_CODE\",\\\n        \"index\": 1,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"coupon_code\",\\\n            \"coupon_code\": \"25OFF\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBIxRjk1REYzMDBERDE3RUI0RDYA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending Coupon Code Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#sending-coupon-code-templates)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#post-body)\n\n[Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#properties)\n\n[Response Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#response-syntax)\n\n[Response Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#response-properties)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/coupon-templates#example-response)\n\n* * India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n\n\n- [Onboarding APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis)\n- [UPI Intent](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent)\n- [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links)\n- [Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg)\n- [Order Details Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate)\n- [Order Status Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderstatustemplate)\n- [Checkout Button Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/checkout-button-templates)\n\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Send order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#send-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#overview)\n\n[Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-on-whatsapp-manager)\n\n[Creating an order details template using template creation APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-using-template-creation-apis)\n\n[Sending order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#sending-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Post order details template message flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#post-order-details-template-message-flow)\n\nMeta Business Account, sometimes referred to as Business Manager account or simply Business account, is being renamed to **business portfolio**. This change will appear gradually across Meta technologies. The change is cosmetic only and does not affect Meta Business Account IDs (business portfolio IDs).\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Send order details template message\n\n## Overview\n\nOrder details message template is one of the [interactive message template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#interactive) that extends the call-to-action button to support sending order details as template and provides richer experience compare to the [standard message templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates#text-based)\n\nOnce your Order details message templates have been created and approved, you can use the approved template to send the template message with order or bill information to prompt them to make a payment.\n\nBefore sending an order details template message, businesses need to create a template with an “open order details” call-to-action button. See [Create Message Templates for Your WhatsApp Business Account](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/2055875911147364?id=2129163877102343) for more information on prerequisites and how to create a template.\n\n## Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager\n\nTo create an order details template, business needs a business portfolio with a WhatsApp Business Account.\n\nIn **WhatsApp Manager** \\> **Account tools**:\n\n1. Click on `create template`\n2. Select `Utility` category to expand `Order details message` option\n3. Enter the desired `template name` and supported `locale`\n   - Depending on the number of `locales` selected there will be an equal number of template variants and businesses need to fill in the template details in respective locale.\n4. Please fill in template components such as `Header`, `Body` and optional `footer` text and submit.\n5. Once submitted, templates will be [categorized as per the guidelines](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/updates-to-pricing/new-template-guidelines#template-category-guidelines) and undergo the [approval process](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#approval-process) refrain from having [marketing content](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/updates-to-pricing/new-template-guidelines#marketing-templates) as part of template components.\n6. The template will be approved or rejected after the template components are verified by the system.\n\n   - If business believe the category determined is not consistent with our template category guidelines, please confirm there are no [common issues](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#common-rejection-reasons) that leads to rejections and if you are looking for further clarification you may [request a review](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/updates-to-pricing/new-template-guidelines#requesting-review) of the template via [Business Support](https://business.facebook.com/business-support-home/)\n7. Once approved template [status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#statuses) will be changed to `ACTIVE`\n   - Please be informed that template's status can change automatically from `ACTIVE` to `PAUSED` or `DISABLED` based on customer feedback and engagement. We recommend that you [monitor status changes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/message-templates/guidelines#monitoring-status-changes) and take appropriate actions whenever such change occurs.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/400572337_719090110106946_4022261776421392308_n.gif?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=-7cFjkI49kgQ7kNvwGqOs4P&_nc_oc=Adk4igyrhH5xQSoh0xLtErFdetLLFeMOoHgcVV-ElYVSTtKEUOfUBfE_8R_UZsVYtpw&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=r-5TxufNLChvrEWKkh2SDQ&oh=00_AYHN2XLW5cJFq2w1E665UhFG-F6oTKPP9fgzIpbgUuE0OA&oe=67F69739)\n\n## Creating an order details template using template creation APIs\n\nTo create a template through API and understand the general syntax, required categories and\ncomponents please refer to [templates API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/#creating-templates). All the guidelines outlined above in creating templates apply through API as well.\n\nOrder details template is categorized as “Utility” template and apart from ‘name’ and ‘language’ of\nchoice, it has general template components such as HEADER, BODY, FOOTER and a fixed BUTTON with “ORDER\\_DETAILS” type and “Review and Pay” text.\n\n```\nPOST https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/WABA_ID/message_templates\n{\n  \"name\": \"{templateName}\",\n  \"language\": \"en_US\",\n  \"category\": \"UTILITY\",\n  /* Businesses can create the order details template under marketing category by including display_format attribute */\n  /* \"display_format\": \"order_details\",*/\n  \"components\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"HEADER\",\\\n      \"format\": \"TEXT\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Header text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"BODY\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Template Body text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"FOOTER\",\\\n      \"text\": \"Footer text\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"BUTTONS\",\\\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"ORDER_DETAILS\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Review and Pay\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n\n```\n\n## Sending order details template message\n\nOrder details template message allows the businesses to send invoice(order\\_details) message as predefined `Open order details` call-to-action button component parameters. It supports businesses to send all payment integration (such as [UPI Intent](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#step-2--assemble-the-interactive-object), [Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg#step-1) or [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links#step-2--assemble-the-interactive-object)) integration as button parameters.\n\nTo send an order details template message, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` endpoint and attach a message object with `type=template`. Then, add a template object with a predefined `Open order details` call-to-action button.\n\nFor example following sample describes how to send [UPI Intent](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#step-2--assemble-the-interactive-object) in order details template message parameters to prompt the consumer to make a payment.\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"policy\": \"deterministic\",\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"header\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"image\", // Uses header with image as an example\\\n            \"image\": {\\\n              \"link\": \"http(s)://the-url\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"order_details\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"order_details\": {\\\n                \"currency\": \"INR\",\\\n                \"order\": {\\\n                  \"discount\": {\\\n                    \"offset\": 100,\\\n                    \"value\": 250\\\n                  },\\\n                  \"items\": [\\\n                    {\\\n                      \"amount\": {\\\n                        \"offset\": 100,\\\n                        \"value\": 400\\\n                      },\\\n                      \"name\": \"ORDER_ITEM_NAME\",\\\n                      \"quantity\": 1,\\\n                      \"retailer_id\": \"ORDER_ITEM_RETAILER_ID\",\\\n                      \"country_of_origin\": \"ORIGIN_COUNTRY\",\\\n                      \"importer_name\": \"IMPORTER_NAME\",\\\n                      \"importer_address\": {\\\n                        \"address_line1\": \"IMPORTER_ADDRESS\",\\\n                        \"city\": \"CITY\",\\\n                        \"country_code\": \"COUNTRY\",\\\n                        \"postal_code\": \"ZIP_CODE\"\\\n                      }\\\n                    }\\\n                  ],\\\n                  \"shipping\": {\\\n                    \"offset\": 100,\\\n                    \"value\": 0\\\n                  },\\\n                  \"status\": \"pending\",\\\n                  \"subtotal\": {\\\n                    \"offset\": 100,\\\n                    \"value\": 400\\\n                  },\\\n                  \"tax\": {\\\n                    \"offset\": 100,\\\n                    \"value\": 500\\\n                  }\\\n                },\\\n\\\n                \"payment_configuration\": \"unique_payment_config_id\",\\\n                \"payment_type\": \"upi\",\\\n                \"reference_id\": \"reference_id_value\",\\\n                \"total_amount\": {\\\n                  \"offset\": 100,\\\n                  \"value\": 650\\\n                },\\\n                \"type\": \"digital-goods\"\\\n              }\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\nOnce the order details template message is delivered, a successful response will include an object with an identifier prefixed with wamid. Use the ID listed after wamid to track your message status.\n\n```\n{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"contacts\": [\\\n        {\\\n            \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n            \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\"\\\n        }\\\n    ],\n    \"messages\": [\\\n        {\\\n            \"id\": \"wamid.ID\"\\\n        }\\\n    ]\n}\n```\n\n## Post order details template message flow\n\nAfter the order details template message delivery the rest of the payment flow is the same as “Sending invoice in customer session window” and depends on the chosen [payment integration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in) order details parameters. For more details refer [UPI Intent](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent#step-5--consumer-pays-for-the-order), [Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg#step-2--receive-webhook-about-transaction-status) and [Payment Links](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links#step-5--consumer-pays-for-the-order) post payments flows.\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Send order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#send-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#overview)\n\n[Creating an order details template on Whatsapp Manager](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-on-whatsapp-manager)\n\n[Creating an order details template using template creation APIs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#creating-an-order-details-template-using-template-creation-apis)\n\n[Sending order details template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#sending-order-details-template-message)\n\n[Post order details template message flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/orderdetailstemplate#post-order-details-template-message-flow)\n\n* * policies](https://developers.facebook.com/devpolicy/)\n\nFollow Us\n\n- [![Follow us on Account](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started/migrate-existing-whatsapp-number-to-a-business-account#migrate-an-existing-whatsapp-number-to-a-business-account)\n\n[Deleting a WhatsApp Messenger or WhatsApp Business app Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n\n# Migrate an Existing WhatsApp Number to a Business Account\n\nTo use an existing WhatsApp Messenger phone number with Cloud API, you must first delete your WhatsApp Messenger account.\n\nTo use an existing WhatsApp Business app phone number with Cloud API, you must either delete your account, or onboard to the platform [using a solution provider](https://www.facebook.com/business/partner-directory/search?solution_type=messaging) who supports [business app number onboarding](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/embedded-signup/custom-flows/onboarding-business-app-users). **Remember to back up your chat history from the WhatsApp Business App. These are guides on how to do so for [Android](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffaq.whatsapp.com%2F744445782709185%2F%3Fhelpref%3Dfaq_content&h=AT2Y_EYVSXcGZVQJtKD2tJrT6tTiB5E9J1OxdFxduPgz2F1wr0KKt1KajL8p3BAr-KkxHXsd-sslzyMc57CMSJkFlOgPx8pOc4KK4q4nVH6p7M6W_c1Ja1tjBZmqVUBs_nepTtTaDOobZw) or [iOS](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ffaq.whatsapp.com%2F180225246548988%2F&h=AT2_nQyXXLd5CaIsu69bfhwS9y97BdLPgtG7dTINvRywDNr1BN87vE7wv0TihDLq5PSkbh0zFM1iZTR2LJIdbv0uxFnVhV7btCI-ipOyZpMnyvqqeyRMOo1XfWxJ_4FYVKe0p-2mV6_NwA).**\n\nNote that if you delete your WhatsApp Business app phone number and then register it for use with Cloud API using the steps below, your existing messaging history will be lost, and you will be unable to use that number with the WhatsApp Business app again, unless you deregister the number from Cloud API. If you onboard via a solution provider who supports business app number onboarding, you will be able to use both the WhatsApp Business app and the solution partner's app concurrently, and your messaging history will be preserved.\n\n## Deleting a WhatsApp Messenger or WhatsApp Business app account\n\n1. Open WhatsApp Messenger or WhatsApp Business app on your Android or iPhone\n\n2. Navigate to **Settings > Account**\n3. Select **Delete my account.** Messages sent to this phone number will be queued in the meantime\n\n4. Follow the steps to delete the WhatsApp account for that phone number. **It may take up to 3 minutes for the disconnected number to become available**\n\n|     |     |     |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\n\n- [Error Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes)\n- [Migrate from On-Prem to Cloud](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud)\n- [Migrating from Cloud to On-Prem](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-cloud-to-onprem)\n- [Health Status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/health-status)\n- [Load Testing](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/load-testing)\n- [Experiments](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/experiments)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Experiments](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/experiments#experiments)\n\n[Marketing Message Experiment](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/experiments#marketing-message-experiment)\n\n# Experiments\n\nWe occasionally run experiments to help us assess the impact of messaging on WhatsApp user experience and engagement. These are standard practices on our platform and help us improve the messaging experience for both you and your customers.\n\nOngoing experiments are described below and have no fixed end-date. In order to protect the validity of the experiment and ensure the best possible business and consumer experience, we cannot provide any exceptions or opt-outs for these experiments.\n\n## Marketing Message Experiment\n\nStarting June 14, 2023, roughly 1% of WhatsApp users will not receive marketing template messages from any business unless one of the following conditions is met:\n\n- a [customer service window](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing#customer-service-windows) exists between the customer and the business\n- an open [marketing conversation](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing#conversation-categories) exists between the customer and the business\n- an open [free-entry point conversation](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing#free-entry-point-conversations) exists between the customer and the business\n\nIf you send a marketing template message to a customer who is part of the experiment group, your message will not be sent and you will not be billed for it since no conversation was created. Instead, you will receive a [message status undeliverable](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#status--message-undeliverable) webhook containing error code `130472`, notifying you of the failure.\n\nAttempting to resend the message will result in the same error. If you must deliver the marketing template message to the customer, we recommend that you contact the customer by some other, non-WhatsApp means, and ask them to message you so you can resend the message within the customer service window.\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Experiments](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/experiments#experiments)\n\n[Marketing Message Experiment](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/experiments#marketing-message-experiment)\n\n* * Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started/add-a-phone-number#add-a-phone-number)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n\n# Add a Phone Number\n\nNavigate to the Meta App that is set-up for WhatsApp by going to **developers.facebook.com > My Apps > Select your App.**\n\nIf your phone number is currently registered with WhatsApp Messenger or the WhatsApp Business App, you need to first delete it. See [Migrate an Existing WhatsApp Number to a Business Account](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started/migrate-existing-whatsapp-number-to-a-business-account).\n\n01. Use left menu to navigate to the **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup** panel.\n\n02. On the right pane select Add phone number button under **Step 5: Add a phone number.**\n03. Use the [display name guidelines](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/guides/display-name#display-name-guidelines) to enter a display name for your phone number. This is the name that will show for your business phone number once approved.\n\n04. Select your **Timezone.** This will be used for WhatsApp Billing and analytics.\n\n05. Select a **Category** for your business and enter a **Business description**.\n\n06. Select **Next** to begin the phone number verification process.\n07. Select your country code from the drop down and enter the phone number you would like to register.\n\n08. Select how you would like to receive your verification code, either by **Text Message** or **Phone** and click **Next** to continue. _You will need access to the phone number before selecting Next to receive the verification code._\n09. Enter the verification code once received and click **Next** to continue.\n\n10. The phone number will appear in the **From** drop down menu of the **Send and receive messages** section of the panel.\n\n11. Select the newly added phone number to begin sending messages.\n\n\nIf your phone number fails to register, you will see a message below the drop down that says \"Please register your phone number to send messages.\" Click on the link to access the configuration screen, then click on the slider button next to **Registered** to register your phone number again.\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n[On-Premises API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises)\n\\|\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Add a Phone Number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started/add-a-phone-number#add-a-phone-number)\n\n* * Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n- [Get Started for Solution [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Set up the WhatsApp Echo Bot](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-whatsapp-echo-bot#set-up-the-whatsapp-echo-bot)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Guides](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides)\n\n# Set up the WhatsApp Echo Bot\n\nThe WhatsApp Echo Bot is a sample webhook server application that echoes back to you whatever you send it. It can serve as a basic reference for how to set up webhooks and reply to incoming messages.\n\nTo test out the echo bot, we assume you have a Meta developer app with the WhatsApp product added already. Follow the [getting started workflow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started) to onboard as a developer and send your first test message.\n\nAfter you send your test message, [configure webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/getting-started/signing-up#configure-webhooks) with the WhatsApp Echo Bot:\n\n| Configure the WhatsApp Echo Bot |\n| --- |\n| **Using Glitch** |\n| 01. Go to our starter webhook project on Glitch:<br>     [Remix on Glitch![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/21624459_135531593756336_210820161941274624_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=PctJncKmbpwQ7kNvwFGJwie&_nc_oc=AdlqLMbkbc-ZxzplfpOyoEI3C0U4DGtauKDtiaREhao2QzyEDTN70s35Sh6Xnup0SEg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYE4xOX5PXJN4bD6sJ0n2RGz-S2qpvAq2QGrHKa6UY-Pbw&oe=680B1100)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fglitch.com%2Fedit%2F%23%21%2Fwhatsapp-cloud-api-echo-bot&h=AT3YHapjUA0GJMLTRqxKd-v4lLT-ppgymS8n8QNUaVqucIQVJMZ62vJ-g8dTuwJ6MbahjoxWdmiiJ3NfBv9BjMno0wne9_yupKZ1v8dZKKmzNX5RWLAmbabcbGCGQk06xzOQpxtGPExzAQ)<br>03. Click **Remix to edit**. A new copy of the project will be created for you.<br>05. Back in **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **Getting Started**, copy your access token from the developer portal:<br>     ![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281757444_734168554403466_603911146048087076_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=C5Yhw-w9ZxgQ7kNvwG0tifb&_nc_oc=AdkE0mllP-IqBMy5QTFV36sj6O7jym8iI0GOWuTlvvTWGCb5o7IOOHZG5sgGgFRUw-Q&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYGKw__GNsGBgdx6AZe_wXV_3B1kdB35uh20E2SP-Lamcg&oe=67F69475)<br>    <br>06. Save it into the `.env` file in the Glitch app under `WHATSAPP_TOKEN`.<br>08. Now, set the other `.env` variable called `VERIFY_TOKEN`. This can be any string you choose. In our case, we picked `\"blue_panda\"`.<br>10. At this point, the `.env` file in the Glitch app will look like this:<br>     ![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281695235_401119071881754_5550375008968485033_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=IZHBdqheOVwQ7kNvwHRx0I3&_nc_oc=AdmvghzCnDE3TJmuogP1u2U-7vDXLiHvdewjjY3_OhHdf-L-h50nWlHAfNe0MH9y2OE&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYGMdWz7Q_FNBzWaWv_rAaOyen9e_plmUOZn47PBTq_yzg&oe=67F67AE5)<br>12. To get the webhook url from Glitch click the **Share** button (you need to be logged in to see it) copy the **live site** link. Make sure to append `/webhook` to the end of the URL.<br>     ![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281447181_1146363302880718_9175083359341520870_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=uztJYAtMJZsQ7kNvwFIueSh&_nc_oc=AdnVQpeuV1QLAuia0Qaws-E3j_FkrkYxX0mnVqYXpDZ8WGX0dgMXzBe8qV2Et0z1pT0&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYHBCPRI3DKyzpSN3nU_GOFD96HnLL4b-iQMWmOiZRGZpg&oe=67F67594)<br>14. Use this URL as the Webhook URL when setting up webhooks on the Meta Developer portal (also enter matching verify token, `blue_panda` in our case):<br>     ![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281508579_340408481494631_2117088423930796511_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=64QEZtren_MQ7kNvwEisiUu&_nc_oc=AdnIbJMETYYkmQjh4T1dSeIpwy8NI-BNyACon0cCfA8Q376mPOEH4Bdw0oCIKbAyTIQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYEQg6WHXtDciUzstRckYxVJRfywTtF_RqdECONznDTKaw&oe=67F68298)<br>16. Click **Verify and Save**. Back in the Configuration screen, click **Manage** and subscribe to the **messages** webhooks field: <br>    <br>    ![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281510144_360890122685772_3740430755168333724_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=3P1mH_M9Uj0Q7kNvwE488Vb&_nc_oc=Adnsx366Nt6YyQt_auBMb8YD1uACmziQumYHXASc_VKfbuV5HAyE6U8NVrKVfPe7DCw&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYHJV0YotDa2mmpwX1ggxXL8rlASU1dYW0OVqVLkD1TUwA&oe=67F68039)<br>18. Now, when you send a message to the API number on WhatsApp, it should send back your message in the following format \"Ack: {your message}\". |\n| **Using AWS Lambda** |\n| _Before you start, make sure to [register and sign into an AWS development account](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fportal.aws.amazon.com%2Fbilling%2Fsignup&h=AT2ouhC1Lt1hvG1wD_mNGfRZLvlkTMTjoW7sEe6KG89gzFYSG8dMzVVmShdDhVzVYr6Q-41P9zHpEz9ii0m1sekHcMMhSZq-9AJpL7Ehv0arprVoMzuUtFwvTAoL4zad3yprzea-lJiTvQ)._<br>**In AWS:** <br>1. Open the [AWS Lambda](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Faws.amazon.com%2Flambda&h=AT0HG8HBqOJ0Y9EC0EN_Xgr2Vhli5DfI-zeFfbyOmzxK6SgPkeM8m-qt4Sc8FawHwjFfWOeC02z12b84-YYXbZ9XkxwVFaUlf04ZnZMQ8DkkE7h8Ej9Oynf2o59GuCUNRXlM1fCyY_SY_A) console. AWS operates in several regional data centers and this example is set up in the US East (N. Virginia) `us-east-1` region. So the actual link is `https://us-east-1.console.aws.amazon.com/lambda/home.`<br>2. Click **Create Function** \\> **Author from scratch** and create your function. For this example, we have added and/or selected the following options:<br>    <br>   <br>   - **Function name:** `cloudEcho`<br>     <br>   - **Runtime:** `Node.js 16.x`, since we're implementing Javascript-based Lambda function<br>     <br>   - **Execution role:** `Create a new role with basic Lambda permissions`<br>     <br>   - **Advanced Settings:** `Enable function URL` has been checked and `Auth type` was set to `None`.<br>     <br>![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/285341837_722709605641441_1567898070320340109_n.jpg?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=J7i6jZzuQdAQ7kNvwEGrKak&_nc_oc=AdmnFFQC6MNE3zszl9Vl4Jk2JFVkqU1c8qJamiFR__OS5tkGcJQX5LKl8hHVy9O5xSQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYFOTEC__wIPaE546f6UMXhMHiC9thh4_1bY1_xYkyayRQ&oe=67F69385) _The Advanced Settings look like this:_![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/292326682_3218865795023663_194500405978298967_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=i3z9U0HUrBEQ7kNvwGtbuQu&_nc_oc=AdlL9Ldjvrl_QakmS5AntGSquAPRn_irqsDC0yoDNSt-pBnDGcdmOoqKeQZnJsxQzOA&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYF31_-L1p2pJ6L8go1rFPmrzJ0GyoodYfgO_W-BwJdjyw&oe=67F6778D)<br>3. Click **Create Function**. <br>4. Once the function is created, you are redirected to the function page. There, you can see the following information:<br>   - The function's URL ending in `.lambda-url.AWS_REGION.on.aws/`. Save that for later use.<br>     <br>   - The **Code source** tab for that function.<br>5. Inside your function's **Code Source**, you need to add code that does the following:<br>    <br>    <br>   <br>   - Only accepts `GET` and `POST` requests<br>     <br>   - Verifies using the `GET` request described [here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/getting-started#verification-requests).<br>     <br>   - Replies to the message based on the message payload structure described [here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#text-messages).<br>     <br> <br> <br> The code sample to be copied and pasted is:<br> <br> <br>```<br>const https = require(\"https\");<br>exports.handler = async (event)  => {<br>  const VERIFY_TOKEN = \"Set_your_verify_token_value_here\";<br>  const WHATSAPP_TOKEN = \"Paste_whatsapp_access_token_here\";<br>  let response;<br>  if (event?.requestContext?.http?.method === \"GET\") {<br>    // https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/webhooks/getting-started#verification-requests<br>    // to learn more about GET request for webhook verification<br>    let queryParams = event?.queryStringParameters;<br>    if (queryParams != null) {<br>      const mode = queryParams[\"hub.mode\"];<br>      if (mode == \"subscribe\") {<br>        const verifyToken = queryParams[\"hub.verify_token\"];<br>        if (verifyToken == VERIFY_TOKEN) {<br>          let challenge = queryParams[\"hub.challenge\"];<br>          response = {<br>              \"statusCode\": 200,<br>              \"body\": parseInt(challenge),<br>              \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>          };<br>        } else {<br>          const responseBody = \"Error, wrong validation token\";<br>          response = {<br>              \"statusCode\": 403,<br>              \"body\": JSON.stringify(responseBody),<br>              \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>          };<br>        }<br>      } else {<br>          const responseBody = \"Error, wrong mode\";<br>          response = {<br>              \"statusCode\": 403,<br>              \"body\": JSON.stringify(responseBody),<br>              \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>        };<br>      }<br>    }<br>    else {<br>      const responseBody = \"Error, no query parameters\";<br>      response = {<br>          \"statusCode\": 403,<br>          \"body\": JSON.stringify(responseBody),<br>          \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>      };<br>    }<br>  } else if (event?.requestContext?.http?.method === \"POST\") {<br>    // process POST request (WhatsApp chat messages)<br>    // https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#text-messages<br>    // to learn about WhatsApp text message payload structure<br>    let body = JSON.parse(event.body)<br>    let entries = body.entry;<br>    for (let entry of entries) {<br>      for (let change of entry.changes) {<br>        let value = change.value;<br>        if(value != null) {<br>          let phone_number_id = value.metadata.phone_number_id;<br>          if (value.messages != null) {<br>            for (let message of value.messages) {<br>              if (message.type === 'text') {<br>                let from = message.from;<br>                let message_body = message.text.body;<br>                let reply_message = \"Ack from AWS lambda: \" + message_body;<br>                sendReply(phone_number_id, WHATSAPP_TOKEN, from, reply_message);<br>                const responseBody = \"Done\";<br>                response = {<br>                    \"statusCode\": 200,<br>                    \"body\": JSON.stringify(responseBody),<br>                    \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>                };<br>              }<br>            }<br>          }<br>        }<br>      }<br>    }<br>  } else {<br>    const responseBody = \"Unsupported method\";<br>    response = {<br>        \"statusCode\": 403,<br>        \"body\": JSON.stringify(responseBody),<br>        \"isBase64Encoded\": false<br>    };<br>  }<br>  <br>  return response;<br>}<br>const sendReply = (phone_number_id, whatsapp_token, to, reply_message) => {<br>  let json = {<br>    messaging_product: \"whatsapp\",<br>    to: to,<br>    text: { body: reply_message },<br>  };<br>  let data = JSON.stringify(json);<br>  let path = \"/v12.0/\"+phone_number_id+\"/messages?access_token=\"+whatsapp_token;<br>  let options = {<br>    host: \"graph.facebook.com\",<br>    path: path,<br>    method: \"POST\",<br>    headers: { \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\" }<br>  };<br>  let callback = (response) => {<br>    let str = \"\";<br>    response.on(\"data\", (chunk) => {<br>      str += chunk;<br>    });<br>    response.on(\"end\", () => {<br>    });<br>  };<br>  let req = https.request(options, callback);<br>  req.on(\"error\", (e) => {});<br>  req.write(data);<br>  req.end();<br>}<br>```<br>[Copy Code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-whatsapp-echo-bot#)<br>6. Once you paste the code, you will see the **Changes not deployed** banner pop up. _Do not deploy your function yet! We need to set verify token and access token before that._<br> **In Meta for Developers:** <br>1. Open **Meta for Developers** \\> **[My Apps](https://developers.facebook.com/apps)** and select the app you have created while following the [getting started workflow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started). Click **WhatsApp** \\> **Getting started**.<br>2. Copy the temporary access token:<br>    ![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281757444_734168554403466_603911146048087076_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=C5Yhw-w9ZxgQ7kNvwG0tifb&_nc_oc=AdkE0mllP-IqBMy5QTFV36sj6O7jym8iI0GOWuTlvvTWGCb5o7IOOHZG5sgGgFRUw-Q&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYGKw__GNsGBgdx6AZe_wXV_3B1kdB35uh20E2SP-Lamcg&oe=67F69475)<br>   <br>**In AWS:** <br>1. Paste the access token into your Lambda function. Then, set up the `VERIFY_TOKEN` field in your Lambda function. For this example, we're using `blue_panda`.<br>    ![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/286078607_371569038313883_8206283804632562837_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=r32qVDsdtdAQ7kNvwGqZ2az&_nc_oc=AdkPY6BiLr26oSz_7r516q_Zs5tZBq3mhei5LIzbA-0sAwsS1qQSGQfg34KMn65k-Jk&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYGdmXtHRzJx0KcQlkIuwPferVeZ4gqAoSxMyWDgdhKRNA&oe=67F671FE)<br>2. Click **Deploy**.<br> **In Meta for Developers:** <br>1. Open **Meta for Developers** \\> **[My Apps](https://developers.facebook.com/apps)** and select the app you have created while following the [getting started workflow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started). Click **WhatsApp** \\> **Configuration** \\> **Configure a webhook**.<br>2. Under **Callback URL**, paste your Lambda function URL (this is the URL that was generated immediately after the function was created). Under **Verify Token**, paste the token you created after pasting your access token (for our example, we're using `blue_panda`):<br>    ![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/286356523_572748934268377_3236110523873785159_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=mGQfNZWzyV4Q7kNvwGRM1Gi&_nc_oc=AdlNxwBp4WqPwluT4zKcbNGm-e5LRWUEjm-H2Hk-_eZSq03jMGgLLof2DzBZd4g0azY&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYHog7L9Ocs1Dk5bqr6Yz-YGkVMXbNyZz-86t9__WJMCSw&oe=67F698D8)<br>3. Click **Verify and Save**.<br>4. Once verification is successful, click **Manage** back in the Configuration page:<br>    ![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/292764351_1069382513688257_4510917661209645760_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=1QPlfxJYmzQQ7kNvwHB-Mzh&_nc_oc=AdlGC1-bWYlhrE154ZTOvOudlxjQ4nLFJJjQCheKm5Mja-c3NDwVky6TsvHpxgkzOO8&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYEx5BpkDgIhAbqu_0l8iGOBW3d_VBW8-bmjFToWJK_0RA&oe=67F6A01E)<br>5. A new dialog module opens up with all available objects you can subscribe to. Click **Subscribe** for the `messages` object. Then, click **Done**.![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/281510144_360890122685772_3740430755168333724_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=3P1mH_M9Uj0Q7kNvwE488Vb&_nc_oc=Adnsx366Nt6YyQt_auBMb8YD1uACmziQumYHXASc_VKfbuV5HAyE6U8NVrKVfPe7DCw&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=1RV6qg2sEKzuMXJ6JGoSbA&oh=00_AYHJV0YotDa2mmpwX1ggxXL8rlASU1dYW0OVqVLkD1TUwA&oe=67F68039)<br>6. You are done setting up the echo bot! Now, when you send a message to the API number on WhatsApp, it should send back your message in the following format \"Ack from AWS lambda: {your message}\". |\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Set up the WhatsApp Echo Send an Order Details message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#1--send-an-order-details-message)\n\n[2\\. Send an Order Status Update](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#2--send-an-order-status-update)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n\n# Boleto\n\nThis feature is not publicly available yet and is only available for businesses based in Brazil and their Brazillian customers. To enable payments for your businesses, please contact your Solution Partner.\n\nPayments API also enables businesses to collect payments from their customers via WhatsApp using Boleto.\n\nWhen using this integration, WhatsApp only facilitates the communication between merchants and buyers. Merchants are responsible for integrating with a PSP from which they can generate Boleto codes, and confirm their payment.\n\n## Before You Start\n\n1. Familiarize yourself with the [Orders API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orders). Orders are the entrypoint for collecting payments in WhatsApp.\n2. You will need an existing integration with a PSP to generate Boleto codes and do automatic reconciliation when a payment is made.\n3. You must update the order status as soon as a payment is made.\n\n## Integration steps\n\nThe following sequence diagram shows the typical integration with Boleto.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/461217259_896621288982580_8943165188071572548_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=YfarOUP-kM0Q7kNvwEx_iRW&_nc_oc=AdkIbJgMGG89yk5ah-HGGHVhKNTMYLRs-yGhEkNjt0Jt3cjYGEg3zJVJpIz36F08LKQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=X43F3Cs1uf4UYeVSk_KWXQ&oh=00_AYE-If2w6sUW5I9HKwB8U-V8qTQpa_I0qMK-iyFjS8jlnA&oe=67F69C68)\n\n### 1\\. Send an Order Details message\n\nFollow the full integration guide in the [Orders API page](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orders).\n\nIf Boleto payment is available on this order, you will need to provide a `boleto` object in the `payment_settings` attribute.\n\n#### Pararmeters Object\n\n| Field Name | Optional? | Type | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `payment_settings` | Optional | [Payment Settings Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#paymentsettingsobject) | List of payment related configuration objects. |\n\n#### Payment Settings\n\n| Field Name | Optional? | Type | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `type` | Required | String | Must be `boleto`. |\n| `boleto` | Required | [Boleto Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#boletoobject) | Boleto object that will be used to render the option to buyers during the checkout flow. |\n\n#### Boleto Object\n\n| **Field Name** | **Optional?** | **Type** | **Description** |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `digitable_line` | Required | String | The Boleto digitable line / code which will be copied to the clipboard, when user taps on the Boleto CTA button. |\n\n#### Payload example\n\n```\nPOST: /v1/messages\n{\n \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n \"to\": \"[recipient-wa-id]\",\n \"type\": \"interactive\",\n \"interactive\": {\n   \"type\": \"order_details\",\n   \"body\": {\n     \"text\": \"Your message content\"\n   },\n   \"action\": {\n     \"name\": \"review_and_pay\",\n     \"parameters\": {\n       \"reference_id\": \"unique-reference-id\",\n       \"type\": \"digital-goods\",\n       \"payment_type\": \"br\",\n       \"payment_settings\": [\\\n         {\\\n           \"type\": \"boleto\",\\\n           \"boleto\": {\\\n             \"digitable_line\": \"03399026944140000002628346101018898510000008848\",\\\n           }\\\n         }\\\n       ],\n       \"currency\": \"BRL\",\n       \"total_amount\": {\n         \"value\": 50000,\n         \"offset\": 100\n       },\n       \"order\": {\n         \"status\": \"pending\",\n         \"tax\": {\n           \"value\": 0,\n           \"offset\": 100,\n           \"description\": \"optional text\"\n           },\n         \"items\": [\\\n           {\\\n             \"retailer_id\": \"1234567\",\\\n             \"name\": \"Cake\",\\\n             \"amount\": {\\\n               \"value\": 50000,\\\n               \"offset\": 100\\\n             },\\\n             \"quantity\": 1\\\n           }\\\n         ],\n         \"subtotal\": {\n           \"value\": 50000,\n           \"offset\": 100\n         }\n       }\n     }\n   }\n }\n}\n```\n\n### 2\\. Send an Order Status Update\n\nOnce the payment is confirmed, you must send an order status update. Follow the integration guide in the [Orders API page](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/orders).\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Boleto](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#boleto)\n\n[Before You Start](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#before-you-start)\n\n[Integration steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#integration-steps)\n\n[1\\. Send an Order Details message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#1--send-an-order-details-message)\n\n[2\\. Send an Order Status Update](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br/boleto#2--send-an-order-status-update)\n\n* *
