[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#text-messages)\n\n[Sending Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#sending-text-messages)\n\n[Request Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Link Preview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#link-preview)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#example-response)\n\n# Text Messages\n\nText messages are messages containing only a text body and an optional link preview.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440742591_797870012016470_1123226266833971975_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=7ya5tyyO2t4Q7kNvwFVysgb&_nc_oc=Adnhq9ieBG--VH7RfukwlP6heaL_aIEg2K--8WUu0qxLvZnI1vzJ7VaWNk2rnEjO8go&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=cBFiSDgLlt3K0PlSmodDyg&oh=00_AYEz7ZNbvnmCZHBz43JUshjxDHywbNQzWO3j0d4RbWD2ug&oe=680AFA6B)\n\n## Sending Text Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send a text message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"text\",\n  \"text\": {\n    \"preview_url\": <ENABLE_LINK_PREVIEW>,\n    \"body\": \"<BODY_TEXT>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<BODY_TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Message body text. Supports URLs.<br>Maximum 4096 characters. | `As requested, here's the link to our latest product: https://www.meta.com/quest/quest-3/` |\n| `<ENABLE_LINK_PREVIEW>`<br>_Boolean_ | **Optional.**<br>Set to `true` to have the WhatsApp client attempt to render a link preview of any URL in the body text string.<br>See [Link Preview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#link-preview) below. | `true` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Link Preview\n\nYou can have the WhatsApp client attempt to render a preview of the first URL in the body text string, if it contains one. URLs must begin with `http://` or `https://`. If multiple URLs are in the body text string, only the first URL will be rendered.\n\nIf omitted, or if unable to retrieve a link preview, a clickable link will be rendered instead.\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send a text message with link previews enabled and a body text string that contains a link.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"text\",\n  \"text\": {\n    \"preview_url\": true,\n    \"body\": \"As requested, here'\\''s the link to our latest product: https://www.meta.com/quest/quest-3/\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#text-messages)\n\n[Sending Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#sending-text-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Link Preview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#link-preview)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages#example-response)\n\n* * [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending a Flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/flows-templates#sending-a-flow)\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/467179990_582893330879738_1534232517322631641_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=UiIZ9_pPw1AQ7kNvwHtbEqB&_nc_oc=AdlVxF67bA-Q3i3N8UkI5KvchIiqJea3fo668Yii5Vx92BOCRIzv5QlHwqKAuyqNs74&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=oJA6ejQf8HpbH3F-WY8yBw&oh=00_AYFm1t6NL-AU69G6Mu6zvQ8OEEpeT3KZd3AibNpIo6FuJA&oe=680AE45A)\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Sending a Flow\n\nYou can quickly build Whatsapp Flow in the [playground](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/flows/playground) and send it as as a [template message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates), for example as part of a marketing campaign.\nOr you can create a [WhatsApp Flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/flows) and send it either as a [normal message](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages#flows-messages).\n\n[Go here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/conversation-types) to read more about message types, limits, and timing.\n\nTo send the Flow as a template, first you need to [create a template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/whats-app-business-account/message_templates/#Creating). Here is an example request:\n\n```\ncurl -i -X POST \\\nhttps://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/<waba-id>/message_templates \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d'\n{\n  \"name\": \"example_template_name\",\n  \"language\": \"en_US\",\n  \"category\": \"MARKETING\",\n  \"components\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"body\",\\\n      \"text\": \"This is a flows as template demo\"\\\n    },\\\n    {\\\n      \"type\": \"BUTTONS\",\\\n      \"buttons\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"type\": \"FLOW\",\\\n          \"text\": \"Sign up\",\\\n          \"flow_action\": \"navigate\",\\\n          \"navigate_screen\": \"WELCOME_SCREEN\"\\\n          \"flow_json\" : \"{    \\\"version\\\": \\\"3.1\\\",    \\\"screens\\\": [        {            \\\"id\\\": \\\"WELCOME_SCREEN\\\",            \\\"layout\\\": {                \\\"type\\\": \\\"SingleColumnLayout\\\",                \\\"children\\\": [                    {                        \\\"type\\\": \\\"TextHeading\\\",                        \\\"text\\\": \\\"Hello World\\\"                    },                    {                        \\\"type\\\": \\\"TextBody\\\",                        \\\"text\\\": \\\"Let\\'s start building things!\\\"                    },                    {                        \\\"type\\\": \\\"Footer\\\",                        \\\"label\\\": \\\"Complete\\\",                        \\\"on-click-action\\\": {                            \\\"name\\\": \\\"complete\\\",                            \\\"payload\\\": {}                        }                    }                ]            },            \\\"title\\\": \\\"Welcome\\\",            \\\"terminal\\\": true,            \\\"success\\\": true,            \\\"data\\\": {}        }    ]}\"\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}'\n```\n\n| Property | Type | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `buttons.flow_json` | String | The Flow JSON encoded as string. Specifies the layout of the flow to be attached to the Template. The Flow JSON can be quickly generated in the [Flow playground](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/flows/playground). For full reference see [Flow JSON documentation](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/flows/reference/flowjson)<br>Cannot be used if the `flow_id` attribute is provided. Only one of the parameters is allowed. |\n| `buttons.flow_id` | String | `id` of a flow<br>Cannot be used if the `flow_json` attribute is provided. Only one of the parameters is allowed. |\n| `buttons.navigate_screen` | String | Flow JSON screen name. Required if flow\\_action is `navigate` |\n| `buttons.flow_action` | Enum | `navigate` or `data_exchange`. Default value is `navigate` |\n\nSee [here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/components#flows-buttons) for more details.\n\n#### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"id\": \"<template-id>\",\n  \"status\": \"PENDING\",\n  \"category\": \"MARKETING\"\n}\n```\n\nEnsure that your template passes all required reviews so that `status` is `APPROVED` instead of `PENDING`.\n\nNow you can send a template message with a flow using the following request:\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"TEMPLATE_NAME\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"LANGUAGE_AND_LOCALE_CODE\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"flow\",\\\n        \"index\": \"0\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"flow_token\": \"FLOW_TOKEN\",   //optional, default is \"unused\"\\\n              \"flow_action_data\": {\\\n                 ...\\\n              }   // optional, json object with the data payload for the first screen\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n#### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"<phone-number>\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"<phone-number>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"<message-id>\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending a Flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/flows-templates#sending-a-flow)\n\n* * Instagram](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/458971466_433154499741175_6962021715663093697_n.png?_nc_cat=1&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=6jy_gHtbRYkQ7kNvwFcIReC&_nc_oc=AdkUkPaT99uoyLgsvxpkx5VOwJGtvTBO5XckQIa1Y5dTGSsb9R5TEVgDw53QWM_D6vQ&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=oJA6ejQf8HpbH3F-WY8yBw&oh=00_AYEvtgkH_PTml8OgTjpVMMsZOG0eV4sNdMNMswY8hhySQg&oe=680AE34E)](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fmetafordevelopers%2F&h=AT3ufnrGBu-UUoqKfPESjEfu5ur7AOwIeXy7Mek2SuqCfKPRaahWyOFCq1priRukePZtetqQq7yX22DlQr4hy5oW67ClxD90mwyPCtbBHEM0gdtMiGVYyeW0b45LzMezrrr6Tm11YM7bNQ)[![Follow     "markdown": "[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n[iframe](/common/referer_frame.php?cb=1)\n\n![](https://facebook.com/security/hsts-pixel.gif)\n\n[![](https://developers.facebook.com/images/developer/m4d_logo_july_2024.svg)](https://developers.facebook.com/?no_redirect=1)\n\n[Docs](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/) [Tools](https://developers.facebook.com/tools/) [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/support/)\n\n[Log In](https://business.facebook.com/business/loginpage/?next=https%3A%2F%2Fdevelopers.facebook.com%2Fdocs%2Fwhatsapp%2Fcloud-api%2Freference%2Fmedia%3Fnav_ref%3Dbiz_unified_f3_login_page_to_dfc&app=436761779744620&login_options%5B0%5D=FB&login_options%5B1%5D=SSO&is_work_accounts=1&config_ref=biz_login_tool_flavor_dfc)\n\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\n- [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)\n- [Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n- [Get Started for Solution Partners](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-solution-partners)\n- [Get Started for Tech Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Solutions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/multi-partner-solutions)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Media\n\nWhatsApp Business Blog\n\n- [Sending WhatsApp Media Messages From An App](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fbusiness.whatsapp.com%2Fblog%2Fmedia-messages-via-app&h=AT3ASPkDbpZClLkknXDyJUrM0L04pMcyjHYn5INXqDkaWBgve1Hb-htVWHRPrfaJhTFrRyYugc2T13xphEHG-RlsRx0_1e0GNdWozvsFoiAm4SFadR3NMqVsf9TJXr0tzNNW97FvW4z-iQ)\n\nYou use 4 different endpoints to manage your media:\n\n| Endpoint | Uses |\n| --- | --- |\n| [`POST /PHONE_NUMBER_ID/media`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) | Upload media. |\n| [`GET /MEDIA_ID`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#retrieve-media-url) | Retrieve the URL for a specific media. |\n| [`DELETE /MEDIA_ID`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#delete-media) | Delete a specific media. |\n| [`GET /MEDIA_URL`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#download-media) | Download media from a media URL. |\n\nSee [Supported Media Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types) for supported types and size limits.\n\n## Get Media ID\n\nTo complete some of the following API calls, you need to have a media ID. There are two ways to get this ID:\n\n1. **From the API call**: Once you have successfully uploaded media files to the API, the media ID is included in the response to your call.\n2. **From Webhooks**: When a business account receives a media message, it downloads the media and uploads it to the Cloud API automatically. That event triggers the Webhooks and sends you a notification that includes the media ID.\n\n## Upload Media\n\nTo upload media, make a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/media` and include the parameters listed below. All media files sent through this endpoint are encrypted and persist for 30 days, unless they are deleted earlier.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/media`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Developers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.<br>Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `file` | **Required.**<br>Path to the file stored in your local directory. For example: \"@/local/path/file.jpg\". |\n| `type` | **Required.**<br>Type of media file being uploaded. See [Supported Media Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types) for more information. |\n| `messaging_product` | **Required.**<br>Messaging service used for the request. In this case, use `whatsapp`. |\n\n### Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/<API_VERSION>/<PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/media' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS_TOKEN>' \\\n-F 'messaging_product=whatsapp' \\\n-F 'file=@<FILE_PATH_AND_NAME>;type=<MIME_TYPE>'\n```\n\n### Response\n\nUpon success:\n\n```\n{\n  \"id\": \"<MEDIA_ID>\"\n}\n```\n\n### Example request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/media' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-F 'messaging_product=whatsapp' \\\n-F 'file=@/media/template_assets/black_friday_2025.mp4;type=video/mp4'\n```\n\n### Example response\n\n```\n{\n  \"id\": \"1037543291543636\"\n}\n```\n\n## Retrieve Media URL\n\nTo retrieve your media’s URL, send a GET request to `/MEDIA_ID`. Use the returned URL to download the media file. Note that clicking this URL (i.e. performing a generic GET) will not return the media; you must include an access token. See [Download Media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#download-media).\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/MEDIA_ID` | Developers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.<br>Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `phone_number_id` | **Optional.**<br>Business phone number ID. If included, the operation will only be processed if the ID matches the ID of the business phone number that the media was uploaded on. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X GET 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/<MEDIA_ID>/' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS_TOKEN>'\n```\n\nA successful response includes an object with a media url. The URL is only valid for 5 minutes. To use this URL, see [Download Media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#download-media).\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"url\": \"<URL>\",\n  \"mime_type\": \"<MIME_TYPE>\",\n  \"sha256\": \"<HASH>\",\n  \"file_size\": \"<FILE_SIZE>\",\n  \"id\": \"<MEDIA_ID>\"\n}\n```\n\n## Delete Media\n\nTo delete media, make a `DELETE` call to the ID of the media you want to delete.\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X DELETE 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/<MEDIA_ID>' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS_TOKEN>'\n```\n\nSample response:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `phone_number_id` | **Optional.**<br>Business phone number ID. If included, the operation will only be processed if the ID matches the ID of the business phone number that the media was uploaded on. |\n\n## Download Media\n\nTo download media, make a `GET` call to your media’s URL. All media URLs expire after 5 minutes —you need to retrieve the media URL again if it expires. If you directly click on the URL you get from a `/MEDIA_ID GET` call, you get an access error.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/MEDIA_ID` | Developers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.<br>Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` permission. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl  \\\n 'URL' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' > media_file\n```\n\nIf successful, you will receive the binary data of media saved in media\\_file, response headers contain a content-type header to indicate the mime type of returned data. Check [supported media types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types) for more information.\n\nIf media fails to download, you will receive a `404 Not Found` response code. In that case, we recommend you try to [retrieve a new media URL](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#retrieve-media-url) and download it again. If doing so doesn't resolve the issue, please try to renew the `ACCESS_TOKEN` then retry downloading the media.\n\n## Supported Media Types\n\n### Audio\n\n| Audio Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| AAC | .aac | audio/aac | 16 MB |\n| AMR | .amr | audio/amr | 16 MB |\n| MP3 | .mp3 | audio/mpeg | 16 MB |\n| MP4 Audio | .m4a | audio/mp4 | 16 MB |\n| OGG Audio | .ogg | audio/ogg (OPUS codecs only; base audio/ogg not supported.) | 16 MB |\n\n### Document\n\n| Document Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| Text | .txt | text/plain | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Excel | .xls | application/vnd.ms-excel | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Excel | .xlsx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Word | .doc | application/msword | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Word | .docx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft PowerPoint | .ppt | application/vnd.ms-powerpoint | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft PowerPoint | .pptx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation | 100 MB |\n| PDF | .pdf | application/pdf | 100 MB |\n\n### Image\n\nImages must be 8-bit, RGB or RGBA.\n\n\n\n| Image Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| JPEG | .jpeg | image/jpeg | 5 MB |\n| PNG | .png | image/png | 5 MB |\n\n### Sticker\n\nWebP images can only be sent in [sticker messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/sticker-messages).\n\n| Sticker Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| Animated sticker | .webp | image/webp | 500 KB |\n| Static sticker | .webp | image/webp | 100 KB |\n\n### Video\n\n\nOnly H.264 video codec and AAC audio codec supported. Single audio stream or no audio stream only.\n\n\n\n| Video Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| 3GPP | .3gp | video/3gpp | 16 MB |\n| MP4 Video | .mp4 | video/mp4 | 16 MB |\n\n## Media message download constraints\n\nThe maximum supported file size for media messages on Cloud API is 100MB. In the event the customer sends a file that is greater than 100MB, you will receive a webhook with error code [131052](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes#other-errors) and `title`:\n\n_\"Media file size too big. Max file size we currently support: 100MB. Please communicate with your customer to send a media file that is smaller than 100MB\"_.\n\nWe advise that you send customers a warning message that their media file exceeds the maximum file size when this webhook event is triggered.\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\n* *     "markdown": "![](https://facebook.com/security/hsts-pixel.gif)\n\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\n- [Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/overview)\n- [Get Started](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started)\n- [Get Started for Solution Partners](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-solution-partners)\n- [Get Started for Tech Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Solutions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/multi-partner-solutions)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\nCloud API\n\n\n# Cashfree Payment Gateway Integration Guide\n\n## Purpose\n\nThe purpose of this document is to lay down the payment integration with Cashfree that is required for a merchant or Solution Partner that has setup a chatbot using WhatsApp Business APIs and needs to receive payments from WhatsApp users.\n\nThis document covers the set of APIs that need to be integrated and how the integration works in tandem with the WhatsApp Business API integration. For additional details regarding Cashfree payment integration, please refer to the Cashfree documentation.\n\nWhere this fits into the entire flow in terms of integration to the WA P2M product : The following document covers the requests, responses in red in the flow diagram below.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-1.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.8562-6/328293072_1097758891623100_4239195193269924014_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=f537c7&_nc_ohc=igUP2cEL-uAQ7kNvwGuSfpV&_nc_oc=AdmE11IoEqDwB2dCSmnXBp7iykRgIlzSAZeCb40AaZY4shXc2S8qJrRvXZBDKO__szg&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-1.xx&_nc_gid=nEcnj2j7MU2mbh1ztCkQHA&oh=00_AYGqSJgk94O0jnPFTyHt1ShW2vvH6Y8ebNJVR_RhYW8pug&oe=67F683C2)\n\n## Cashfree Payment Integration\n\n### Setup\n\n- Obtain credentials (client id and secret) from Cashfree dashboard after setting up the account.\n- Obtain the merchant vpa, mcc and purpose code from Cashfree. This will be used to set up the [payment configuration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#before-you-start) on WhatsApp. Multiple vpas are supported and hence multiple payment configurations can be set up. Each payment configuration should have one VPA.\n\n### Create order\n\nThis creates the order at Cashfree end.\n\n[Reference doc](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.cashfree.com%2Freference%2Fcreateorder&h=AT1r2qdfCM9G4BTwAaTjb5phVHmsLCh6Du17T7GsaVOiXKYhtsjV9qul8SyOCe1ub3iaHgAledLLJ_-0MfmuGzys45j9b0zfUAslBxwTehd8JMGa6I-bGqaQ_FVPf4mOLihy1i2Yxe-Z1w)\n\n#### Request\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n     --url https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders \\ // Production URL : https://api.cashfree.com/pg/orders\n     --header 'accept: application/json' \\\n     --header 'content-type: application/json' \\\n     --header 'x-api-version: 2022-09-01' \\\n     --header 'x-client-id: 26268833355ef02b8ff299390c886262' \\\n     --header 'x-client-secret: 1708cc38a3c1c3c2512d79b3530dc5cc65ad2fde' \\\n     --data '\n    {\n     \"customer_details\": {\n          \"customer_id\": \"7112AAA812234\",\n          \"customer_email\": \"john@cashfree.com\",\n          \"customer_phone\": \"9908734801\",\n          \"customer_bank_account_number\": \"1518121112\",\n          \"customer_bank_ifsc\": \"CITI0000001\",\n          \"customer_bank_code\": 3333\n     },\n     \"order_meta\": {\n          \"notify_url\": \"https://b8af79f41056.eu.ngrok.io/webhook.php\", // Notification URL where status notifications sent - can be different for different merchants\n          \"payment_methods\": \"upi\"\n     },\n      \"order_tags\": {\n          \"channel\": \"WhatsApp\" // Custom tag\n     },\n     \"order_id\": \"order02\",\n     \"order_amount\": 200.5,\n     \"order_currency\": \"INR\",\n     \"order_expiry_time\": \"2022-12-29T00:00:00Z\",\n     \"order_note\": \"Test order\"\n    }\n```\n\n#### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"cf_order_id\": 3401407,\n  \"created_at\": \"2022-12-26T14:11:07+05:30\",\n  \"customer_details\": {\n    \"customer_id\": \"7112AAA812234\",\n    \"customer_name\": null,\n    \"customer_email\": \"john@cashfree.com\",\n    \"customer_phone\": \"9908734801\"\n  },\n  \"entity\": \"order\",\n  \"order_amount\": 200.5,\n  \"order_currency\": \"INR\",\n  \"order_expiry_time\": \"2022-12-29T05:30:00+05:30\",\n  \"order_id\": \"order02\",\n  \"order_meta\": {\n    \"return_url\": null,\n    \"notify_url\": \"https://b8af79f41056.eu.ngrok.io/webhook.php\",\n    \"payment_methods\": \"upi\"\n  },\n  \"order_note\": \"Test order\",\n  \"order_splits\": [],\n  \"order_status\": \"ACTIVE\",\n  \"order_tags\": {\n    \"channel\": \"WhatsApp\" // Custom tag\n  },\n  \"payment_session_id\": \"session_364o8HjN0-gc6n_n4EBEPOXriJUJvCeVIdy9u8ihOhwvpNg9F1wMorWmkVxUR90kTe473bpbotNxyZ6Fze8M0w42_BpTxoEWsbBR21y7i0nh\",\n  \"payments\": {\n    \"url\": \"https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/order02/payments\" // production URL’s are different\n  },\n  \"refunds\": {\n    \"url\": \"https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/order02/refunds\"\n  },\n  \"settlements\": {\n    \"url\": \"https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/order02/settlements\"\n  },\n  \"terminal_data\": null\n}\n```\n\n### Order Pay\n\nThis API returns the UPI intent url that contains the parameters required for the WhatsApp APIs.\n[Reference doc](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.cashfree.com%2Freference%2Forderpay&h=AT0HFITLS5BXYTE7r1fxBrSb2Id6F9FFBzHgejztb2xERSZIyEDzK_18imAuD9NQVzV49xQQFDFLK3ROjk4C6HJSYzPN8O1cYEceFDoDPMPRIOaL1Y2YsxRgH44Re_x1pYbTsV4FlmDa3w)\n\n#### Request\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n     --url https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/sessions \\\n     --header 'accept: application/json' \\\n     --header 'content-type: application/json' \\\n     --header 'x-api-version: 2022-09-01' \\\n     --data '\n    {\n     \"payment_method\": {\n          \"upi\": {\n               \"channel\": \"link\",\n               \"upi_id\": \"rajnandan1@okhdfcbak\",\n               \"upi_expiry_minutes\": 10\n          }\n     },\n     \"payment_session_id\": \"session_364o8HjN0-gc6n_n4EBEPOXriJUJvCeVIdy9u8ihOhwvpNg9F1wMorWmkVxUR90kTe473bpbotNxyZ6Fze8M0w42_BpTxoEWsbBR21y7i0nh\" // this is from the create order API response\n    }\n\n```\n\n#### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"action\": \"custom\",\n  \"cf_payment_id\": 885899755, // is the transaction ID, is also present in UPI url\n  \"channel\": \"link\",\n  \"data\": {\n    \"url\": null,\n    \"payload\": {\n      \"bhim\": \"https://payments-test.cashfree.com/pgbillpayuiapi/simulator/885899755?txnId=885899755&amount=200.50&pa=cashfree@testbank&pn=Cashfree&tr=885899755&am=200.50&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5732&tn=Cashfree%20Simulator%20Payment\",\n      \"default\": \"https://payments-test.cashfree.com/pgbillpayuiapi/simulator/885899755?txnId=885899755&amount=200.50&pa=cashfree@testbank&pn=Cashfree&tr=885899755&am=200.50&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5732&tn=Cashfree%20Simulator%20Payment\",\n      \"gpay\": \"https://payments-test.cashfree.com/pgbillpayuiapi/simulator/885899755?txnId=885899755&amount=200.50&pa=cashfree@testbank&pn=Cashfree&tr=885899755&am=200.50&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5732&tn=Cashfree%20Simulator%20Payment\",\n      \"paytm\": \"https://payments-test.cashfree.com/pgbillpayuiapi/simulator/885899755?txnId=885899755&amount=200.50&pa=cashfree@testbank&pn=Cashfree&tr=885899755&am=200.50&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5732&tn=Cashfree%20Simulator%20Payment\",\n      \"phonepe\": \"https://payments-test.cashfree.com/pgbillpayuiapi/simulator/885899755?txnId=885899755&amount=200.50&pa=cashfree@testbank&pn=Cashfree&tr=885899755&am=200.50&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5732&tn=Cashfree%20Simulator%20Payment\",\n      \"web\": \"https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/view/upi/qcrgfb.session_364o8HjN0-gc6n_n4EBEPOXriJUJvCeVIdy9u8ihOhwvpNg9F1wMorWmkVxUR90kTe473bpbotNxyZ6Fze8M0w42_BpTxoEWsbBR21y7i0nh.c252cd27-c877-4a51-8352-837d04a2f4c2\"\n    },\n    \"content_type\": null,\n    \"method\": null\n  },\n  \"payment_amount\": 200.5,\n  \"payment_method\": \"upi\"\n}\n\n```\n\n### Parsing the response\n\nStore the cf\\_payment\\_id as a unique identifier of the payment at Cashfree end. As Cashfree supports multiple payments for a given order\\_id (or cf\\_order\\_id), storing the cf\\_payment\\_id is important for deduping multiple/duplicate payments (if they occur due to a bug or otherwise).\n\nExtract the key-value pairs in data.payload.default\n\n- Verify “am” to be the same as the amount that was set.\n- Use the value in “tr” as the reference\\_id while setting up the [Parameters object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#paramobject) to send the payment message using WhatsApp API.\n- The value of “pa” is the merchant vpa that will be used for this transaction. The payment configuration name corresponding to the vpa returned should be used as payment\\_configuration while setting up the [Parameters object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#paramobject) to send the payment message using WhatsApp API.\n- In case the merchant vpa obtained from above does not match with any of the vpas set in the WhatsApp payment configuration, payment should be discontinued. Please reach out to Cashfree to confirm the updated vpa and update the [WhatsApp payment configuration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#before-you-start) accordingly.\n- Also check whether the “mode” and “purpose” values are the same as those set in the payment configuration. In case of mismatch, log the mismatch to follow up with Cashfree about the right/updated values. Do not block the payment due to this mismatch.\n\n```\n\"default\": \"upi://pay?pa=cfsukoonaa@yesbank&pn=Sukoon&tr=877376394&am=10.00&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5399&tn=877376394\"\n```\n\n## Webhook\n\nOnce the user completes the payment on WhatsApp, Cashfree will send a webhook about payment completion. Please note that while WhatsApp also shares a payment completion signal, please rely on the signal from Cashfree for the final payment status to avoid reconciliation issues.\n\nBased on the payment\\_status in the webhook, [update the order status for the user using the WhatsApp API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#step-8--update-order-status).\n\n[Reference Guide](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.cashfree.com%2Fdocs%2Fpayment-webhooks&h=AT0BCmYEO39x9xXpWbOmh0PaZECsVlHFXibb1_7xowYdzd_YBt8cVE_LcV0CKd3X671SX9DjPj1T6qT2pYb7VjiDwZ_XdNhuhkZrw90dXgsH2D7t9XJ1a5PgRPBxt2xkLMb7L7u9Q1My8w)\n\n### Successful transaction webhook\n\n```\n{\n  \"data\": {\n    \"order\": {\n      \"order_id\": \"1633615918\",\n      \"order_amount\": 1.00,\n      \"order_currency\": \"INR\",\n      \"order_tags\": null\n    },\n    \"payment\": {\n      \"cf_payment_id\": 1107253,\n      \"payment_status\": \"SUCCESS\",\n      \"payment_amount\": 1.00,\n      \"payment_currency\": \"INR\",\n      \"payment_message\": \"Transaction pending\",\n      \"payment_time\": \"2021-10-07T19:42:40+05:30\",\n      \"bank_reference\": \"1903772466\",\n      \"auth_id\": null,\n      \"payment_method\": {\n        \"upi\": {\n          \"channel\":null,\n          \"upi_id\":\"miglaniyogesh7@okhdfcbank\" }\n                },\n       \"payment_group\":\"upi\"\n    \"customer_details\": {\n      \"customer_name\": \"Yogesh\",\n      \"customer_id\": \"12121212\",\n      \"customer_email\": \"yogesh.miglani@gmail.com\",\n      \"customer_phone\": \"9666699999\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"event_time\": \"2021-10-07T19:42:44+05:30\",\n  \"type\": \"PAYMENT_SUCCESS_WEBHOOK\"\n}\n\n```\n\n### Failed transaction webhook\n\n```\n{\n  \"data\": {\n    \"order\": {\n      \"order_id\": \"order_01\",\n      \"order_amount\": 2,\n      \"order_currency\": \"INR\",\n      \"order_tags\": null\n    },\n    \"payment\": {\n      \"cf_payment_id\": 975677709,\n      \"payment_status\": \"FAILED\",\n      \"payment_amount\": 2,\n      \"payment_currency\": \"INR\",\n      \"payment_message\": \"ZA::U19::Transaction fail\",\n      \"payment_time\": \"2022-05-25T14:28:22+05:30\",\n      \"bank_reference\": \"214568722700\",\n      \"auth_id\": null,\n      \"payment_method\": {\n        \"upi\": {\n          \"channel\": null,\n          \"upi_id\": \"9611199227@paytm\"\n        }\n      },\n      \"payment_group\": \"upi\"\n    },\n    \"customer_details\": {\n      \"customer_name\": null,\n      \"customer_id\": \"7112AAA812234\",\n      \"customer_email\": \"miglaniyogesh7@gmail.com\",\n      \"customer_phone\": \"9611199227\"\n    },\n    \"error_details\": {\n      \"error_code\": \"TRANSACTION_DECLINED\",\n      \"error_description\": \"issuer bank or payment service provider declined the transaction\",\n      \"error_reason\": \"auth_declined\",\n      \"error_source\": \"customer\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"event_time\": \"2022-05-25T14:28:38+05:30\",\n  \"type\": \"PAYMENT_FAILED_WEBHOOK\"\n}\n```\n\n## Status Check\n\nStatus api can be used as an alternative in case the webhook isn’t received within a certain timeframe. Based on the payment\\_status in the response, [update the order status for the user using the WhatsApp API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#step-8--update-order-status).\n\n[Reference Doc](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.cashfree.com%2Freference%2Fgetpaymentbyid&h=AT3CQSwOZ7GLuIFzogQnILW_gyADO7IPpffaXYeRfJ0MzsH8s5pUYa_yh4n74yFba8XACi_vohWPX54jgsKmj8aKmbAPWJSKC_ZoK8AlpvZffnBytf78vFkII_j1p_LKxYzgB9UTEsT9Dg)\n\n#### Request\n\n```\ncurl --request GET \\\n     --url https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/order02/payments/885899755 \\\n     --header 'accept: application/json' \\\n     --header 'x-api-version: 2022-09-01' \\\n     --header 'x-client-id: 26268833355ef02b8ff299390c886262' \\\n     --header 'x-client-secret: 1708cc38a3c1c3c2512d79b3530dc5cc65ad2fde'\n\n```\n\n#### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"auth_id\": null,\n  \"authorization\": null,\n  \"bank_reference\": null,\n  \"cf_payment_id\": 885704957,\n  \"entity\": \"payment\",\n  \"error_details\": null,\n  \"is_captured\": true,\n  \"order_amount\": 10.15,\n  \"order_id\": \"12345\",\n  \"payment_amount\": 10.15,\n  \"payment_completion_time\": \"2022-10-27T08:43:05+05:30\",\n  \"payment_currency\": \"INR\",\n  \"payment_group\": \"upi\",\n  \"payment_message\": \"Transaction Successful\",\n  \"payment_method\": {\n    \"upi\": {\n      \"channel\": \"link\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"payment_status\": \"SUCCESS\",\n  \"payment_time\": \"2022-10-27T08:42:07+05:30\"\n}\n\nOR\n\n{\n  \"auth_id\": null,\n  \"authorization\": null,\n  \"bank_reference\": null,\n  \"cf_payment_id\": 885899755,\n  \"entity\": \"payment\",\n  \"error_details\": null,\n  \"is_captured\": false,\n  \"order_amount\": 200.5,\n  \"order_id\": \"order02\",\n  \"payment_amount\": 200.5,\n  \"payment_completion_time\": \"2022-12-26T14:24:56+05:30\",\n  \"payment_currency\": \"INR\",\n  \"payment_gateway_details\": null,\n  \"payment_group\": \"upi\",\n  \"payment_message\": \"User dropped and did not complete the two factor authentication\",\n  \"payment_method\": {\n    \"upi\": {\n      \"channel\": \"link\",\n      \"upi_id\": \"987836150\"\n    }\n  },\n  \"payment_status\": \"USER_DROPPED\",\n  \"payment_time\": \"2022-12-26T14:14:56+05:30\"\n}\n\n```\n\n## Refund\n\nRefund api can be used to trigger refunds to the user.\n\n[Reference Doc](https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fdocs.cashfree.com%2Freference%2Fcreaterefund&h=AT1PzReaK-tQ6TIJQ1I3gRgT-n3KCNzjjV55bhPNPMPvX2biq09rk6dq0M4yEB8X-K_ut03eSWOxn2guyUgIMiwHdL7nazCoBDsJa4bFOc59K_h9qBQWgYf19JSSGx9jojEaScLXbzNyKA)\n\n#### Request\n\n```\ncurl --request POST \\\n     --url https://sandbox.cashfree.com/pg/orders/12345/refunds \\\n     --header 'accept: application/json' \\\n     --header 'content-type: application/json' \\\n     --header 'x-api-version: 2022-01-01' \\\n     --header 'x-client-id: xxxxxx' \\\n     --header 'x-client-secret: xxxxxx' \\\n     --data '\n    {\n     \"refund_amount\": 5,\n     \"refund_id\": \"refund12345\"\n    }\n```\n\n#### Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"cf_payment_id\": 885704957,\n  \"cf_refund_id\": \"refund_49234\",\n  \"created_at\": \"2022-10-27T14:35:22+05:30\",\n  \"entity\": \"refund\",\n  \"metadata\": null,\n  \"order_id\": \"12345\",\n  \"processed_at\": null,\n  \"refund_amount\": 5,\n  \"refund_arn\": null,\n  \"refund_charge\": 0,\n  \"refund_currency\": \"INR\",\n  \"refund_id\": \"refund12345\",\n  \"refund_mode\": \"STANDARD\",\n  \"refund_note\": null,\n  \"refund_splits\": [],\n  \"refund_status\": \"PENDING\",\n  \"refund_type\": \"MERCHANT_INITIATED\",\n  \"status_description\": \"In Progress\"\n}\n```\n\n## Handling Special cases\n\n### Order Expiry\n\n- Cashfree allows setting the expiry time for an order in the Create Order API. Use that to set preferred expiry time.\n- Post order expiry, if no webhook was received, do a status check to ensure that the order expired and then [cancel the order at WhatsApp to update the user](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#step-8--update-order-status).\n\n### Handling failed payments\n\n- The Payment message sent to the user via Whatsapp allows for multiple retries upon failure (ie the Pay button is available until successful payment). However Cashfree requires the reference id (“tr” field in the url received in Order Pay response) to be unique for each payment.\n- So when a failed payment response is received from Cashfree, [update the status of order at WhatsApp to cancelled](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises/payments-api/upi#step-8--update-order-status). Post that a new payment message can be sent to the user to retry the payment.\n- In case, there is a delay in cancellation and the user ends up making a successful payment, Cashfree will not send a webhook to the merchant but does an auto-refund, without any additional action required by the merchant. In the case of a customer query in such a scenario (where they claim the transaction was successful but the payment cannot be found at Cashfree), suggest to the user that refund will be processed in a few days.\n\n### Canceling Order for successful transaction\n\nThere may arise a scenario where Cashfree shared a successful payment signal but the order cannot be fulfilled by the merchant. In such scenario, process refund for the payment via one of the following mechanisms:\n\n- Use Refund API.\n- Use Cashfree dashboard for merchants.\n\n``\n\n``\n\n``",

Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-3--add-common-message-parameters)\n\n[Step 4:Make a POST Call to Messages Endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-4-make-a-post-call-to-messages-endpoint)\n\n[Step 5: Consumer Pays for the Order](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-5--consumer-pays-for-the-order)\n\n[Step 6: Get Notified About Transaction Status Updates from payment gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-6--get-notified-about-transaction-status-updates-from-payment-gateway)\n\n[Step 7: Update order status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-7--update-order-status)\n\n[Security Considerations](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#security-considerations)\n\n[Checklist for Integrated Merchants](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#checklist-for-integrated-merchants)\n\n# Receive UPI Payments Through WhatsApp(Recommended)\n\nFor businesses working with Razorpay or PayU payment gateways, we have deeper integration with these PGs. Please refer to [Payment Gateway Integration Guide](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/pg)\n\nYour business can enable customers to pay for their orders using all the UPI Apps installed on their devices via WhatsApp. Businesses can send customers invoice ( `order_details`) messages, then get notified about payment status updates via webhook notifications from Payment Gateway.\n\n## Overview\n\nCurrently, customers browse business catalogs, add products to cart, and send orders in with our set of commerce messaging solutions, which includes [Single Product Message, Multi Product Message, and Product Detail Page](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/guides/commerce-guides/share-products-with-customers).\n\nWith the WhatsApp Payments API, businesses can send customers a bill so the customer can complete their order with all the UPI Apps.\n\n## How It Works\n\nThe business must send an `order_details` message for the consumer to initiate payment. This type of message is a new type of interactive message, which always contains the same 4 main components: **header**, **body**, **footer**, and **action**. Inside the **action** component, the business includes all the information needed for the customer to complete their payment.\n\nAn order\\_details message contains the following fields that are worth noting:\n\n- `upi_intent_link` \\- Fields that will be supplied by your payment gateway and denote where a payment will be sent.\n- `reference_id` \\- This is used to track the lifecycle of the order. Payment statuses are published against this ID. This could be order-id or transaction-id used to create the upi-intent at payment gateway.\n\nOnce the message is sent, the business waits for a payment or transaction status updates directly from Payment Gateway. Upon receiving payment signal for an order, Business should relay this payment signal to consumer through interactive order status ( `order_status`) message.\n\nUpdating users about the payment signal is important as this message updates the order details message and order details view for the consumer reflecting the order confirmation from the merchant. This is shown with an example in subsequent sections.\n\n## Purchase Flow in App\n\nIn the WhatsApp customer app, the purchase flow has the following steps:\n\n1. Customer sends an order with selected products to the business, or the business identifies the products that the customer has shown interest to purchase.\n\n2. After receiving the order/identifying the product, if a merchant accepts payment methods other than UPI, such as credit cards and payment wallets, then the merchant will send a message to the user to get their preferred payment method for the order.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=811339793994614&version=1731962796)\n\n3.\n    When consumers want to pay using UPI payment method, then merchants should retrieve the UPI payment intent by calling Payment Gateway. Merchant needs to use UPI intent to construct order details messages and send it to the consumer.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=971923044172997&version=1731962796)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=729609215519626&version=1731962796)\n\n4. When the consumer taps the Pay now/continue button, they will be given the option to choose UPI payment Apps - WhatsApp or any other UPI payments apps. Consumers may choose any UPI option to pay for the order.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=946615243445984&version=1731962796)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=184393104468587&version=1731962796)\n\n5. Consumer pays for the order and the payment method is saved for the future and automatically selected for the next payment transaction. Also, one quick note is the order details screen order-status will continue to show \"Order pending\" until the merchant sends order status interactive message.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=6103981082988885&version=1731962796)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=462787186030936&version=1731962796)\n\n6. Once the payment is complete, the business receives a notification from Payment Gateway and the merchant needs to send order status updates to the consumer client notifying consumers about the progress to the order, this will update the order details message CTAs and order details screen - order status description.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=917272609479700&version=1731962796)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=619524793069670&version=1731962796)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=766641921520501&version=1731962796)\n\n\n## Integration Steps\n\nThe steps outlined below assume that the business is about to send order details message to the consumer client.\n\nThe following sequence diagram demonstrates the typical integration flow for WA Payments API:\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=1283044459426337&version=1729702666)\n\n### Step 1: Get UPI Intent from Payment Gateway\n\nOnce the consumer has expressed their interest to purchase an item using UPI payment method, merchant needs to call payment gateway to create a UPI intent, the following is the sample UPI intent link:\n\n```\nupi://pay?pa=abc@psp&pn=ABC&tr=877376394&\n\tam=10.00&cu=INR&mode=00&purpose=00&mc=5399&tn=877376394\n```\n\nMerchant/Partner could send the entire UPI intent as it is in the `upi_intent_link` type payload. These will be discussed in detail below.\n\n### Step 2: Assemble the Interactive Object\n\nTo send an `order_details` message, businesses must assemble an [interactive object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages#interactive-object) of type `order_details` with the following components:\n\n| Object | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `type`<br>object | **Required.**<br>Must be \"order\\_details\". |\n| `header`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>Header content displayed on top of a message. If a header is not provided, the API uses an image of the first available product as the header |\n| `body`<br>object | **Required.**<br>An object with the body of the message. The object contains the following field:<br>`text` string<br>- **Required** if `body` is present. The content of the message. Emojis and markdown are supported. Maximum length is 1024 characters |\n| `footer`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>An object with the footer of the message. The object contains the following fields:<br>`text` string<br>- **Required** if `footer` is present. The footer content. Emojis, markdown, and links are supported. Maximum length is 60 characters |\n| `action`<br>object | **Required.**<br>An action object you want the user to perform after reading the message. This action object contains the following fields:<br>`name` string<br>- **Required**. Must be \"review\\_and\\_pay\"<br>`parameters` object<br>- See [Parameters Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#paramobject) for information |\n\n#### Parameters Object\n\n| Object | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `reference_id`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Unique identifier for the order or invoice provided by the business. It is case sensitive and cannot be an empty string and can only contain English letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, or dots, and should not exceed 35 characters.<br>The reference\\_id must be unique for each order\\_details message for a given business. If there is a need to send multiple order\\_details messages for the same order, it is recommended to include a sequence number in the reference\\_id (for example, \"BM345A-12\") to ensure reference\\_id uniqueness. |\n| `type`<br>object | **Required.**<br>The type of goods being paid for in this order. Current supported options are `digital-goods` and `physical-goods` |\n| `beneficiaries`<br>array | **Required for shipped physical-goods.**<br>An array of beneficiaries for this order. A beneficiary is an intended recipient for shipping the physical goods in the order. It contains the following fields:<br>Beneficiary information isn't shown to users but is needed for legal and compliance reasons.<br>`name` string<br>- **Required.** Name of the individual or business receiving the physical goods. Cannot exceed 200 characters<br>`address_line1` string<br>- **Required.** Shipping address (Door/Tower Number, Street Name etc.). Cannot exceed 100 characters<br>`address_line2` string<br>- **Optional.** Shipping address (Landmark, Area, etc.). Cannot exceed 100 characters<br>`city` string<br>- **Required.** Name of the city. <br>`state` string<br>- **Required.** Name of the state.<br>`country` string<br>- **Required.** Must be \"India\".<br>`postal_code` string<br>- **Required.** 6-digit zip code of shipping address. |\n| `currency` | **Required.**<br>The currency for this order. Currently the only supported value is `INR`. |\n| `total_amount`<br>object | **Required.**<br>The `total_amount` object contains the following fields:<br>`offset` integer<br>- **Required.** Must be `100` for `INR`.<br>`value` integer<br>- **Required.** Positive integer representing the amount value multiplied by offset. For example, ₹12.34 has value 1234.<br>`total_amount.value` must be equal to `order.subtotal.value` \\+ `order.tax.value` \\+ `order.shipping.value` \\- `order.discount.value`. |\n| `payment_settings`<br>object | **Required.**<br>See [Payment Settings object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#paymentsettingsobject) for more information. |\n| `order`<br>object | **Required.**<br>See [order object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#ordobject) for more information. |\n\n#### Payment Settings Object\n\nYou can pass UPI intent as it is or parse the UPI intent parameters and pass them in a json structure. We support both the formats, so following are the two variants of payments settings objects:\n\n##### Payment Settings Object for UPI intent link\n\n| Object | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `type`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Must be set to **\"upi\\_intent\\_link\"** |\n| `upi_intent_link`<br>object | **Required.**<br>An object that describes payment account information:<br>`link` string<br>- **Required.** The UPI intent that is generated from Payment gateway.<br>  The UPI intent only supports the following \" `&`\" separated attributes- pa, pn, mc, purpose and tr<br>Example: upi://pay?pa=merchant\\_vpa&pn=Merchant\\_Name&mc=merchant\\_category\\_code&purpose=purpose\\_code&tr=pg\\_generated\\_id |\n\n#### Order Object\n\n| Object | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `status`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Only supported value in the `order_details` message is `pending`.<br>In an `order_status` message, `status` can be: `pending`, `captured`, or `failed`. |\n| `type`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Only supported value is `quick_pay`. When this field is passed in we hide the \"Review and Pay\" button and only show the \"Pay Now\" button in the order details bubble. |\n| `items`<br>object | **Required.**<br>An object with the list of items for this order, containing the following fields:<br>`retailer_id` string<br>- **Optional.** Content ID for an item in the order from your catalog.<br>`name` string<br>- **Required.** The item’s name to be displayed to the user. Cannot exceed 60 characters<br>`image` object<br>- **Optional.** Custom image for the item to be displayed to the user. See [item image object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#item_image_object) for information<br>Using this image field will limit the items array to a maximum of 10 items and this cannot be used with `retailer_id` or `catalog_id`.<br>`amount` amount object with value and offset -- refer total amount field above<br>- **Required.** The price per item<br>`sale_amount` amount object<br>- **Optional.** The discounted price per item. This should be less than the original amount. If included, this field is used to calculate the subtotal amount<br>`quantity` integer<br>- **Required.** The number of items in this order, this field cannot be decimal, has to be integer. <br>`country_of_origin` string<br>- **Required** if `catalog_id` is not present. The country of origin of the product<br>`importer_name` string<br>- **Required** if `catalog_id` is not present. Name of the importer company<br>`importer_adress` string<br>- **Required** if `catalog_id` is not present. Address of importer company |\n| `subtotal`<br>object | **Required.**<br>The value **must be equal** to sum of `order.amount.value` \\\\* `order.amount.quantity`. Refer to `total_amount` description for explanation of `offset` and `value` fields<br>The following fields are part of the `subtotal` object:<br>`offset` integer<br>- **Required.** Must be `100` for `INR`<br>`value` integer<br>- **Required.** Positive integer representing the amount value multiplied by offset. For example, ₹12.34 has value 1234 |\n| `tax`<br>object | **Required.**<br>The tax information for this order which contains the following fields:<br>`offset` integer<br>- **Required.** Must be `100` for `INR`<br>`value` integer<br>- **Required.** Positive integer representing the amount value multiplied by offset. For example, ₹12.34 has value 1234<br>`description` string<br>- **Optional.** Max character limit is 60 characters |\n| `shipping`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>The shipping cost of the order. The object contains the following fields:<br>`offset` integer<br>- **Required.** Must be `100` for `INR`<br>`value` integer<br>- **Required.** Positive integer representing the amount value multiplied by offset. For example, ₹12.34 has value 1234<br>`description` string<br>- **Optional.** Max character limit is 60 characters |\n| `discount`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>The discount for the order. The object contains the following fields:<br>`offset` integer<br>- **Required.** Must be `100` for `INR`<br>`value` integer<br>- **Required.** Positive integer representing the amount value multiplied by offset. For example, ₹12.34 has value 1234<br>`description` string<br>- **Optional.** Max character limit is 60 characters<br>`discount_program_name` string<br>- **Optional.** Text used for defining incentivised orders. If order is incentivised, the merchant needs to define this information. Max character limit is 60 characters |\n| `catalog_id`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>Unique identifier of the Facebook catalog being used by the business.<br>If you do not provide this field, you must provide the following fields inside the items object: `country_of_origin`, `importer_name`, and `importer_address` |\n| `expiration`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>Expiration for that order. Business must define the following fields inside this object:<br>`timestamp` string – UTC timestamp in seconds of time when order should expire. Minimum threshold is 300 seconds<br>`description` string – Text explanation for expiration. Max character limit is 120 characters |\n\n#### Item Image Object\n\n| Object | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `link`<br>string | **Required.**<br>A link to the image that will be shown to the user. Must be an `image/jpeg` or `image/png` and 8-bit, RGB or RGBA. Follows same requirements as image in [media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#supported-media-types) |\n\nBy the end, the interactive object should look something like this for a merchant upi intent type catalog-based integration:\n\n```\n{\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"order_details\",\n    \"header\": {\n      \"type\": \"image\",\n      \"image\": {\n        \"link\": \"your-media-url-link\"\n      }\n    },\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"your-text-body-content\"\n    },\n    \"footer\": {\n      \"text\": \"your-text-footer-content\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"review_and_pay\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n        \"reference_id\": \"reference-id-value\",\n        \"type\": \"digital-goods\",\n        \"payment_settings\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"upi_intent_link\",\\\n            \"upi_intent_link\": {\\\n              \"link\": \"upi://pay?pa=merchant_vpa&pn=merchant%20Name&mc=mc_code&purpose=purpose_code&tr=transaction_record\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ],\n        \"currency\": \"INR\",\n        \"total_amount\": {\n          \"value\": 21000,\n          \"offset\": 100\n        },\n        \"order\": {\n          \"status\": \"pending\",\n          \"expiration\": {\n            \"timestamp\": \"utc_timestamp_in_seconds\",\n            \"description\": \"cancellation-explanation\"\n          },\n          \"items\": [\\\n            {\\\n              \"name\": \"Product name, for example bread\",\\\n              \"amount\": {\\\n                \"value\": 10000,\\\n                \"offset\": 100\\\n              },\\\n              \"quantity\": 1,\\\n              \"sale_amount\": {\\\n                \"value\": 100,\\\n                \"offset\": 100\\\n              },\\\n              \"country_of_origin\": \"country-of-origin\",\\\n              \"importer_name\": \"name-of-importer-business\",\\\n              \"importer_address\": {\\\n                \"address_line1\": \"B8/733 nand nagri\",\\\n                \"address_line2\": \"police station\",\\\n                \"city\": \"East Delhi\",\\\n                \"zone_code\": \"DL\",\\\n                \"postal_code\": \"110093\",\\\n                \"country_code\": \"IN\"\\\n              }\\\n            },\\\n            {\\\n              \"name\": \"Product name, for example bread\",\\\n              \"amount\": {\\\n                \"value\": 10000,\\\n                \"offset\": 100\\\n              },\\\n              \"quantity\": 1,\\\n              \"sale_amount\": {\\\n                \"value\": 100,\\\n                \"offset\": 100\\\n              },\\\n              \"country_of_origin\": \"country-of-origin\",\\\n              \"importer_name\": \"name-of-importer-business\",\\\n              \"importer_address\": {\\\n                \"address_line1\": \"B8/733 nand nagri\",\\\n                \"address_line2\": \"police station\",\\\n                \"city\": \"East Delhi\",\\\n                \"zone_code\": \"DL\",\\\n                \"postal_code\": \"110093\",\\\n                \"country_code\": \"IN\"\\\n              }\\\n            }\\\n          ],\n          \"subtotal\": {\n            \"value\": 20000,\n            \"offset\": 100\n          },\n          \"tax\": {\n            \"value\": 1000,\n            \"offset\": 100,\n            \"description\": \"optional_text\"\n          },\n          \"shipping\": {\n            \"value\": 1000,\n            \"offset\": 100,\n            \"description\": \"optional_text\"\n          },\n          \"discount\": {\n            \"value\": 1000,\n            \"offset\": 100,\n            \"description\": \"optional_text\",\n            \"discount_program_name\": \"optional_text\"\n          }\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Step 3: Add Common Message Parameters\n\nOnce the interactive object is complete, append the other parameters that make a message: `recipient_type`, `to`, and `type`. Remember to set the `type` to `interactive`.\n\n```\n{\n   \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n   \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n   \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n   \"type\": \"interactive\",\n   \"interactive\": {\n     // interactive object here\n   }\n }\n\n```\n\nThese are [parameters common to all message types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/messages#sending-messages).\n\n### Step 4:Make a POST Call to Messages Endpoint\n\nMake a POST call to the [`/[PHONE_NUMBER_ID]/messages`](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint with the `JSON` object you have assembled. If your message is sent successfully, you get the following response:\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [ {\\\n      \"input\": \"[PHONE_NUMBER_ID]\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"[PHONE-NUMBER_ID]\"\\\n  } ],\n  \"messages\": [ {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDUwNzY1MjAVAgARGBI5QTNDQTVCM0Q0Q0Q2RTY3RTcA\"\\\n  } ]\n}\n\n```\n\nFor all errors that can be returned and guidance on how to handle them, see [WhatsApp Cloud API, Error Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes).\n\n### Step 5: Consumer Pays for the Order\n\nConsumers can pay using WhatsApp payment method or using any UPI supported app that is installed on the device.\n\n### Step 6: Get Notified About Transaction Status Updates from payment gateway\n\nBusinesses receive updates to the invoice via payment gateway webhooks, when the status of the user-initiated transaction changes. The unique identifier reference-id passed in `order_details` message can be used to map the transaction to the consumer invoice or interactive order details message.\n\nPlease refer to our PG integration guide for the exact payment signals. [Cashfree](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/pg-guide-cashfree) and [CC Avanue](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/pg-guide-cashfree)\n\n### Step 7: Update order status\n\nUpon receiving transaction signals from payment gateway through webhook, the business must update the order status to keep the user up to date. Currently we support the following order status values:\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=634034961253028&version=1742854961)\n\n| Value | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `pending` | User has not successfully paid yet |\n| `processing` | User payment authorized, merchant/partner is fulfilling the order, performing service, etc. |\n| `partially-shipped` | A portion of the products in the order have been shipped by the merchant |\n| `shipped` | All the products in the order have been shipped by the merchant |\n| `completed` | The order is completed and no further action is expected from the user or the partner/merchant |\n| `canceled` | The partner/merchant would like to cancel the `order_details` message for the order/invoice. The status update will fail if there is already a `successful` or `pending` payment for this `order_details` message |\n\nTypically businesses update the `order_status` using either the WhatsApp payment status change notifications or their own internal processes. To update `order_status`, the partner sends a `order_status` message to the user.\n\n```\n{\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"whatsapp-id\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"order_status\",\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"your-text-body-content\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"review_order\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n        \"reference_id\": \"reference-id-value\",\n        \"order\": {\n          \"status\": \"processing | partially_shipped | shipped | completed | canceled\",\n          \"description\": \"optional-text\"\n        }\n      }\n    }\n  }\n}\n```\n\nThe following table describes the returned values:\n\n| Value | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `reference_id` | The ID provided by the partner in the `order_details` message |\n| `status` | The new order `status` |\n| `description` | Optional text for sharing status related information in `order_details`. Could be useful while sending cancellation. Max character limit is 120 characters |\n\nMerchant should always post this order-status message to the consumer after receiving transaction updates for an order. As the order\\_details message and order details screen experience is tied to to the order status updates.\n\n## Security Considerations\n\nBusinesses should comply with local security and regulatory requirements in India. They should not rely solely on the status of the transaction provided in the webhook and must use payment lookup API to retrieve the statuses directly from WhatsApp. Businesses must always sanitize/validate the data in the API responses or webhooks to protect against SSRF attacks.\n\n## Checklist for Integrated Merchants\n\n- Ensure that an `order_status` message is send to consumer informing them about updates to an order after receiving transaction updates for an order.\n\n- Ensure the merchant is verified and WABA contact is marked with a verified check.\n\n- Verify the WABA is mapped to appropriate merchant initiated messaging tier(1k, 10k and 100k per day)\n\n- Merchant should list the customer support information in the profile screen in case the consumer wants to report any issues.\n\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Receive UPI Payments Through WhatsApp(Recommended)](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#receive-upi-payments-through-whatsapp-recommended-)\n\n[Overview](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#overview)\n\n[How It Works](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#how-it-works)\n\n[Purchase Flow in App](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#purchase-flow-in-app)\n\n[Integration Steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#integration-steps)\n\n[Step 1: Get UPI Intent from Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-1)\n\n[Step 2: Assemble the Interactive Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-2--assemble-the-interactive-object)\n\n[Step 3: Add Common Message Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-3--add-common-message-parameters)\n\n[Step 4:Make a POST Call to Messages Endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-4-make-a-post-call-to-messages-endpoint)\n\n[Step 5: Consumer Pays for the Order](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-5--consumer-pays-for-the-order)\n\n[Step 6: Get Notified About Transaction Status Updates from payment gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-6--get-notified-about-transaction-status-updates-from-payment-gateway)\n\n[Step 7: Update order status](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/upi-intent/dynamic-vpa#step-7--update-order-status)\n\n[Security Steps](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links#integration-steps)\n\n[Step 1: Get Payment Link from Payment Gateway](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links#step-1)\n\n[Step 2: Assemble the Interactive Object](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/payment-links#step-2--assemble-the-interactive-object)\n\n[Step 3: Add Common Message
