[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Reaction Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#reaction-messages)\n\n[Limitations](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#limitations)\n\n[Sending Reaction Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#sending-reaction-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#example-response)\n\n# Reaction Messages\n\nReaction messages are emoji-reactions that you can apply to a previous WhatsApp user message that you have received.\n\n![](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/440791676_2613895758778914_1777908069161322734_n.png?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=gZMyW7-DtwUQ7kNvwHHl5a_&_nc_oc=AdlwgK7Vw_6W1-P-E5gUwFuIEL6lfGRhxRY2XbtG_pyOrBT5q-gelInZqUA-j1Nto2U&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=2XktdvV_TmiknKFKN_N7-A&oh=00_AYFBvl0qF8ogE0QEp_GbP04JGO87pmTTcJID1WbQFq_1iA&oe=680AEF31)\n\n## Limitations\n\nWhen sending a reaction message, only a [sent message webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/payload-examples#status--message-sent) ( `status` set to `sent`) will be triggered; delivered and read message webhooks will not be triggered.\n\n## Sending Reaction Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to apply an emoji reaction on a message you have received from a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"reaction\",\n  \"reaction\": {\n    \"message_id\": \"<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>\",\n    \"emoji\": \"<EMOJI>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<EMOJI>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Unicode escape sequence of the emoji, or the emoji itself, to apply to the user message. | Unicode escape sequence example:<br>`\\uD83D\\uDE00`<br>Emoji example:<br>😀 |\n| `<WHATSAPP_MESSAGE_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp message ID of message you want to apply the emoji to.<br>If the message you are reacting to is more than 30 days old, doesn't correspond to any message in the conversation, has been deleted, or is itself a reaction message, the reaction message will not be delivered and you will receive a **messages** webhook with error code `131009`. | `wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgASGBQzQUZCMTY0MDc2MUYwNzBDNTY5MAA=` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to apply the grinning face emoji (😀) to a previously received user message.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"reaction\",\n  \"reaction\": {\n    \"message_id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgASGBQzQUZCMTY0MDc2MUYwNzBDNTY5MAA=\",\n    \"emoji\": \"\\uD83D\\uDE00\"\n  }\n}'\n\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Reaction Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#reaction-messages)\n\n[Limitations](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#limitations)\n\n[Sending Reaction Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#sending-reaction-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages#example-response)\n\n* * Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#document-messages)\n\n[Sending Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#sending-text-messages)\n\n[Request Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Supported Document Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#supported-document-types)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#example-response)\n\n# Document Messages\n\nDocument messages are messages that display a document icon, linked to a document, that a WhatsApp user can tap to download.\n\n![](https://scontent.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/441287424_3695370760733536_48188157634176922_n.png?_nc_cat=101&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=OCLnUhIfj7cQ7kNvwE6fb9u&_nc_oc=Adkl4RR3OFfBkXuCtyM8hOTz6z9eWY4XMDxWvgxPdHYRnBRufutttAp4FlwUTMFVpio&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent.xx&_nc_gid=Uc-NNb2wbsqcwOt44ZzMUQ&oh=00_AYEO3OmS-MoUUyG15-vplaou6UcdI87-Ri_vS41ujccApw&oe=680B1288)\n\n## Sending Text Messages\n\nUse the **[POST /<WHATSAPP\\_BUSINESS\\_PHONE\\_NUMBER\\_ID>/messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)** endpoint to send a document message to a WhatsApp user.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>\",\n  \"type\": \"document\",\n  \"document\": {\n    \"id\" : \"<MEDIA_ID>\", /* Only if using uploaded media */\n    \"link\": \"<MEDIA_URL>\", /* Only if linking to your media */\n    \"caption\": \"<DOCUMENT_CAPTION>\",\n    \"filename\": \"<DOCUMENT_FILENAME>\"\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Post Body Parameters\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Example Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<DOCUMENT_CAPTION>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Document caption text. | `Lucky Shrub Invoice` |\n| `<DOCUMENT_FILENAME>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Document filename, with extension. The WhatsApp client will use an appropriate file type icon based on the extension. | `lucky-shrub-invoice.pdf` |\n| `<MEDIA_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Required if using an uploaded media asset (recommended).**<br>[Uploaded media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) asset ID. | `430519053060512` |\n| `<DOCUMENT_FILENAME>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Document filename, with extension. The WhatsApp client will use an appropriate file type icon based on the extension. | `lucky-shrub-invoice.pdf` |\n| `<MEDIA_URL>`<br>_String_ | **Required if linking to your media asset (not recommended).**<br>URL of image asset on your public server. For better performance, we recommend that you [upload your media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media#upload-media) asset instead. | `https://www.luckyshrub.com/invoices/FmOzfD9cKf/lucky-shrub-invoice.pdf` |\n| `<WHATSAPP_USER_PHONE_NUMBER>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>WhatsApp user phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n\n## Supported Document Types\n\n| Document Type | Extension | MIME Type | Max Size |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| Text | .txt | text/plain | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Excel | .xls | application/vnd.ms-excel | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Excel | .xlsx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Word | .doc | application/msword | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft Word | .docx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft PowerPoint | .ppt | application/vnd.ms-powerpoint | 100 MB |\n| Microsoft PowerPoint | .pptx | application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation | 100 MB |\n| PDF | .pdf | application/pdf | 100 MB |\n\n## Example Request\n\nExample request to send a PDF in a document message with a caption to a WhatsApp user.\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"text\",\n  \"text\": {\n    \"preview_url\": true,\n    \"body\": \"As requested, here'\\''s the link to our latest product: https://www.meta.com/quest/quest-3/\"\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY0NjcwNDM1OTUVAgARGBI1RjQyNUE3NEYxMzAzMzQ5MkEA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Document Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#document-messages)\n\n[Sending Text Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#sending-text-messages)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#post-body)\n\n[Post Body Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#post-body-parameters)\n\n[Supported Document Types](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#supported-document-types)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages#example-response)\n\n* * Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/)\n\nWe are making changes to the WhatsApp Business Platform pricing model.\n\n**Effective July 1, 2025 for all businesses on our platform:**\n\n- The conversation-based pricing model will be deprecated\n- We will charge [per-message for template messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#per-message-pricing) instead of per-conversation\n- Utility templates sent within an open customer service window [will be free](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing#free-utility-templates-in-the-customer-service-window)\n\nSee [Pricing Updates on the WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/pricing/updates-to-pricing) for additional details.\n\n# Sending Catalog Template Messages\n\nThis document explains how to send approved [catalog templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/catalog-templates) in a template message. See [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services) to learn more about product catalogs and ways to showcase your products.\n\n## Requirements\n\nYou must have [inventory uploaded to Meta](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services/upload-inventory) in an ecommerce catalog [connected to your WhatsApp Business Account](https://www.facebook.com/business/help/158662536425974).\n\n## Limitations\n\nCatalog template messages cannot be sent with the [On-Premises API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/on-premises).\n\n## Request Syntax\n\nUse the [WhatsApp Business Phone Number > Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages) endpoint to send a catalog template message using a catalog template with an `APPROVED` status.\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_PHONE_NUMBER_ID>/messages\n```\n\n### Post Body\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"<TO>\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"<NAME>\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"<CODE>\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n\\\n      /* Body component required if template uses variables, otherwise omit */\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"<TYPE>\",\\\n            \"text\": \"<TEXT>\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"CATALOG\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"thumbnail_product_retailer_id\": \"<THUMBNAIL_PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}\n```\n\n### Properties\n\n| Placeholder | Description | Sample Value |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `<CODE>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Template [language and locale code](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/message-templates/supported-languages). | `en_US` |\n| `<NAME>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Template name. | `intro_catalog_offer` |\n| `<THUMBNAIL_PRODUCT_RETAILER_ID>`<br>_String_ | **Optional.**<br>Item SKU number. Labeled as Content ID in the Commerce Manager.<br>The thumbnail of this item will be used as the message's header image.<br>If the `parameters` object is omitted, the product image of the first item in your catalog will be used. | `2lc20305pt` |\n| `<TEXT>`<br>_String_ | **Required if template uses variables.**<br>Template variable. | `100` |\n| `<TO>`<br>_String_ | **Required.**<br>Customer phone number. | `+16505551234` |\n| `<TYPE>`<br>_String_ | **Required if template uses variables.**<br>Template variable type. | `text` |\n\n## Example Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v17.0/106540352242922/messages' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...' \\\n-d '\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"+16505551234\",\n  \"type\": \"template\",\n  \"template\": {\n    \"name\": \"intro_catalog_offer\",\n    \"language\": {\n      \"code\": \"en_US\"\n    },\n    \"components\": [\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"body\",\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"100\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"400\"\\\n          },\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"text\",\\\n            \"text\": \"3\"\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      },\\\n      {\\\n        \"type\": \"button\",\\\n        \"sub_type\": \"CATALOG\",\\\n        \"index\": 0,\\\n        \"parameters\": [\\\n          {\\\n            \"type\": \"action\",\\\n            \"action\": {\\\n              \"thumbnail_product_retailer_id\": \"2lc20305pt\"\\\n            }\\\n          }\\\n        ]\\\n      }\\\n    ]\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Example Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"input\": \"+16505551234\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"16505551234\"\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"messages\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTY1MDM4Nzk0MzkVAgARGBI5RkEwM0EyODFEQzQ2NDYzQTMA\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Sending Catalog Template Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#sending-catalog-template-messages)\n\n[Requirements](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#requirements)\n\n[Limitations](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#limitations)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#request-syntax)\n\n[Post Body](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#post-body)\n\n[Properties](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#properties)\n\n[Example Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#example-request)\n\n[Example Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates/catalog-template-messages#example-response)\n\n* * [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n\n- [Account Migration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration)\n- [Business Compliance](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/business-compliance)\n- [Business Profiles](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/business-profiles)\n- [Media](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/media)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/messages)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/phone-numbers)\n- [Registration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/registration)\n- [Two-Step Verification](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/two-step-verification)\n- [WhatsApp Business Accounts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-accounts)\n- [Flows Encryption](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/whatsapp-business-encryption)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/webhooks/components)\n\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Account Migration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#account-migration)\n\n[Registration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#registration)\n\n[Throughput](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#throughput)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#parameters)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#example)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Account Migration\n\nIf you are migrating a business phone number from On-Premises API to Cloud API, use this endpoint to register the number for use with Cloud API after you have performed your backup.\n\nSee [Migrating from On-Premises API and Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud) for complete migration steps.\n\n| Endpoint | Authentication |\n| --- | --- |\n| `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/register`<br>(See [Get Phone Number ID](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/manage-phone-numbers#get-all-phone-numbers)) | Solution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_management` permission. |\n\n## Registration\n\nTo complete business [phone number migration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud), make a `POST` call to the `PHONE_NUMBER_ID/register` endpoint and include the parameters listed below.\n\nYour request could take as long as 15 seconds to finish. During this period, your On-Premises deployment is automatically disconnected from WhatsApp servers and shut down; the business number will start up in Cloud API at the same time.\n\nAfter the request finishes successfully, you can resume sending messages.\n\n### Throughput\n\nIf you [migrate a business phone number](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/migrating-from-onprem-to-cloud) that has multiconnect running 2 or more shards from On-Premises API to Cloud API, it will automatically be upgraded to higher throughput.\n\n### Parameters\n\n| Name | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `messaging_product` | **Required.**<br>Messaging service used for the request. In this case, use “WhatsApp”. |\n| `pin` | **Required.**<br>A 6-digit pin you have previously set up. If you use the wrong pin, your on-premise deployment will be down and will be disconnected from the WhatsApp servers.<br>If you haven't set up or you have disabled two-step verification, provide a random 6-digit pin in the request, and this will be used to enable two-step verification in the WhatsApp Business Cloud-Based API. |\n| `backup.data` | **Required.**<br>The data value you get when you backup your on-premise deployment. This contains the account registration info and application settings.<br>See [Backup and Restore](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/settings/backup-and-restore) to backup your on-premise implementation. |\n| `backup.password` | **Required.**<br>The password you used in the backup API of your On-Premises deployment. |\n\n### Example\n\nSample request:\n\n```\ncurl -X POST \\\n 'https://graph.facebook.com/v22.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/register' \\\n -H 'Authorization: Bearer SYSTEM_USER_ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n -d '{\n    \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n    \"pin\": \"6_DIGIT_PIN\",\n    \"backup\": {\n      \"password\": \"PASSWORD\",\n      \"data\": \"BACKUP_DATA\"\n    }\n  }'\n```\n\nSample response:\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\nAll API calls require authentication with access tokens.\n\nDevelopers can authenticate their API calls with the access token generated in the **App Dashboard** \\> **WhatsApp** \\> **API Setup**.\n\nSolution Partners must authenticate themselves with an access token with the `whatsapp_business_messaging` and `whatsapp_business_management` permissions. See [System User Access Tokens](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api/get-started#system-user-access-tokens) for information.\n\n[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\|\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\|\n\n[Business Management API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/business-management-api)\n\nOn This Page\n\n[Account Migration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#account-migration)\n\n[Registration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#registration)\n\n[Throughput](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#throughput)\n\n[Parameters](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#parameters)\n\n[Example](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference/account-migration#example)\n\n* Providers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/get-started-for-tech-providers)\n- [Multi-Partner Solutions](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/multi-partner-solutions)\n- [Messages](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages)\n\n\n- [Address](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/address-messages)\n- [Audio](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/audio-messages)\n- [Contacts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/contacts-messages)\n- [Document](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/document-messages)\n- [Image](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/image-messages)\n- [Interactive Call-To-Action URL](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-cta-url-messages)\n- [Flow](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-flow-messages)\n- [Interactive List](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-list-messages)\n- [Interactive Reply Buttons](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/interactive-reply-buttons-messages)\n- [Location](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/location-messages)\n- [Location Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-messages/location-request-messages)\n- [Reaction](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/reaction-messages)\n- [Sticker](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/sticker-messages)\n- [Template](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/send-message-templates)\n- [Text](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/text-messages)\n- [Video](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/messages/video-messages)\n- [Read Receipts](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/mark-message-as-read)\n\n- [Block Users](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/block-users)\n- [Phone Numbers](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/phone-numbers)\n- [Webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks)\n- [Sell Products & Services](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/sell-products-and-services)\n- [Payments API - India](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in)\n- [Payments API - Brazil](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-br)\n- [Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n- [Support](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support)\n\n# Address Messages\n\nThis feature is only available for businesses based in India and their India customers.\n\nAddress messages give your users a simpler way to share the shipping address with the business on WhatsApp.\n\nAddress messages are interactive messages that contain the 4 main parts: `header`, `body`, `footer`, and `action`. Inside the action component business specifies the name “address\\_message” and relevant parameters.\n\nBelow table outlines the fields that are supported by the address message.\n\n| Field Name | Display Label | Input Type | Supported Countries | Limitations |\n| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |\n| `name` | Name | text | India | None |\n| `phone_number` | Phone Number | tel | India | Valid phone numbers only |\n| `in_pin_code` | Pin Code | text | India | Max length: 6 |\n| `house_number` | Flat/House Number | text | India | None |\n| `floor_number` | Floor Number | text | India | None |\n| `tower_number` | Tower Number | text | India | None |\n| `building_name` | Building/Apartment Name | text | India | None |\n| `address` | Address | text | India | None |\n| `landmark_area` | Landmark/Area | text | India | None |\n| `city` | City | text | India | None |\n| `state` | State | text | India | None |\n\n## Sample API call\n\nThis is a sample API call for the address message. The `country` attribute is a mandatory field in the action parameters. If it is not included, there will be a validation error.\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n          \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n          \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n          \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n          \"type\": \"interactive\",\n          \"interactive\": {\n              \"type\": \"address_message\",\n              \"body\": {\n                   \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered to.\"\n              },\n              \"action\": {\n                   \"name\": \"address_message\",\n                   \"parameters\": {\n                      \"country\" :\"COUNTRY_ISO_CODE\"\n                   }\n              }\n          }\n    }'\n```\n\n## Error Handling\n\nIf the area code of the phone number for the given country is not correct, businesses will be unable to request the address message from the recipient. For example, businesses will be unable to request an address message from a recipient that has the country as “India” but has a phone number with an area code of \"65\".\n\nOnce the address message is sent, the business waits for the user to fill in the address and send it back. The user entered address is shared through the [webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks#subscribe-to-webhooks) registered in the [setup process](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/guides/set-up-webhooks).\n\n## Address Message Steps\n\nThe steps involved in an Address Message are the following:\n\n1. Business sends an address message with the action name `address_message` to the user\n2. User interacts with the message by clicking on the CTA, which brings up an Address Message screen. The user fills out their address and submits the form\n3. After the address message form is submitted by the user, the partner receives a webhook notification, which contains the details of the address submitted by the user\n\n**Sample India Address Message**\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=1030635057904903&version=1743456538)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=947149619943058&version=1743456538)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=207793345356649&version=1743456538)![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=930527574813449&version=1743456538)\n\nThe following sequence diagram shows a typical integration flow for an address message.\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=1404215443696882&version=1743456538)\n\n## Additional Action Parameters\n\nThe business can pass additional attributes such as `values`, `validation_errors`, or `saved_addresses` as part of the interactive action parameters. You can find information on each of their usage below.\n\n| Action Parameter | Usage |\n| --- | --- |\n| `values` | Businesses prefill this for address fields (eg. prefilling the city address field with “India”) |\n| `saved_addresses` | For businesses, they can pass in saved addresses previously associated with the user.<br>For users, they are presented with the option to choose the saved address instead of manually filling it in |\n| `validation_errors` | Businesses can throw errors in the address fields and WhatsApp will prevent the user from submitting the address until the issue(s) are/is resolved. |\n\n### Send Address Message to a User\n\nMake a `POST` call to `/PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages` using the WhatsApp API to send an end-to-end encrypted address message to the user:\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d ' {\n            \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n            \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n            \"to\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\n            \"type\": \"interactive\",\n            \"interactive\": {\n                 \"type\": \"address_message\",\n                 \"body\": {\n                       \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered\n                        to.\"\n                 },\n                \"action\": {\n                      \"name\": \"address_message\",\n                      \"parameters\": \"JSON Payload\"\n                 }\n            }\n     }'\n\n```\n\nTo send an address message without any saved addresses, WhatsApp will prompt the user or business with an address form to enter a new address.\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n      \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n      \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n      \"to\": \"+91xxxxxxxxxx\",\n      \"type\": \"interactive\",\n      \"interactive\": {\n        \"type\": \"address_message\",\n        \"body\": {\n          \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered to.\"\n        },\n        \"action\": {\n          \"name\": \"address_message\",\n          \"parameters\": {\n              \"country\": \"IN\",\n              \"values\": {\n                 \"name\": \"CUSTOMER_NAME\",\n                 \"phone_number\": \"+91xxxxxxxxxx\"\n              }\n           }\n        }\n      }\n   }'\n```\n\nTo send an address message with saved addresses, WhatsApp will prompt the user or business with an option to select among the saved addresses or add an address option. Users can ignore the saved address and enter a new address.\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d\n'{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"91xxxxxxxxxx\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"address_message\",\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered to.\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"address_message\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n          \"country\": \"IN\",\n          \"saved_addresses\": [\\\n             {\\\n                 \"id\": \"address1\",\\\n                 \"value\": {\\\n                    \"name\": \"CUSTOMER_NAME\",\\\n                    \"phone_number\": \"+91xxxxxxxxxx\",\\\n                    \"in_pin_code\": \"400063\",\\\n                    \"floor_number\": \"8\",\\\n                    \"building_name\": \"\",\\\n                    \"address\": \"Wing A, Cello Triumph,IB Patel Rd\",\\\n                    \"landmark_area\": \"Goregaon\",\\\n                    \"city\": \"Mumbai\"\\\n                 }\\\n             }\\\n          ]\n       }\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Check Your Response\n\nA successful response includes a `messages` object with an ID for the newly created message.\n\n```\n{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"contacts\": [{\\\n      \"input\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n      \"wa_id\": \"WHATSAPP_ID\",\\\n    }]\n  \"messages\": [{\\\n      \"id\": \"wamid.ID\",\\\n    }]\n}\n```\n\nAn unsuccessful response contains an error message. See [Error and Status Codes](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/errors) for more information.\n\n## Send an Address Message with Validation Errors\n\nAn address message should be re-sent to the user in the case of a validation error on the business server. The business should send back the set of values previously entered by the user, along with the respective validation errors for each invalid field, as shown in the sample payloads below.\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID/messages' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d\n'{\n  \"messaging_product\": \"whatsapp\",\n  \"recipient_type\": \"individual\",\n  \"to\": \"91xxxxxxxxxx\",\n  \"type\": \"interactive\",\n  \"interactive\": {\n    \"type\": \"address_message\",\n    \"body\": {\n      \"text\": \"Thanks for your order! Tell us what address you’d like this order delivered to.\"\n    },\n    \"action\": {\n      \"name\": \"address_message\",\n      \"parameters\": {\n          \"country\": \"IN\",\n          \"values\": {\n             \"name\": \"CUSTOMER_NAME\",\n             \"phone_number\": \"+91xxxxxxxxxx\",\n             \"in_pin_code\": \"666666\",\n             \"address\": \"Some other location\",\n             \"city\": \"Delhi\"\n          },\n          \"validation_errors\": {\n             \"in_pin_code\": \"We could not locate this pin code.\"\n          }\n       }\n    }\n  }\n}'\n```\n\n## Receive Notifications for Address Submissions\n\nBusinesses will receive address submission notifications through [webhooks](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/webhooks), such as the one shown below.\n\n```\n{\n    \"messages\": [\\\n        {\\\n           \"id\": \"gBGGFlAwCWFvAgmrzrKijase8yA\",\\\n           \"from\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n           \"Interactive\": {\\\n               \"type\":  \"nfm_reply\",\\\n               \"action\":  \"address_message\",\\\n               \"nfm_reply\": {\\\n                   \"name\": \"address_message\",\\\n                    \"response_json\": “<response_json from client>”,\\\n                    \"body\": “<body text from client>”,\\\n            }\\\n           \"timestamp\": \"1670394125\",\\\n           \"type\": \"interactive\"\\\n        }\\\n    ]\n}\n```\n\nThe webhook notification has the following values.\n\n| Field Name | Type | Description |\n| --- | --- | --- |\n| `interactive` | Object | Holds the response from the client |\n| `type` | String | Would be `nfm_reply` indicating it is a Native Flow Response (NFM) from the client |\n| `nfm_reply` | Object | Holds the data received from the client |\n| `response_json` | String | The values of the address fields filled by the user in JSON format that are always present |\n| `body` (Optional) | String | Body text from client, what the user sees |\n| `name` (Optional) | String | Would be `address_message` indicating the type of NFM action response from the client |\n\nAn address message reply as an NFM response type for an India address message request is shown below.\n\n```\n{\n   \"messages\": [\\\n      {\\\n          \"context\": {\\\n\t  \"from\": \"FROM_PHONE_NUMBER_ID\",\\\n\t  \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTIwNjU1NTAxMDcVAgARGBI3NjNFN0U5QzMzNDlCQjY0M0QA\"\\\n           },\\\n          \"from\": \"PHONE_NUMBER\",\\\n         \"id\": \"wamid.HBgLMTIwNjU1NTAxMDcVAgASGCA5RDhBNENEMEQ3RENEOEEzMEI0RUExRDczN0I1NThFQwA=\",\\\n         \"timestamp\": \"1671498855\",\\\n         \"type\": \"interactive\",\\\n         \"interactive\": {\\\n\t \"type\": \"nfm_reply\",\\\n\t\"nfm_reply\": {\\\n\t      \"response_json\": \"{\\\"saved_address_id\\\":\\\"address1\\\",\\\"values\\\":{\\\"in_pin_code\\\":\\\"400063\\\",\\\"building_name\\\":\\\"\\\",\\\"landmark_area\\\":\\\"Goregaon\\\",\\\"address\\\":\\\"Wing A, Cello Triumph, IB Patel Rd\\\",\\\"city\\\":\\\"Mumbai\\\",\\\"name\\\":\\\"CUSTOMER_NAME\\\",\\\"phone_number\\\":\\\"+91xxxxxxxxxx\\\",\\\"floor_number\\\":\\\"8\\\"}}\",\\\n                    \"body\": \"CUSTOMER_NAME\\n +91xxxxxxxxxx\\n 400063, Goregaon, Wing A, Cello Triumph,IB Patel Rd, Mumbai, 8\",\\\n                    \"name\": \"address_message\"\\\n                }\\\n            }\\\n        }\\\n    ]\n}\n```\n\n## Feature Not Supported\n\nIn the case where the client does not support `address_message`, messages are silently dropped and an error message is sent back to the business in a webhook. The webhook notification that would be sent back is shown below:\n\n```\n{\n  \"statuses\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"errors\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"code\": 1026,\\\n          \"href\": \"https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/api/errors/\",\\\n          \"title\": \"Receiver Incapable\"\\\n        }\\\n      ],\\\n      \"id\": \"gBGGFlAwCWFvAgkyHMGKnRu4JeA\",\\\n      \"message\": {\\\n        \"recipient_id\": \"+91xxxxxxxxxx\"\\\n      },\\\n      \"recipient_id\": \"91xxxxxxxxxx\",\\\n      \"status\": \"failed\",\\\n      \"timestamp\": \"1670394125\",\\\n      \"type\": \"message\"\\\n    }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n* * policies](https://developers.facebook.com/devpolicy/)\n\nFollow Us\n\n- [![Follow us on Facebook](https://scontent-lax3-2.xx.fbcdn.net/v/t39.2365-6/89126182_222315695571651_4936319991919149056_n.svg?_nc_cat=1&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=e280be&_nc_ohc=OcG-3KgtZEgQ7kNvwE45nnx&_nc_oc=AdkLIPw30JFU5I4ECxO-rhvF-cDfrf9wk1VRAtGpYx45_VkzK3UBQlAk0HkDw1gO2P4&_nc_zt=14&_nc_ht=scontent-lax3-2.xx&_nc_gid=I7M1tgAlW498PqX33NJYMw&oh=00_AYH-sVlURfl-6oU0BhhiY-gCQ4VqZamU9VO2ev5UVXzFLw&oe=680AE2EF)](https://www.facebook.com/MetaforDevelopers)[![Follow Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-response-3)\n\n[Link or Update Data Endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#link-or-update-data-endpoint)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#request-syntax-4)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-request-4)\n\n[Regenerate Payment Configuration OAuth link](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#regenerate-payment-configuration-oauth-link)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#request-syntax-5)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-request-5)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-response-4)\n\n[Remove a Payment Configuration](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#remove-a-payment-configuration)\n\n[Request Syntax](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#request-syntax-6)\n\n[Sample Request](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-request-6)\n\n[Sample Response](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-response-5)\n\n[Payment Configuration Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#payment-configuration-webhook)\n\n[Sample Payment Configuration Webhook](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/onboarding-apis#sample-payment-configuration-webhook)\n\n![](https://lookaside.fbsbx.com/elementpath/media/?media_id=595945097590761&version=1743728118)[WhatsApp Business Platform](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp)\n\\>\n[Cloud API](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api)\n\\>\n[Reference](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/reference)\n\n# Onboarding APIs\n\nTo receive payments on WhatsApp, you must have a payment configuration linked to the corresponding WhatsApp Business Account. Each payment configuration is associated with a unique name. As part of the order\\_details message, you can specify the payment configuration to use for a specific checkout.\n\nOnboarding APIs allows you to progamatically perform certain operations:\n\n- Get all payment configurations linked to a WhatsApp Business Account.\n- Get a specific payment configuration linked to a WhatsApp Business Account.\n- Create a payment configuration.\n- Regenerate payment gateway oauth link to link payment configuration to a payment gateway.\n- Remove a payment configuration.\n\n## Get All Payment Configurations\n\nGet a list of payment configurations linked to the WhatsApp Business Account.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nGET /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/payment_configurations\n```\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/102290129340398/payment_configurations' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"data\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"payment_configurations\": [\\\n  \t{\\\n  \t  \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\\\n  \t  \"merchant_category_code\": {\\\n  \t    \"code\": \"0000\",\\\n            \"description\": \"Test MCC Code\"\\\n  \t   },\\\n           \"purpose_code\": {\\\n  \t     \"code\": \"00\",\\\n  \t     \"description\": \"Test Purpose Code\"\\\n  \t    },\\\n  \t    \"status\": \"Active\",\\\n   \t    \"provider_mid\": \"test-payment-gateway-mid\",\\\n  \t    \"provider_name\": \"RazorPay\",\\\n  \t    \"created_timestamp\": 1720203204,\\\n  \t    \"updated_timestamp\": 1721088316\\\n\t  },\\\n          ....\\\n\t]\\\n     }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n| `merchant_category_code`<br>object | **Required.**<br>Merchant Category Code:<br>`code` string<br>- **Required.** Will be a valid MCC code.<br>`description` string<br>- **Required.** MCC code description. |\n| `purpose_code`<br>object | **Required.**<br>Purpose Code:<br>`code` string<br>- **Required.** Will be a valid purpose code.<br>`description` string<br>- **Required.** Purpose code description. |\n| `status`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Status of the payment configuration. Must be one of \\[\"Active\", \"Needs\\_Connecting\", \"Needs\\_Testing\"\\]. |\n| `provider_mid`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Payment Gateway Merchant Identification Number (MID). |\n| `provider_name`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Payment Gateway Name. Must be one of \\[\"razorpay\", \"payu\", \"zaakpay\"\\]. |\n| `merchant_vpa`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Merchant UPI handle. |\n| `created_timestamp`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Time when payment configuration was created. |\n| `updated_timestamp`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Time when payment configuration was last updated. |\n\n## Get a specific Payment Configuration\n\nGet a specific payment configuration linked to the WhatsApp Business Account.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nGET /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/payment_configuration/{configuration-name}\n```\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl 'https://graph.facebook.com/v16.0/102290129340398/payment_configuration/test-payment-configuration' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer EAAJB...'\n\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"data\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\\\n      \"merchant_category_code\": {\\\n        \"code\": \"0000\",\\\n        \"description\": \"Test MCC Code\"\\\n      },\\\n      \"purpose_code\": {\\\n        \"code\": \"00\",\\\n        \"description\": \"Test Purpose Code\"\\\n      },\\\n      \"status\": \"Active\",\\\n      \"provider_mid\": \"test-payment-gateway-mid\",\\\n      \"provider_name\": \"RazorPay\",\\\n      \"created_timestamp\": 1720203204,\\\n      \"updated_timestamp\": 1721088316\\\n     }\\\n  ]\n}\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n| `merchant_category_code`<br>object | **Required.**<br>Merchant Category Code:<br>`code` string<br>- **Required.** Will be a valid MCC code.<br>`description` string<br>- **Required.** MCC code description. |\n| `purpose_code`<br>object | **Required.**<br>Purpose Code:<br>`code` string<br>- **Required.** Will be a valid purpose code.<br>`description` string<br>- **Required.** Purpose code description. |\n| `status`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Status of the payment configuration. Must be one of \\[\"Active\", \"Needs\\_Connecting\", \"Needs\\_Testing\"\\]. |\n| `provider_mid`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Payment Gateway Merchant Identification Number (MID). |\n| `provider_name`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Payment Gateway Name. Must be one of \\[\"razorpay\", \"payu\", \"zaakpay\"\\]. |\n| `merchant_vpa`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Merchant UPI handle. |\n| `created_timestamp`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Time when payment configuration was created. |\n| `updated_timestamp`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Time when payment configuration was last updated. |\n\n## Create a Payment Configuration\n\nCreate a payment configuration.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/payment_configuration\n```\n\n### Sample Request\n\n#### Payment Gateway type configuration\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID/payment_configuration' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n       \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\n       \"purpose_code\": \"00\",\n       \"merchant_category_code\": \"0000\",\n       \"provider_name\": \"razorpay\",\n       \"redirect_url\": \"https://test-redirect-url.com\"\n    }'\n```\n\n#### UPI Vpa type configuration\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID/payment_configuration' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n       \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\n       \"purpose_code\": \"00\",\n       \"merchant_category_code\": \"0000\",\n       \"provider_name\": \"upi_vpa\",\n       \"merchant_vpa\": \"test-upi-merchant-vpa@test\"\n    }'\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n| `merchant_category_code`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Merchant Category Code. |\n| `purpose_code`<br>object | **Optional.**<br>Purpose Code. |\n| `provider_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Provider name of the payment configuration. Must be one of \\[\"upi\\_vpa\", \"razorpay\", \"payu\", \"zaakpay\"\\]. |\n| `merchant_vpa`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Merchant UPI handle. |\n| `redirect_url`<br>URI | **Optional.**<br>The url which merchant will be redirected to after successfully linking a payment configuration. |\n\n### Sample Response\n\n#### Payment Gateway type configuration\n\n```\n{\n  \"oauth_url\": \"https://www.facebook.com/payment/onboarding/init/\",\n  \"expiration\": 1721687287,\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n#### UPI Vpa type configuration\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `oauth_url`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Oauth url to be used to link payment configuration to the payment gateway |\n| `expiration`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Expiration time of the oauth url. |\n| `success`<br>boolean | **Required.**<br>Boolean flag to denote if payment configuration creation was successful or not. |\n\n## Link or Update Data Endpoint\n\nThe following section explains how to link, update and delete data endpoint to enable coupons, shipping address and real-time inventory offered by [Checkout Button Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/checkout-button-templates#enabling_coupons_inventory).\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/payment_configuration/{configuration-name}\n```\n\n### Sample Request\n\n#### Payment Gateway type configuration\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID/payment_configuration/test-payment-configuration' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n       \"data_endpoint_url\": \"https://test-data-endpoint-url.com\"\n    }'\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `data-endpoint-url`<br>URI | **Optional.**<br>The URL endpoint that the WhatsApp client sends a secure HTTPS request to for data exchange purposes in [Checkout Button Templates](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/payments-api/payments-in/checkout-button-templates#enabling_coupons_inventory) offering. |\n\n## Regenerate Payment Configuration OAuth link\n\nRegenerate oauth link of payment gateway type payment configuration.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nPOST /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/generate_payment_configuration_oauth_link\n```\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X  POST \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID/generate_payment_configuration_oauth_link' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n       \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\n       \"redirect_url\": \"https://test-redirect-url.com\"\n    }'\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n| `redirect_url`<br>URI | **Optional.**<br>The url which merchant will be redirected to after successfully linking a payment configuration. |\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"oauth_url\": \"https://www.facebook.com/payment/onboarding/init/\",\n  \"expiration\": 1721687287\n}\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `oauth_url`<br>string | **Optional.**<br>Oauth url to be used to link payment configuration to the payment gateway |\n| `expiration`<br>integer | **Optional.**<br>Expiration time of the oauth url. |\n\n## Remove a Payment Configuration\n\nRemove a payment configuration.\n\n### Request Syntax\n\n```\nDELETE /<WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID>/payment_configuration\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n\n### Sample Request\n\n```\ncurl -X  DELETE \\\n'https://graph.facebook.com/v15.0/WHATSAPP_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT_ID/payment_configuration' \\\n-H 'Authorization: Bearer ACCESS_TOKEN' \\\n-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\\n-d '{\n       \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\"\n    }'\n```\n\n### Sample Response\n\n```\n{\n  \"success\": true\n}\n```\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `success`<br>boolean | **Required.**<br>Boolean flag to denote if payment configuration removal was successful or not. |\n\n## Payment Configuration Webhook\n\nBusinesses receive updates via WhatsApp webhooks when the status of the payment configuration changes.\n\nTo receive webhook, Businesses must subscribe to \"payment\\_configuration\\_update\" event for their respective application.\n\nWebhook contains the following fields:\n\n| Field | Description |\n| --- | --- |\n| `configuration_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>The name of the payment configuration to be used in the Order Details message. |\n| `provider_name`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Provider name of the payment configuration. Must be one of \\[\"razorpay\", \"payu\", \"zaakpay\"\\]. |\n| `provider_mid`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Payment gateway account merchant ID. |\n| `status`<br>string | **Required.**<br>Status of the payment configuration. Must be one of \\[\"Active\", \"Needs\\_Connecting\", \"Needs\\_Testing\"\\]. |\n| `created_timestamp`<br>integer | **Required.**<br>Time when payment configuration was created. |\n| `updated_timestamp`<br>integer | **Required.**<br>Time when payment configuration was last updated. |\n\n### Sample Payment Configuration Webhook\n\n```\n{\n  \"entry\": [\\\n    {\\\n      \"id\": \"0\",\\\n      \"time\": 1725499886,\\\n      \"changes\": [\\\n        {\\\n          \"field\": \"payment_configuration_update\",\\\n          \"value\": {\\\n            \"configuration_name\": \"test-payment-configuration\",\\\n            \"provider_name\": \"razorpay\",\\\n            \"provider_mid\": \"test-provider-mid\",\\\n            \"status\": \"Needs Testing\",\\\n            \"created_timestamp\": 123457678,\\\n            \"updated_timestamp\": 123457678\\\n          }\\\n        }\\\n      ]\\\n    }\\\n  ],\n  \"object\": \"whatsapp_business_account\"\n}\n```\n\nOn errors](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/whatsapp/cloud-api/support/error-codes#other-errors)\n\n[Synchronization
